translation.en: Adeyeye said that before these companies can function again, there must be maximum cooperation from them.
translation.ibo: Adeyeye kwukwara na imepe ụlọọrụ ndị a ga-agbado ụkwụ ka ụlọọrụ ndị a si nye Nafac nkwado na nyocha ha.

translation.en: He said that, of the nine members of the agency of Nafdac, that two people are to investigate on the quality of drugs while seven are for law regulations and ten police men where among those that went to llorin that day,to investigate the two pharmaceutical companies that were certified to manufacture cough syrup that contains codeine, whose names were mentioned in the BBC news.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na otu Nafdac nke gụnyere ndị ọrụ itoolu; abụọ bụ ndị na-enyocha ọgwụ na asaa bụ ndị nchọpụta n-ahụ maka idewe iwu na ndị uweojii iri gara Ilorin n'ụbọchị ahụ, ị ga mee nyocha ụlọọrụ abụọ e nyere ikike ime ọgwụ ụkwara nwere codeine, ndị a kpọrọ aha n'akụkọ nyocha nke BBC wepụtara.

translation.en: like Adeyeye said, one was among those that were sent to Emzor company in Lagos.
translation.ibo: Dika Adeyeye siri kwuo, otu ndị ahụ bụkwa ndị e zigara n'ụlọọrụ Emzor na Lagos.

translation.en: He said: 'that their aim and objectives was to inspect their certified distribution paper given to consumers'
translation.ibo: O kwuru: 'Isi ozi e zigara ha bụ ị ga lele akwụkwọ oriri na nkesa ọgwụ ụkwara nwere codeine nye ndị na-aṅụ ya.'

translation.en: He said that Nafdac has called for a meeting among those companies that were involved or affected.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na Nafdac akpọọla oku nzụkọ ndị ihe gbasara ọgwụ metụtara.

translation.en: interesting news:
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: president Buhari is travelling again to London today.
translation.ibo: Onyeisiala Buhari ga-aga London ọzọ taa

translation.en: the judge that murdered her husband had thought about it.
translation.ibo: Ọkaiwu gburu di ya chere ya eche'

translation.en: Lagos, the number of pregnant women living with HIV are 2131.
translation.ibo: Legos: Ụmụnwaanyị dị ime 2131 na-arịa HIV

translation.en: will Nigeria budget be established this month?
translation.ibo: Bọjeetị Naịjirịa ọ ga-apụta n'ọnwa a?

translation.en: people are after the 2018 budget of Nigeria and why it has not been published.
translation.ibo: Ndị mmadu na-ajụ maka akwụkwọ mkpata na mmefu ego nke afọ 2018 nke Naịjirịa na ihe mere ejibeghi wepụta ya.

translation.en: President Buhari.
translation.ibo: Onyeisiala Buhari

translation.en: president Buhari gave the law makers the 2018 budget in November 2017.
translation.ibo: Onyesisala Buhari nyere ndi omeiwu akwukwọ bọjeetị nke 2018 n'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2017

translation.en: when president Buhari handed over the 2018 budget to the chief judge on the 7th of November ,which they thought would have been out by January 2018.
translation.ibo: Mgbe onyeisiala Naịjirịa bụ Muhammadu Buhari nyere ndị omeiwu Naịjirịa akwụkwọ eji hazie etu a ga-esi mee mkpata na mmefu (bụ nke Bekee kpọrọ 'budget') nke afọ 2018 n'ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ gara aga ndị mmadụ chere na ha ga-ewepụta ya tupu a banye ọnwa Jenụwarị nke 2018.

translation.en: on this present month of may ,which is the 5th month of the year,the budget is not yet out.
translation.ibo: Ọnwa a nọ n'ime ya ugbua bụ Mee, bụ ọnwa nke ise na 2018, mana ndị omeiwu ewepụtabeghị ya bụ bọjeetị.

translation.en: the minister of finance, explained that as it stands now, it will be very difficult for Nigeria as it brings about the development of the country.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọkachamara n'ihe banyere akụnaụba na-akọwa na etu o siri kwụrụ ugbua ga-eme ka ọ raa Naịjirịa ahụ, okachasị ebe ometụtara ọganihu obodo.

translation.en: Great news this morning,the Senate symbol of Authority is found
translation.ibo: Akụkọ kachasị n'ụtụtụ a: Achọtala ọfọ sineeti

translation.en: Obiano appoints an igala man a commissioner.
translation.ibo: Obiano emeela onye Igala kọmishọna

translation.en: the Senate have called the central bank chairman.
translation.ibo: Ndị sinetị akpọọla onyeisi ụlọakụ ukwu

translation.en: it has become a problem now because they don't really know when the law makers will approve the budget for it to be approved by the president as a law in the state.
translation.ibo: Ihe mere ihe a jiri ka njọ bụ na amaghị mgbe ndị omeiwu ga-ebinye aka na ya bụ bọjeetị ma nye ya onyeisiala ka ọ mee ya iwu obodo.

translation.en: The state law makers said that the reason behind the delay in the 2018 budget is because the three arms of government has not concluded on how to budget their own, in spite of the allocation given by the lawmakers on the 2018 revenue.
translation.ibo: Ndị omeiwu sị na ihe mere ha ejibeghi wepụta 'bọjeetị 2018' a bụ maka ngalaba gọọmentị dị icheiche ewetabeghị nkọwa etu ha sị chọọ ime mkpata na mmefu nke ha, n'agbanyeghị na akwụkwọ ndị omeiwu ji nwere nhazi etu ngalaba dị icheiche kwesịrị isi mee ego na 2018.

translation.en: the ministry of national planning said that all that is needed for the budget is in the allocation given to them.
translation.ibo: Mana ngalaba na-ahụ maka nhazi, - nke a na-akpọ Ministry of National Planning n'asụsụ Bekee - kwuru na ihe niile ndị omeiwu kwesịọrị iji hazie bọjeetị dị n'ime akwụkwọ enyere ha.

translation.en: the minister of national planning, Ben Akabueze said that all that are needed by the lawmakers are in the allocation given to them in november last year by President Muhammadu Buhari .
translation.ibo: Ben Akabueze, bụ onyeisi ngalaba na-ahazi mkpata na mmefu kwuru na ihe niile ndi omeiwu chọrọ dị n'akwụkwọ onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari nyere ndị omeiwu n'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ gara aga.

translation.en: He went further to say that the lawmakers invited all the ministers to come and defend and give proper account ,which was sure took place.
translation.ibo: Mana, ọ gakwara n'ihu kwuo na ndị omeiwu na-akpọ ndi isi ngalaba dị icheiche ka ha bịa zara ọnụ ha, nke bụ ihe ya ma na emeela.

translation.en: the meaning
translation.ibo: Ihe ọ pụtara

translation.en: the ministry of finances said that, good account cannot be done in Nigeria without the budget.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọkachamara n'ihe banyere akụnaụba obodo na-ekwu na Naịjirịa agaghị ahazi akụnauba obodo ọfụma ma ya bụrụ na bọjeetị a apụtaghị.

translation.en: people were commenting on social media like Twitter.
translation.ibo: Na soshal midia di ka Twitter, ndi mmadụ na-ekwu maka ihe na-eme.

translation.en: the Twitter handle @AdeBanqie wrote that Nigeria should have said that the lawmakers were not competent enough in Democracy.
translation.ibo: Onye ji akara @AdeBanqie ede na Twitter dere na ndị Naịjirịa kwesiri ikwu na ndị omeiwu agaghị arụnwụ ọrụ n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.

translation.en: the body responsible for budget distribution,BudgIT wrote that it was the 2018 budget that they experienced delay since budgeting started in Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Ụlọọrụ na-enyocha etu gọọmentị jiri agbari 'budget' bụ BudgIT dere na ọ bu nke afọ a kachasi tee aka kemgbe ebidoro ihe banyere bọjeetị na Naịjirịa.

translation.en: @Oduobodumu asked if another country has ever experience this kind of delay in this years budget.
translation.ibo: @OduObodumu na-ajụ ma onwere obodo ọzọ akwụkwọ mkpata na mmefu notegoro aka ruo etu nke afọ a ruru.

translation.en: @purrples calls upon the chief lawmaker to also explain all he knows about the budget.
translation.ibo: @Purrples sị na ya na-akpọ onyeisi ndị omeiwu ukwu ka ọ bịa zara ọnụ ya maka akwụkwọ mkpata na mmefu a.

translation.en: @ApanpaOlasumbo also commented on the issue,he asked why Nigerians are not saying anything on the issue.
translation.ibo: Onye ọzọ tinyere ọnụ n'okwu a bụ @ApanpaOlasumbo bụ onye na-ajụ ihe mere ndị Naịjirịa ejighị ekwu okwu maka ihe a na-eme.

translation.en: meanwhile,the lawmakers said that they will approve the budget on the 16th of this month, but saying it is not the problem but putting it in action.
translation.ibo: Ka ihe ndị na-eme, ndị omeiwu na-ekwu na ha ga-ebinye aka na ya bụ akwukwọ n'ụbọchị 16 nke ọnwa a, mana ọbụghị mbụ ha kwuru etu a, nke mere anyi ji ajụ, 'agbu ji agu ọ ga-arapụ ya ugbua?

translation.en: Interesting news:
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: All we need is protection of lives and properties in the land.
translation.ibo: Ihe na-akpa m bụ nchekwa na akụnaụba obodo

translation.en: the way senators embezzle the public fund.
translation.ibo: Etu ndị Sinetọ si agbari ego Naijiria

translation.en: the university of IMT threatened a member of BBC.
translation.ibo: Ndị mahadum IMT majara onye ntaakụkọ BBC

translation.en: Ancient tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Ichi e gburu mgbe gboo

translation.en: Tribal mark is an identity in Igbo which signifies favour, Dignity and respect.
translation.ibo: Igbuichi bụbụ ihe ejiri mara Igbo na ndị agbụrụ ọzọ maka ogo, ọkwa maọbụ ugwu.

translation.en: still in the news, there are different tribal marks.
translation.ibo: N'akụkọ a, mata maka ichi dị icheiche.

translation.en: Tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Igbuichi

translation.en: so many people died as a result of tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ mmadụ nwụrụ maka ịgbuichi a

translation.en: it will also amaze you even in photos, the kind of tribal mark that people were given in the olden day.
translation.ibo: Ọ ga-atụ gị n'anya, mana foto a na-egọsị ụdịrị ichi ndi mmadụ na-egbu n'ala Igbo mgbe gboo.

translation.en: Tribal marks consists of two main types:
translation.ibo: Ịgbuichi dị ụzọ abụọ ama ama:

translation.en: one type belongs to Nri people while the other is for Agbaja people.
translation.ibo: Otu bụ ụdịrị ndị Nri na echi, nke ọzọ bu nke ndị Agbaja.

translation.en: The Nri tribal mark is known by Awka, a town in Anambra state. while Agbaja's tribal mark is from Awgwu, a town in Enugu state.
translation.ibo: Ichi Nrị na-ewu bu na gbụrụgbụrụ Ọka bu obodo di na Anambra steeti ugbua, nke Agbaja si na gbụrụgbụrụ Ọgwụ nke dịzị na Enugwu steetị.

translation.en: In a journal, Journal of International African Institute, it was stated that Igbo people do not give tribal mark on their people for identification.
translation.ibo: N'ime akwụkwọ, Journal of International African Institute, ha kọwara na ndị Igbo anaghị egbu ichi maka ị gosi ebe onye gburu ya sịrị bia.

translation.en: Things that are against the Igbo people.
translation.ibo: Ihe ndị ị na-ekwesịghị ime n'akụkụ onye Igbo

translation.en: Aguleri and igboukwu were not the origin of Ndigbo.
translation.ibo: 'Aguleri na Igboukwu abụghị mbido Ndigbo

translation.en: Things to know about Igbo women, before getting married to them.
translation.ibo: Ihe ndị ị kwesịrị ịma tupu ị lụọ nwaanyị Igbo

translation.en: It is to indicates favour, dignity and respect, to show that the individual has moved to another level.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ maka igosi ogo, ọkwa maọbụ ugwu, na ị gosi na onye ahụ abaala otu ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: Those that has tribal marks are regarded as kingsmen or titledmen.
translation.ibo: Ha na-akpọ ndị gburu ichi ndịnze maọbụ ndịichie.

translation.en: Only the strongmen are given the tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Naanị ndị dị ike ga-egbụ ichi

translation.en: According to traditional belief, those with tribal marks are above death.
translation.ibo: Dịka omenaala siri kwu, ọ bụ sọọsọ ndị gburu ichi ga-emeri ọnwụ.

translation.en: Then, there is a belief that elderly men with tribal marks will live forever in the land of the spirit.
translation.ibo: N'oge ahụ, ha nwere nkwenye na ndị gburu ịchị ga-ebi ebeebe n'ala ndị mmụọ.

translation.en: Those with tribal marks neither work nor carry load on their heads.
translation.ibo: Ndị gburu ichi anaghị arụ ọrụ dịka ndị ọzọ, ha anagị ebu ihe ọbụla n'elu isi ha.

translation.en: It is evil to offend them or to annoy them.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ arụ ị chọ ha okwu obụla maọbụ kpasuo ha iwe.

translation.en: Different types of tribal marks in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Igbuichi dị icheiche n'ala Igbo

translation.en: It is very important to have the sun and the moon in any given tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Ọ dị ezigbo mkpa ka ọnwa na anyanwụ dị n'ichi ọbụla ha ga-echị.

translation.en: The sun comes first before the moon then the tribal marks.
translation.ibo: Ọnwa na-ebụrụzọ, anyanwụ na-esote ya, nke atọ ga-abụ ichi ahụ.

translation.en: Reincarnation.
translation.ibo: Ogbanje

translation.en: Many Igbo people believe that reincarnation still exist.
translation.ibo: Otụtụ ndị igbo nwere nkwenye na Ogbanji ka dị ire

translation.en: Another reason behind the tribal mark is for their children to believe they have reincarnated.
translation.ibo: Igbuichi ọzọ ha na-egbu bụ maka ụmụaka ha chere na ha bụ ogbanje.

translation.en: According to tradition, they are given the tribal marks for them not to reincarnate again as their belief.
translation.ibo: Dịka omenaala siri kwu, ha na-egbu ha ichi a ka mmụọ ogbanje naghị mata ha ma ọ bịa ọzọ.

translation.en: Furthermore, tribal mark is for the stubborn.
translation.ibo: Ọzọ bụ igbu ichi maka ntị fụrụafụ.

translation.en: Igbos believed that this type of tribal mark will help discipline the stubborn.
translation.ibo: Ndị Igbo nwere nkwenye na igbuichi a ga-eme ka ntị ọbụla fụrụafụ gba mmee nakwa da ba n'ime.

translation.en: Do you know the importance of kola nut in Igbo land?
translation.ibo: Ị ma uru ọjị bara n'ala Igbo?

translation.en: Unacceptable behaviors in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Ihe ndị ị na-ekwesịghị ime n'akụkụ onye Igbo

translation.en: Processes involved in tribal mark.
translation.ibo: Etu e siri egbuichi

translation.en: It is early in the morning, that the person to be marked wakes up, goes outside, lies down on the ground facing up.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ n'isi ụtụtụ ka onye chọrọ ị gbu ichi ga-ebilite, pụọ n'iro, dina n'ala cheli ihu ya elu.

translation.en: They use a long sharp knife in doing the tribal mark
translation.ibo: Ha ga-eji mma toro ogologo dị nkọ gbuo ichi a.

translation.en: It is forbidden for the person to either shout or cry during the process.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ arụ ka onye ahụ bee akwa, maọbụ tie mkpu mgbe a na-egbu ya ichi a.

translation.en: No pain relief nor anything to stop the bleeding is given during the process.
translation.ibo: Onweghị ihe ọbụla ha ga-enye ya maka ị nye aka idi ụfụ maọbụ ị kwụsị ọbara ga-agba n'oge igbu iche a.

translation.en: Tribal mark is for beautification
translation.ibo: Igbuichi a bụ maka ị chọ mma

translation.en: Some people died during tribal marking, many others got blind as a result
translation.ibo: Onweele ndị nwụrụ mgbe a na-egbu ha ichi, otụtụ ndị ọzọ kpuru isii maka ihe a.

translation.en: If the individual cries during the process, his wealth shall be taken away from him.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụrụ na onye ha na-egbu ichi bee akwa, e nwere ike ị napụ ya akụnaụba ya.

translation.en: Places that are not marked on the body
translation.ibo: Ebe anaghị egbuichi n'ahụ mmadụ

translation.en: Tribal marks are not done on the chest, the shoulder or the leg, it is only the face or the stomach that are marked.
translation.ibo: Anaghị egbu ichi na obi, uvu maọbụ n'ụkwụ, ọ bụ sọọsọ n'ihu na afọ ka ha na-egbu ichi.

translation.en: Tribal mark is a privilege.
translation.ibo: Igbuichi bụ ihe ogo

translation.en: What stopped tribal marks
translation.ibo: Ihe kwụsịrị igbuichi

translation.en: Nowadays, you don't see people with tribal marks as in the olden days.
translation.ibo: Ugbua, onweghị onye ị ga-ahụ gburu udịrị ichi a na egbu mgbe gboo.

translation.en: Professor Chigozie Nnabuife said that those who had performed this tribal mark those days are all dead.
translation.ibo: Onya ọkammụta aha bụ Chigozie Nnabuihe kwuru na ndị niile gburu ichi a anwuchaala.

translation.en: He also said that the coming of the missionaries helped in ending the act.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na ọbịbịa ụka otu Kraịst mere ka ọtụtụ mmadụ kwụsị igbuichi.

translation.en: In the Journal of International African Institute, a man that was asked said that the youths of this days cannot endure the pain that comes out of this act.
translation.ibo: N'ime akwụkwọ Journal of International African Institute, otu nwoke a jụrụ ajụjụ kwuru na ụmunwoke ugbua anaghị enwe ike idi ụfụ ga-apụta na igbu ichi a.

translation.en: Obasanjo's group have joined politics.
translation.ibo: Otu Obasanjo kpokobara abala ndọrọndọrọ

translation.en: The secretary of CAN has died.
translation.ibo: Onye odee akwụkwọ ndi otu CAN awụọla

translation.en: My experience in the hands of kidnappers.
translation.ibo: Ihe m gabigara n'aka ndị ntọ

translation.en: Mr. Usman Chinedu Mbaekwe told BBC Igbo what he passed through in the hands of kidnappers.
translation.ibo: Maazị Usman Chinedu Mbaekwe gwara BBC Igbo ihe ọ gabigara n'aka ndị ntọ.

translation.en: Mr. usman Chinedu Mbaekwe shared her experience in the hands of kidnappers as he was kidnapped at Okada road in Edo as he was going to Enugu from Lagos in the year 2017.
translation.ibo: Maazị Usman Chinedu Mbaekwe gwara BBC Igbo ihe ọ gabigara n'aka ndị ntọ oge atọrọla ya n'ụzọ Okada dị n'Edo steeti ka o si Legọs na-aga Enugu n'afọ 2017.

translation.en: The house of Senate have recorded N500bn as budget.
translation.ibo: Ụlọomeiwu ejirila N500bn bulite bọjeti

translation.en: The house of assembly added the budget from N8.612tn to N9.120tn addition of N500bn.
translation.ibo: Ụlọomeiwu nke etiti ebuliela egọ bọjeti afọ site na N8.612tn ga N9.120tn, mmanyekwu N500bn.

translation.en: The house of Senate.
translation.ibo: Ụlọomeiwu Sineti

translation.en: Buhari mapped out the 2018 Senate budget six months ago
translation.ibo: Buhari wepụtara ndị ụlọoimiwu Bojet afọ 2018 ọnwa isi gara aga.

translation.en: On Tuesday, The Senate and the house of assembly has mapped out the 2018 budget, as they increased the government revenue from 8.612 to 9.120, which was added 500m.
translation.ibo: N'ụbọchị Tuusde, Ụlọomeiwu ukwu na nke nta wepụtara Bọjeti nke afọ 2018, ebe ha bulirị ego gọọmenti ga-emefu n'afọ site na tarịị naira 8.612 ga tarịị naira 9.120, nke pụtara mmanyekwu ijeri naira 500.

translation.en: Total amount N9,120,334,988,225 shows that they added N530,421,368,624 for statutory transfers
translation.ibo: Mgbari ego ahụ nke pụtara N9,120,334,988,225, gọsiri na e hiwere N530,421,368,624 maka nkesa dị na iwu

translation.en: N2,203,835,365,699 have been allocated for debt servicing whose total amount is N190,000,000.
translation.ibo: E hiwere N2,203,835,365,699 maka ịkwụ ụgwọ eji eji nke ọnụego N190,000,000,000 bụ maka ụgwọ ruola ọkwụkwụ

translation.en: Also allocated is N3,516,477,902,077 for recurrent expenditure.
translation.ibo: E hiwerekwara N3,516,477,902,077 maka ego mmefu ego a na-eme kwa mgbe kwa mgbe

translation.en: They have also allocated N2,869,600,351,825 for capital expenditures for the year ending on the 31st of Disemba.
translation.ibo: Ha hiwekwara N2,869,600,351,825 dịka ego maka imepụta mwulite doro anya n'afọ ga-akwụ ma ọnwa Disemba gba iri ato na otu.

translation.en: Enugu state has mapped out 103 million naira for 2018.
translation.ibo: Enugwu steeti ekewapụtala ijeri naira 103 maka 2018

translation.en: The two houlse of parliament have invited Buhari
translation.ibo: Ụlọomeiwu abụọ akpọọla Buhari oku

translation.en: Nigerians in Ghana: Ghana government are maltreating us.
translation.ibo: Ụmụ Igbo nọ Ghana: Gọọmentị Ghana na-akpagbu anyị

translation.en: The citizens of Nigeria, who advertise and market their products in Ghana magazines, has been at home for the past two weeks that the market was closed.
translation.ibo: Ụmụafọ Naịjiria na-ere ahịa n'ahịa Magazine na Ghana, nọ n'ụlọ ha kemgbe a gbachiri ahịa ahụ n'ime izuụka abụọ gara aga ga-aga.

translation.en: Goods are stagnant in China
translation.ibo: Ahịa Makola na mba Ghana

translation.en: Kizito Obiora, the head of the Nigeria business men in Ghana told BBC that Nigerians over there have settled with their youths for peace to rain.
translation.ibo: Kizito Obiora bụ onyeisi ndị Naịjirịa na-azụ ahịa ebe ahụ gwara BBC Igbo na ụmụafọ Naịjiria na ndị ogbo ha n'obodo ahụ enweela nkwekọrịta na udo ga-achị.

translation.en: Mr Obiora said that it came as a result of the conflict between Nigerians and Ghanaians
translation.ibo: Maazi Obiora kwuru na nke a mere maka esemokwu dara n'etiti ndị Naịjirịa na ndị Ghana.

translation.en: Technovation:A look at the five students who became champion in the Techniques competition.
translation.ibo: Technovation: Lee ụlọakwụkwọ ụmụaka ise ahụ turula ugo ọkaibe n'asompi technụzụ

translation.en: SARS: the peoples comment on their cunning way.
translation.ibo: SARS: Ihe ndị mmadụ na-ekwu maka mwogharị ha

translation.en: The Ghana government has given a policy on how businesses should be conducted by Nigerians in their country.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọchịchị Ghana e nyela iwu maka etu ndị Igbo na-ere ahịa ga-esi na-ere ahịa n'obodo ha.

translation.en: He said that the problem came as the Ghana government came up with a policy that Nigerians and other countries should have 'Equity' equivalent to thousand Dollars.
translation.ibo: Ọ si na nsogbu a bidoro ka gọọmenti Ghana wetara atụmatụ na ndị Naịjirịa na ndị mba ọzọ kwesịrị inwe ihe Bekee kpọrọ 'equity' ruru nde dọla.

translation.en: minister responsible for business brought out this policy.
translation.ibo: Onye wepụtara atụmatụ a bụ minista na-ahụ maka azụmahịa.

translation.en: Obiora said that though this policy was not newly introduced,that the past government planned implementing it but was not completed as it has not been complete even now.
translation.ibo: Obiora kwuru na agbanyeghị na atụmatụ abụghị ihe ọhụrụ, maka na gọọmenti rituru n'ọchịchị chọrọ ime ya, ozighi ezi ugbua etu ozighi ezi mgbe ahụ.

translation.en: international business enterprises has come with their products
translation.ibo: Ndị ahịa akụrụngwa na-esikarị mba ofesi enweta ngwaọrụ ha

translation.en: though market will start tomorrow but will be a reality through the ideas of Nigeria and Ghana government which helped in resolving the issue.
translation.ibo: N'agbanyeghị na ahịa ga-emepe echi, Obiora sị na ọ bụ nkata gọọmenti Naijiria na nke Ghana kpara mere ha jiri gbanyụọ ọkụ.

translation.en: He also said that they came from a brand new direction.
translation.ibo: Ma kwukwa na ha si ụzọ ọzọ bata.

translation.en: The Antichrist churches are tormenting Nigeria.

translation.en: Inspection to know the Equity holders begins today.
translation.ibo: Nyocha ndị na-enweghị 'equity' nke ga-amalite echi.

translation.en: The only person that was affected was Nwafor Akajiofor, a newspaper advertiser.
translation.ibo: Otu onye sị na ihe a ga-emetụta ya bụ Nwafor Akajiofor, bụ onye na-azụ ahịa n'Ahịa Magazine.

translation.en: Akajiofor in his speech 'resident permit and Equity' is a policy that the Ghana government wants to indirectly use to send away the Nigerians in Ghana.
translation.ibo: Akajiofor kwuru na okwu 'resident permit na equity' bụ atụmatụ gọọmenti Ghana ji chọọ ịchụpụ ụmụ Naijiria na Ghana.

translation.en: He said that the approval paper for one to live in Ghana known as 'Residents permit' is not easily gotten or granted.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na akwụkwọ na-enye ikike ibi na Ghana bụ 'resident permit' abụghị ihe dị mfe inweta.

translation.en: To acquire this Residents permit, it costs up to 200,000 naira but it didn't end there.
translation.ibo: Resident permit ahụ na-ericha 200,000, mana inweta ya abụghị ebe o biri.

translation.en: He also said that what pains him most,is that they stipulated that non indigens are not permitted to buy and sell their goods inside their market.
translation.ibo: Obiora na onwe ya sị na ihe na-agba anyammiri bụ na iwu Ghana hibere bụ na ndị mba ọzọ agaghị azụ ahịa n'ime ahịa.

translation.en: Those with complete paper,cannot be allowed to sell effectively inside the market because they are only permitted to sell their goods only along the road.
translation.ibo: Ndị nwere akwụkwọ zuru ezu agaghị aganwu n'ime ahịa zụọ ahịa, ọ bụ naanị n'okporoụzọ ka ha ga-enwe ụlọahịa, dịka iwu a siri kwuo.

translation.en: if the Ghana government implement this law, it will bring about massive returning of Nigerians for they cannot handle the situation.
translation.ibo: Dịka o si kwuo, ọ bụrụ na ndị Ghana gaa n'ihu sobe iwu a, ọtụtụ ụmụafọ na mba ahụ ga-ala makana ha agaghị emenwu ihe dị na ya.

translation.en: Prostate Cancer is a deadly disease found in the urinary bladder of men, which have claimed so Many peoples life.
translation.ibo: Prostate Cancer bụ ajọ ọrịa na-adị n'akpa mamịrị ụmụ nwoke, nke na ọtụtụ mmadụ anwụọla na ya.

translation.ibo: Onye chikọbara ngagharị iwe otu pink blue'ahụ bụ mazị Roncy Chidebe kwuru na ya na ndị otu ya chọrọ ka ụmụ nwoke niile tetanụ ụra, gaa nyochaa onwe ha.

translation.en: Canada has made a policy that will make it very difficult for Nigerians to travel there.

translation.en: The lawmakers are threatening the government of Canada on the kind of maltreatment given to Nigerians who took refuge in their country

translation.en: Canada country has made new policy for Nigerians that migrated into their land for their own safety.
translation.ibo: Mba Kanada etinyela iwu ọhụrụ maka ndị Naịjirịa batara mba ahụ maka ọsọ ndụ.

translation.en: This new policy has made it difficult for them to travel to Canada, while some Nigerians who ran from US to Canada in search of safety has been supported by lawmakers i n that country.
translation.ibo: Iwu a ga-eme ka ọhịa ahụ ịnweta ohere banye Kanada, mana ụfọdụ ụmụ Naịjịrịa si US gbaba Kanada ọsọ ndụ enwetere nkwado ndị ọkaikpe ụfọdụ na mba ahụ.

translation.en: The lawmakers said that the way government are reacting to Nigerians who migrated into their country in search of peace is nothing to write home about.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọkaikpe a kwuru na agwa gọmenti ala ha na-akpasọ ndị Naịjirịa a gbatara ọsọ ndụ be ha jọgbụrụ ụdele ma sịgbuo nkakwụ.

translation.en: some Nigerians that moved from the boundary of US to Canada for the past 17 months, needs support as refugee.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndị Naịjịrịa si ogige oke ala ndị US piofere kanada n'ihe ruru ọnwa iri na asatọ, bụ ebe ha chọrọ enyemaka ikike dịka ndị gbatara ọsọ ndụ.

translation.en: What gave rise to Canadian Association of Refugee lawyers was as a result of the reactions of a Nigerian woman who ran from their town's female genital mutilation.
translation.ibo: Ihe kpanitere mbuso ndị ọkaikpe a kpọrọ onwe ha Canadian Association of Refugee Lawyers bụ agwa akpasara otu nwaanyị Naiịjrịa chọrọ iji ọsọ agbalahụ ịbe ugwu nwaanyị na be ha.

translation.en: Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) responsible for migrants in Canada said that the woman is not supposed to be issued the permit paper because he should have gone to other states in Nigeria like Ibadan or Port.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ okwu ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ dị n'aka bụ Immigration na Refugee Board (IRB) nke Kanada sị na ya bụ nwaanyị etozughị ịnye akwụkwọ ikike maka na-okwesiri ịgbaga ya bụ ọsọ ndụ na mpaghara ebe ndị ọzọ na Naịjịrịa dịka Ibadan maọbụ Pọtakọtụ.

translation.en: The IRB board have decided that this type of case will be the condition to which cases arising from Nigerian migrants for Refuge from now on wards.
translation.ibo: Ndị otu ikpe mkpegharị IRB kpebiri na ya bụ ikpe bụ ịhe a ga-eji elegara anya na-ikpebị ikpe ndị ọzọ gbasara ndị si Naịjirịa gbata ọsọ ndụ bido ụgbụa gawazịa.

translation.en: IRB members have before handled related issues with other countries like China, India and Pakistan.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ IRB enwebuola ụdị mkpebị a na isi ndị mba China, India nakwa Pakistan.

translation.en: Members of Canadian Association of Refugee lawyers thought that things would be more difficult than before from other countries.
translation.ibo: Ndị otu Canadian Association of Refugee Lawyers na-eche na-iwu a ga-eme ka ihe tawanyega akpụ nye ndị sị Naịjirịa gbata ọsọ ndụ karịa ka ọ dị na mbụ.

translation.ibo: Etu m jiri mụọ ejima anọ'

translation.en: The parents of the Quadruplets narrated how God blessed them with four boys after seven years of marriage.
translation.ibo: Di na Nwunye mụru ejima anọ ekwuola etu Chukwu si nye ha ejima nwoke anọ ka afọ asaa gachara ha jị gbaa akwụkwọ.

translation.en: The family of Peter and Amuche Ejiofor told BBC Igbo what they experienced in the hands of their family and neighbours for being childless over the years.
translation.ibo: Ezinaulo Peter na Amuche Ejiofor agwaala BBC Igbo etu ndị agbata obi ma ndị ulo ha ụfọdụ gbawara ha obi maka amụghị nwa ruo afọ asaa.

translation.en: Mrs Amuche said that her husband's brother's wife abused her verbally in the month of April 2017.
translation.ibo: Odoziaku Amuche kwuru na otu nwunye di ya kọrọ ya ezigbo ọnụ n'ọnwa Eprelu 2017.

translation.en: she became pregnant in the month of April that same year.
translation.ibo: Ọ dị ime n'ọnwa May nke afọ ahụ.

translation.en: They said that God blessed them with four boys at a time.
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru na Chukwu nyere ha ụmụ ejima nwoke anọ n'otu ọmụmụ.

translation.en: They said a special prayer for those in similar situation.
translation.ibo: Ha kpekwara ndị nọ n'ọnọdụ a ekpere puru iche,

translation.en: The Delta Catholic church that collapsed claimed the life of a child.
translation.ibo: Ụlọuka Katọlik daara na Delta akụgbụọla otu nwata

translation.en: A year old child died as some other people were Injured as the building collapsed this morning during the mass service.
translation.ibo: Nwata di afọ nwụru ka ọtụtu mmadu merụrụ ahụ mgbe ụlọụka daara n'ụtụtụ a ka a na-aka ụkọ taa.

translation.en: collapsed house.
translation.ibo: Ụlọ dara ada.

translation.en: An eleven year old child died at St Paul's Catholic Ugolo in okpe village, Delta state collapsed as prayers were going on.
translation.ibo: Otu nwata dị afọ 11 anwụọla oge otu ụlọụka akpọrọ St. Paul Catholic Church, Ugolo dị n'obodo Okpe n'ime Delta steeti dara ebe a na-eme ekpere n'ụtụtụ taa.

translation.en: This accident happened at 9 o'clock in the morning as people were praying in the church.
translation.ibo: Ihe mberede a mere n'elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ a ka ndị mmadụ nọ n'ime ụlọụka ahụ na-ekpe ekpere.

translation.en: We were able to rescue some people as the building collapsed.
translation.ibo: Anyị dọpụtara ụfọdụ mmadụ ebe ụlọ ha dagidere ha- Waziri

translation.en: Six children fell into latrine pit.
translation.ibo: Ụmụaka isii adabala n'ime olulu nsi

translation.en: The state commissioner of police Mohammed Mustapha told BBC Igbo that the church has been built long time ago, the survived victims have been taken to the hospital for treatment.
translation.ibo: Onyeisi ndị uweojii nke steeti ahụ bụ Mohammed Mustapha gwara BBC Igbo na ụlọụka kara ezigbo nka nakwa na ha eburola ndị pụtara na ndụ n'ihe mberede a gawa ụlọọgwụ.

translation.en: He said as it stands now, he cannot explain the reason behind the collapsing of the building but he believed that it might be as a result of being obsolete.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na ugbua ọnaghị enwe ike ikwu ihe mere ụlọ a jiri daa, mana ọ na-eche na ọ bụ maka oteela ha lụrụ ụlọụka a.

translation.en: In his speech, this church is 100 years.
translation.ibo: N'ọnụ okwu ya: 'Ụlọụka a dị afọ 100.

translation.en: It was built during the colonial rule
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ụlọụka a lụrụ oge ndị ọcha na-achị ala anyị.

translation.en: This might be the reason for its collapse but they are still investigating on the accident.
translation.ibo: Ihe a bụ ihe m che mere ka ụlọụka daa mana anyị ka na-eleba anya na mberede a.

translation.en: The Senate president, Bukola Saraki sympathies with the affected victims through the social media today.
translation.ibo: Onyeisi ndị sineti Naijirịa bụ Bukola Saraki etinyela ọnụ zigara ndị ihe mberede metụtara ozi itiakab'obi site n'akara soshal midia ya taa.

translation.en: Also in his remark,he told the Delta state governor, Ifeanyi Okowa and assured him for their support.

translation.en: The southern governors said that the on going work at the Enugu Airport should be taken serious by the government.
translation.ibo: Aka ndị na-achị steeti ndị ọwụwa-anyanwụ Naịjirịa sị na ọrụ ọdọ ụgbọelu enugwu bụ ihe gọọmentị kwesịrị iwe ka ihe dị mkpa.

translation.en: work is still going on at Enugu Airport
translation.ibo: A ka na-arụ ọrụ n'ọdọ ụgbọelu nke Enugwu

translation.en: Nigeria south east governors complained bitterly, the situation of things in the Akanu Ibiam airport Enugu.
translation.ibo: Gọvanọ ndị si mpaghara ọwụwa-anyanwụ Naịjirịa na-akwa arịrị maka ọnọdụ ọdọ ụgbọelu Akanu Ibiam dị n'enugwu nọ na ya ugbua.

translation.en: In the meeting held on the 2nd of September 2018,they thanked the Governor and argued the aircraft minister to do the needful in the state of that airport
translation.ibo: N'ọgbakọ ha mere n'ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba 2018, ha kelere gọọmentị etiti maka itinyebụ ya aka, ma kpọkuo mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ụgbọelu ka ha bịa lee ọdọ ụgbọelu ahụ anya ma mezie ihe ndị e kwesịrị imezi na ya.

translation.en: The chairman of the southern governors , David Umahi who is also the Governor of Ebonyi state spoke to newsmen on the outcome of their meeting
translation.ibo: Onye nọ n'isi oche nzukọ ndị gọvanọ mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ bụ Davịd Umahi, bụkwa aka na-achị Ebonyi steeti, kwuru ihe a mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị ntaakụkọ ihe pụtara na nzukọ a ha mere.

translation.en: Umahi said that it is important to repair that place for importation of goods into that airport
translation.ibo: Umahi sị na ọ dị mkpa ka e mezie ebe a na-anabata ngwaahịa na ya bu ọdọ ụgbọelu.

translation.en: Enugu Airport is one of the international aircraft landing, but is not equipped in terms of the road light,which enable flights landing at night
translation.ibo: Ọdọ ụgbọelu nke Enugwu so na ọdọ ụgbọelu nke ụgbọelu si mba ofesi na-ada, mana o nwebeghi ọtụtụ ihe o kwesiri inwe, dịka ọkụ okporo ya, nke ga-eme ka ụgbọelu daa n'abalị.

translation.en: In 2018 budget, an allocation of 500,000,000 was made for the airport.
translation.ibo: Na bọọjetị nke 2018, a mapụtara nde naịra narị ise maka ọrụ ọdọ ụgbọelu a.

translation.en: The Senate president of Nigeria, senator Ike Ekweremmadu and other senators representing other regions spoke against the allegation by Mohammadu Buhari that the allocated money for Enugu Airport and Benin- ore road among other works in Nigeria as been diverted to somewhere else.
translation.ibo: Cheta na omeiwu Ike Ekweremadu, bụ osote onyeisi ndịomeiwu ukwu Naịjirịa na ndị omeiwu ọzọ si ọwụwa-anyanwụ, tinyere ọnụ n'ebubo onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari boro ndị omeiwu na ha chabiri ego e kwesịrị iji rụọ ọrụ n'akwa Naịja nke abụọ, ọdọ ụgbọelu dị n'Enugwu, ụzọ Benin-Ọre nakwa ọtụtụ ọru ndị ọzọ ga-abara ndị Naịjirịa uru ma were ego tinye n'ebe ọzọ.

translation.en: In his explanation,Ekweremmadu said they had in mind the Enugu Airport among other works that the money was allocated for.
translation.ibo: Na nkọwa ya, Ekweremadu kwuru na uche ya na nke ndịomeiwu si ọwụwa-anyanwụ Naịjirịa dị n'ọdọ ụgbọelu Enugwu so n'ọrụ dị icheiche ndịomeiwu chabiri ego ya.

translation.en: Ekweremmadu said that it was the senate committee that diverted the money ,that the committee involved should Explain how and why it happened.
translation.ibo: Ekweremadu kwuru na ọ bụ na ngalaba omeiwu a na-akpọ 'committee' n'asụsụ Bekee ka nchabi a mere, ma kwuo na ndị Kọmiti o metụtara gaha agwa ọha ihe mere na etu o siri mee.

translation.en: forbidden acts for Igbo women
translation.ibo: Ihe Igbo sọrọ nwaanyị ime

translation.en: There is no gender equality in Igbo land as a result of this, there are do's and done's for women
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị na nwoke ahaghị nhatanha n'ala Igbo nke mere ka e nwee ihe ndị iwu machiri nwaanyị ime.

translation.en: men gives kola to their fellow man.
translation.ibo: Nwoke na-eche ibe ya ọjị

translation.en: In Igbo tradition, man and woman are not equal
translation.ibo: N'omenaala Igbo, nwoke na nwaanyị ahaghị aha n'anya.

translation.en: There are disparities in given out work to man and woman
translation.ibo: A na-agbado ụkwụ ma mmadụ abụ nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị n'ike ọrụ maọbụ oke dịrị onye.

translation.en: All you need to know about the king's crown in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Ihe ị kwesiri ịma maka okpueze ala Igbo

translation.en: Seven qualities an Igbo man looks for in a woman he intends to marry
translation.ibo: Ihe asaa nwoke Igbo chọrọ na nwaanyị ọ ga-alụ

translation.en: The qualities a woman wants in a man she intends to in this modern period.
translation.ibo: Ihe iri agboghọ ugbua chọrọ na nwoke ga-alụ ya

translation.en: Can a man bear the surname of the woman she married in Igbo land?
translation.ibo: Nwoke a ga-azanwu aha nna nwunye ya n'ala Igbo?

translation.en: Any man despite his age, rank and possession in line with the tradition still remains the head
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwoke n'agbanyeghị ma ha abụ nwata, karịrị nwaanyị n'ọkwa na ngụkọ dịka omenaala Igbo si dịrị.

translation.en: That is more reason a woman has her limit when it comes to work and anything done beyond those limits it is considered an 'abomination'
translation.ibo: Ya mere, o nwere ọrụ maọbụ ohere a mabidoro na nwaanyị enweghị ikike ya nke bụ na nwaanyị nupuru isi n'ihe ndị a 'mere arụ'.

translation.en: Things that are not performed by women
translation.ibo: Lee ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị nwaanyị anaghị eme:

translation.en: women do not climb or tap palm wine
translation.ibo: 1.Nwaanyị anaghị arị maọbụ ete nkwụ

translation.en: women do not climb a palm tree in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị arị nkwụ n'ala Igbo

translation.en: In Igbo land, women don't climb a palm tree, kola tree or Orjii
translation.ibo: N'ala Igbo, nwaanyị anaghị arị elu nkwụ, elu ọjị maọbụ ọjịị.

translation.en: Ngawuchi said that women do not climb a palm tree because they are considered as weaker vessel
translation.ibo: Ngawuchu kwuru na nwaanyị anaghị arị nkwụ n'ihi na nwaanyị esighị ike.

translation.en: She might climb the tree, saw a snake which out of fear will fall from the tree
translation.ibo: O nwere ike rịa elu nkwụ, hụ agwọ, egwu ejide ya, ọ daa n'elu.

translation.en: Chigozie Nnabuihe, a professor in Igbo language of University of Lagos said that it is to protect the dignity of womanhood
translation.ibo: N'okwu ọkammụta asụsụ Igbo na Mahadum Legọs (University of Lagos) bụ Chigozie Nnabuihe, ọ bụ iji chekwa ugwu nwaanyị.

translation.en: Nnabuihe said that in the olden days, women do not put on trousers and if they climbs a tree, anybody under the tree will see her nakedness
translation.ibo: Nnabuihe kọwara na oge gboo, nwaanyị anaghị eyi akwa na-awachi ahụ nwaanyị nke mere na ọ rịa elu, onye nọ n'ala ga-ahụ ọtọ ya.

translation.en: Women are not given landed property
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị eketa ala obi

translation.en: A woman can only be given a land to farm on but has no power to sell or give it away.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị nwere ike inweta ebe ịkọ ubi mana ọ gaghị enwe ikike ire ya maọbụ nye onye ọzọ

translation.en: In Igbo, women are not given landed property
translation.ibo: N'ala Igbo, nwaanyị anaghị eketa ala obi.

translation.en: In the Igbo belief, according to an elderly man chukwudi Nganwuchu,explained that a woman has access only in the husband's place.
translation.ibo: Nkwenye Ndigbo dịka otu okenye, Chukwudi Nganwuchu, siri kọwa bụ na nwaanyị nwere oke naanị na be di ya.

translation.en: Truly, a woman cannot have an access in the husband place if she did not give birth to a son,
translation.ibo: Mana n'ezie, nwaanyị anaghị enweta oke na be di ya ma ọ bụrụ na ọ mụtaghị nwa nwoke.

translation.en: she can only be given a farmland to cultivate but has no right to sell or give the land away.
translation.ibo: O nwere ike e nye nwaanyị ebe ịkọ ọrụụgbo mana ọ bụghị nke ya n'ezie n'ihi na onweghị ikike ire ya maọbụ inye ya onye ọzọ.

translation.en: A woman neither lead men nor go to war
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị edu ụmụnwoke, ọ naghị aga agha

translation.en: It is only men that go to war in Igbo land
translation.ibo: Nwoke ka ọ dịrị iga agha n'ala Igbo

translation.en: Woman cannot be a leader in men's meeting or war.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị edu ụmụnwoke n'ọgbakọ maọbụ n'agha.

translation.en: In his explanation, prof Nnabuihe said 'it Is a man's duty to protect his family'
translation.ibo: Na nkọwa ya, Ọkammụta Nnabuhe sị 'O bụ nwoke ka ọ dịrị ichekwa ezinaụlọ ya.

translation.en: It is also men's responsibility to protect the community
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ụmụnwoke ka ọ dịrị ichekwa obodo.'

translation.en: A woman cannot break kola nut.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị awa ọjị

translation.en: A woman cannot break kola nut where there is a man.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị awa ọjị ebe nwoke nọ.

translation.en: An elderly woman can only break the kola nut if it is only the gathering of women.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ naanị oge ụmụnwaanyị gbakọrọ naanị ha ka onye kachasị okenye n'ime ha nwere ike ịwa ọjị mana ọgaghị agọ ya agọ.

translation.en: like Nnabuihe have said, women do not break kola nut because, kola nut I'd believed to be sacred which at times a woman may be in her monthly flow which can defile the sacredness of the kola nut.
translation.ibo: Dịka Nnabuihe kwuru, ihe kpatara na nwaanyị anaghị agọ ọjị bụ na ọjị bụ ihe dị nsọ, nwaanyị nwere oge ọ na-anọ na nso; ọ ga-emerụ ọjị.

translation.en: A woman cannot give out her daughter's hand in marriage.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị ekenye nwa di

translation.en: A woman is not allowed to be in a place were another woman's bride price is been bargained even if the husband is dead.
translation.ibo: Nwanyị anaghị anọ ebe a na-ekwu akụ nwaanyị ọ masị ya, ya bụrụ na di ya anwụọla.

translation.en: Nnabuihe said-this shows that its not animal that they came to buy but human being that came to marry.
translation.ibo: Nnabụihe sị 'Ọ bụ iji gosi na ọbụghị anụmanụ ka a na-azụ, ọ bụ mmadụ ka a na-alụrụ.

translation.en: It is only an animal that staying where buyers are bargaining price.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ anụmanụ na-anọ ebe a na-ekwe ya ọnụ.'

translation.en: A woman do not eat the gizzard of a chicchicken.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị ata eke ọkụkụ

translation.en: According to tradition, women don't eat the gizzard of a chicken.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị ekwesighị iri eke ọkụkọ dịka omenaala Igbo siri dị

translation.en: Elder Chukwudi Nganwuchi,told BBC Igbo the reason a women don't eat the gizzard of a chicken in the olden days, that it is believed that since gizzard tastes sweet that any' woman that takes it will become promiscuous.'
translation.ibo: Otu okenye aha ya bụ Chukwudi Nganwuchu gwara BBC Igbo na ihe mere ndị gboo jiri machie nwaanyị ịta eke ọkụkọ bụ na e nwere nkwenye na eke ọkụkọ na-atọ ụtọ ebe ọ dị ukwu nke na 'nwaanyị tara ya ga-ebido gbawa n'ezi.'

translation.en: Nnabuihe said 'gizzard is meant for a man.'
translation.ibo: Nnabuihe kwuru sị, 'Eke ọkụkọ bụ nke nwoke.

translation.en: The anus is also for him, the head is for his first son.
translation.ibo: Akpụrụotule bụ nke ya, isi ya nke diọkpara.

translation.en: Then the waist or pelvic is for the first daughter.
translation.ibo: Ada nwe ukwu ya.

translation.en: The jaw is for the first daughter too.
translation.ibo: agba dịkwara ada.'

translation.en: A woman in her mensuration period do not prepare food for a titled man in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị nọ na nsọ anaghị esiri onye chiri echichi n'ala Igbo, nri.

translation.en: Even when the husband is a titled man as well, he will not eat her food during this period.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụrụgodu na di ya bụ onye chiri ọzọ, ọ gaghị eri nri nwaanyị ma ọ nọrọ na nsọ.

translation.en: Nnabuihe said 'A titled man is sacred'
translation.ibo: Nnabụihe sị, 'Onye chiri echichi bụ onye dị nsọ.

translation.en: If he eats the food prepared by a woman in her Monthly flow ,he will be defiled.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụrụ na o rie nri nwaanyị nọ na nsọ o merụọ nsọ ya.'

translation.en: A woman cannot marry a man.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị alụ nwoke

translation.en: A woman cannot marry a man just like men do.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị enweghị ike lụọ nwoke etu nwoke si aga alụ nwaanyị.

translation.en: In salutation, a woman do not give a handshake.
translation.ibo: N'ekele, nwaanyị anaghị eri aka atọ

translation.en: In greeting, a woman do not take a handshake.
translation.ibo: N'ekele, nwaanyị anaghị ana aka

translation.en: A woman cannot shakehands nor say 'Igbo kwenu', Ndigbo mmammanu oo' as a form of greeting or salutation.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị eri aka atọ maọbụ kwuo 'Igbo kwenu', 'Ndigbo mmammanụ o'.

translation.en: A woman can say, 'my husband's I great your ooo'
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị nwere ike ikwu, Ndị di m ekele m ụnụ o!'

translation.en: It is not all men that receives a handshake.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụghị nwoke niile na-ana aka atọ.

translation.en: Even if the women has acquired all the title, she can never receive not even one, two or three handshakes.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ nwaanyị chie elu chie ala, onweghị ike ana aka atọ, abụọ maọbụ otu.

translation.en: women don't drink the last drop of palm wine
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị aṅụ ike nkwụ

translation.en: The answer given by president Muhammadu Buhari spokesman, Garuba Shehu was that obasanjo is sick and needs to visit a doctor.
translation.ibo: N'ọsịsa ya, ọnụ na-ekwuru onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari bụ Garuba Shehu kwuru na ahụ adịghị Obasanjo na o kwesịrị ị ga-ahụ dọkịta.

translation.en: He also said that its jealousy that is disturbing Obasanjo.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na ọ bụ anyaọkụ na-enye Obasanjo nsogbu.

translation.en: Mohammadu Buhari: Obasanjo's anger is because Buhari did not give room for money smuggling.
translation.ibo: Muhammadu Buhari: Iwe Obasanjo bụ na Buhari gbochiri ebe e si ebupụsị ego

translation.en: Joe Igbokwe, APC representative in Lagos state said that it is old age that made Obasanjo to condemn Buhari.
translation.ibo: Joe Igbokwe, ọnụ na-ekwuru otu APC na Legos steeti kwuru na ọ bụ nka na-enye Obasanjo nsogbu mere o ji katọọ Buhari.

translation.en: Joe igbokwe, an APC representative in Lagos state have reacted to the words of Olusegun Obasanjo concerning Mohammadu Buhari.
translation.ibo: Joe Igbokwe,ọnụ na-ekwuru otu APC na Legos steeti asaala Olusegun Obasanjo okwu o kwuru maka Muhammadu Buhari.

translation.en: Igbo said that it was Buhari's closing of money smuggling out of the country that is keeping Obasanjo back.
translation.ibo: Igbo kwuru na ọ bụ iwe na Buhari gbochiri ebe e si ebupụsị ego ji Obasanjo.

translation.en: In a resent dialogue between BBC and Obasanjo, He condemned Buhari of not been physically fit, not knowledgeable enough to work
translation.ibo: Na mkparịtaụka BBC na Obasanjo nwere na nsonso, o kwuru na Buhari amaghị ọrụ ma ncha, na ọ na-akpa oke nakwa na o nweghị ahụ ike nke elu ahụ nakwa nke uche.

translation.en: But Joe igbokwe said that those words are 'useless' because the things he was unable to do for the past eight years in government that Buhari did whom he said was not fit completed the work within two years of leadership.
translation.ibo: Mana Joe Igbokwe kwuru na okwu ahụ bụ 'okwu nkọgheri' n'ihi na ' ihe Obasanjo arụnwughị n'afọ asatọ ọ nọrọ na ọchịchị na Buhari, onye o kwuru na ahụ adịghị rụrụ ya n' afọ abụọ.

translation.en: modern women: indecent dressing and other things that our mother did not do during their time.
translation.ibo: Modern woman: Iyi mbenukwu na ihe ndị ọzọ ha na-eme ọtụtụ nne anyị emeghi

translation.en: There are things that our women did not do in the olden days but our modern women are comfortably doing it.
translation.ibo: E nwere ihe ụmụnwaanyị mgbe ochie agaghị aka obi mee ma ụmụnwaanyị agba ọhụrụ na-eme ha ma kwudosie ike na ha.

translation.en: women pounds in mortar
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị na-asụ n'odo.

translation.en: women wear and pounds mortar.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị yi chebiriọdụ

translation.en: A lot of things that are done in the past,but we are no longer doing them, likewise things that have not been done before, we are now doing them
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ihe anyị na-emebu na mbụ, anyi adịghịzị eme ha, ụfọdụ ihe anyi adịghị emebu, anyi na-emezi.

translation.en: change is constant in life
translation.ibo: Ụwa na-eme mgbanwe kwa mgbe.

translation.en: 5 things Igbo women can do, but people from Saudi Arabia cannot even think of doing.
translation.ibo: Ihe 5 ụmụnwaanyị Igbo na-eme ndị Saudi Arabia anaghị emenwu

translation.en: How you will look beautiful with small amount of money.
translation.ibo: Etu ị ga-esi jiri obere ego na-egbuke egbuke

translation.en: women have modernized the traditional hair style.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị ewechighala isiowu n'ụdị ọhụrụ

translation.en: They did not run away from this trend
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị agbanahụghị mgbanwe nke a.

translation.en: There are things that women did effortlessly but now, they are doing them as it pleased them.
translation.ibo: O nwere ụfọdụ ihe ụmụnwaanyị mebukwara ma ha akwụsịghị ike na ya, ma ugbua, ha na-eme ihe ndị ahụ ka ha siri chọ.

translation.en: Look clearly to see what we outlined in this writing.
translation.ibo: Ilezie anya nke ọma, ị ga ebido chọputawa ụfọdụ ihe anyị ga-edepụta n'okpuru edemede a.

translation.en: They market their goods online
translation.ibo: Ọ na-azụ ahịa n'ịntanet

translation.en: No woman wished to stand under the sun buying things in the market, they buy clothes and foodstuffs through the Internet.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ụmụnwaanyị adịghịzị aga ahịa ịzụta akwa maọbụ ihe nri maka onyekwanụ chọrọ ịkwụ n'anwụ ebe ihe niile dịzị na ịnternet?

translation.en: She seats at home dial her phone or computer and everything she demanded will be at her doorstep.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụkwa ọ setịpụ ụkwụ n'ụlọ ya, ọ pịa kọmputa maọbụ ekwentị, e wetere ya ihe niile ọ chọrọ ebe ọbụla ọ nọ.

translation.en: she exhibit all manner of character
translation.ibo: Ọ na-eyi agwa ntutu na-apụ ọkụ

translation.en: Before women used to plait different style of hair which is normally black in colour.
translation.ibo: N'oge mbụ, ụmụnwaanyị na-eke isi dị iche iche, kama na ọ na-abụkarị isi ojii

translation.en: They now plait different colour of hair, from red to green without been bothered.
translation.ibo: Mana ugbua, ha na-anwale ụdị agwa sọrọ ha, site na isi na-acha ọbara ọbara ruo na nke na-acha edo edo, ha achọghị ịma.

translation.en: They party as they want
translation.ibo: Ha na-eme oriri na nkwari ka o si dị ha mma

translation.en: Gone are the days when a woman sits at home and her husband goes out to enjoy himself alone.
translation.ibo: Oge agaala mgbe nwaanyị ga-anọ n'ụlọ, nwoke apụo inwete onwe ya naanị ya.

translation.en: Now women takes they friends out to happening places and as well enjoy herself.
translation.ibo: Ugbua, ụmụnwanyị na-akpọrọ ndị enyi ha puo ebe ọ na-akpọtụ, na-enwe anụrị.

translation.en: She cannot tie wrapper but puts on light cloths at home.
translation.ibo: Ọ naghị ama akwa, ọ na-eyi chebiriọdụ anọ n'ulọ

translation.en: we stopped the tying of wrapper, long time ago
translation.ibo: Anyi ahapụla ima akwa na '19 kporogodom'

translation.en: Time of tying wrapper at home has passed.
translation.ibo: Oge ima akwa n'obi nọrọ n'ụlọ agafeela.

translation.en: presently, women are now putting on different clothing.
translation.ibo: Ugbua ụmụnwaanyị na-eyi chebiriọdụ dị iche iche.

translation.en: As soon as your putting on what we call' bum short', that when we know you have belonged.
translation.ibo: I yitekwaraala ihe ndị Bekee kpọrọ 'bum short', anyi amara n'iso na ihe a na-eme.

translation.en: There is time for social media
translation.ibo: Ọ na-ewepụta oge eji eme soshal media

translation.en: Technovation has made it so easy for people in the world to be communicating
translation.ibo: Teknụzụ emeela na onye ọbụla nọ n'ụwa nwere ike ijikọ

translation.en: A modern woman after dressing up,will snap her self and post it at the social media.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị agba ọhụrụ ga-akwado, n'eti ka ọnwa, see onwe ya foto, tinye ya n'akara soshal midia ya.

translation.en: There is no time
translation.ibo: Oge adighi.

translation.en: She makeup the way she wants.
translation.ibo: Ọ na-ete ntecha etu o siri masị ya

translation.en: women usually makeup in the olden days but today there different character.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị dịbu na mbu ete ntecha, kama ugbua, e nwezịrị agwa dị iche iche

translation.en: The English people have changed everything, making up is what you learn before doing them.
translation.ibo: Ndị bekee agbanweela ntecha, ya bụ na ọ bụzị ihe a na-amụ amụ tupu emebe.

translation.en: English people don't play with 'make-up ',
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị agba ọhụrụ ejighị ihe Bekee kpọrọ 'makeup' egwu egwu.

translation.en: They wants to look good always.
translation.ibo: Ha chọrọ ịdị ka a chọrọ oge niile.

translation.en: She is independent
translation.ibo: O nwere onwe ya

translation.en: Women used to work but have a particular type of work they do.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị na-arụbụ ọrụ na mbụ, mana o nwere ụfọdụ ọrụ ha anaghị arụ.

translation.en: modern woman believed that what a man can do, that a woman can do even more better.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị agba ọhụrụ kwetara na ihe nwoke ga-emeli, nwaanyị ga-emelikwa ya karịa.

translation.en: That means she can do any type of work, have her own income and take care of her family.
translation.ibo: Ya bụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ ọbụla masịrị ya, nwee ego nke ya o ji eledo onwe ya na ezinụlọ ya anya.

translation.en: interesting news
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: Buhari's government: Abominations and accusations- Saraki.
translation.ibo: Buhari nọ n'isi gọọmentị mpụ na nrụrụaka - Saraki

translation.en: Those that mean, there is no provision for Igbos.
translation.ibo: Ọ pụtara na enweghi ihe e mere mekaa ndị Igbo?

translation.en: ASSU strike: when will it end.
translation.ibo: ASUU strike: Kedụ mgbe ọ ga-ebi?

translation.en: Wole soyinka: I will not vote for APC or PDP.
translation.ibo: Wole Soyinka: Agaghị m atụnyere APC maọbụ PDP

translation.en: A well known author, Sole Soyinka said that the government of Nigerian president should take a new dimension.
translation.ibo: Onye na-ede akwụkwọ a mara amara bụ Wole Soyinka ekwuola na o kwesiri ka onye ọhụrụ ga-abịa weta nzọkwụ ọhụrụ weghara ọchịchị Naijiria.

translation.en: Important news
translation.ibo: Akụkọ dị mkpa:

translation.en: Wole Soyinka have rejected Buhari and Atiku.
translation.ibo: Wole Soyinka ajụla Buhari, jụ Atiku

translation.en: A well known writer Sole Soyinka have condemned Buhari and Atiku as candidates for 2019 presidential election.
translation.ibo: Onye na-ede akwụkwọ a mara amara bụ Wole Soyinka ajụla Buhari na Atiku maka ọkwa onyeisiala na na ntuliaka 2019.

translation.en: Soyinka said this in a forum that took place in Lagos known as ' citizen forum ' on Tuesday that Nigerians wants new blood.
translation.ibo: Soyinka, onye kwuru nke a n'ọgbakọ e 'Citizen forum' emere na Legọs ụbọchị Tọọzde sị na Naijiria chọrọ ọbara ọhụrụ.

translation.en: It is better to grant amnesty than waiting for trial in court - Judges
translation.ibo: Ọ ka mma inye amnesty' karịa ị na-egbu oge n'ụlọikpe' - Ndị ọkaiwu

translation.en: Time for visionary change
translation.ibo: Oge ụzọ ọhụrụ were anya eruola.

translation.en: A time to support our representative
translation.ibo: Oge onye ahụ pụtara anyị ga-enye ya nkwado.

translation.en: For the avoidance of doubt, let me make my stand clear to everyone: I, Wole Soyinka can never vote for this two contesting parties.
translation.ibo: Adịghị ama ama, ka m gwa ụnụ ebe m kwụ ka odo onye ọbụla anya: Mụ bụ Wole Soyinka agaghị atụnyere pati abụọ ahụ na-azọ.

translation.en: They should be condemned completely.
translation.ibo: Ha abụọ kwesịrị ka a jụ ha kpamkpam.

translation.en: Transparency international: soldiers will be in Abia state election.
translation.ibo: Transparency International: A ga-ekpoju ndịagha na ntuliaka na-abịa

translation.en: Nigeria soldiers were present at the last gubernatorial election done in osun state.
translation.ibo: Ndị agha Naịjirịa juru oge e mere ntuliaka gọvanọ n'Osun steeti

translation.en: Electoral commission said that the election that was conducted at Ekiti and Osun state in the year 2018,and the words of Onnoghen shows that the 2019 election will be with the help of soldiers.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọkachamara n'okwu ikike diri onye ekwuola na ntuliaka e mere n'Ekiti na Osun steeti n'afọ 2018 nakwa okwu Onnoghen na-arụ aka na a ga-eji Ndiagha mee ntuliaka 2019.

translation.en: Transparency international said they are afraid of the soldiers that are coming for the election.
translation.ibo: Otu Transparency International kwuru ụbọchị Tọọzde na obi na-eti ha na a ga-ekpoju ndịagha na ntuliaka na-abịa.

translation.en: They said they are frightened by the way and manner that politicians haunted for votes in 2018 election.
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru na ntuliaka emerela n'afọ 2018 nakwa ike ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchi ji achụ ka atụnyere ha butere obi otiti ahụ.

translation.en: Senator Ifeanyi ulumma - told BBC that with the situation of things in the country, people are bound to fear since soldiers will be involved in the coming election.
translation.ibo: Na nkọwa ya otu onye na-alụ ọgụ maka ikike dịrị onye bụ Ọkaiwu Ifeanyịi Ulumma gwara BBC na ihe ụfọdụ na-eme na Naijiria ugbua ezuorola ndị mmadụ ịtụ uche na a ga-eji ndị agha mee ntuliaka na-abịa.

translation.en: considering what happened at Osun and Ekiti, people are still afraid.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ihe mere na Osun na Ekiti mere egwu ba ndị mmadụ ahụ na-aga egbojupụta ndịagha.

translation.en: Ulumma went further to say in line with Onnoghen's words that Mohammadu Buhari who is contesting for the election as a soldier can bring about fear in the people
translation.ibo: Ulumma gara n'ihu kwuo na okwu Onnoghen nakwa na onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari bụ ọchịagha sokwa azọ ọkwa ọchịchị soro bute egwu ahụ.

translation.en: People will be afraid of come out and cast their vote,this will be one of the disadvantage of involving soldiers in the election day.
translation.ibo: O kọwara na ọghọm dị n'ikpoju ndị agha na oge ntuliaka bụ na ọ ga-eme ka egwu tụọ ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ mee ka ha ghara ịpụta mee ntuliaka.

translation.en: As it was conducted in the outside country, they should allow police men to make sure in making peace and order during the election process.
translation.ibo: Ulumma kwuru na dịka e si eme ya n'ofesi, ihe kwesiri bụ naanị ka ndị uweojii soro hụ na udo dị, na enweghị ọgbaghara.

translation.en: The APC party chairman's vehicle that was stolen has been found.
translation.ibo: A hụla ụgbọala onyeisioche otu pati APC Abia steeti ahụ a tọọrọ

translation.en: Abia state police men said they have found the stolen vehicle of Donatus Nwamkpa, an APC party chairman.
translation.ibo: Ndị uweojii na steeti Abịa ekwuola na ha enwetala ụgbọala Donatus Nwamkpa bụ onyeisioche otu pati APC na steeti ahụ a tọọrọ atọrọ.

translation.en: The police representative Geoffrey Ogbonna explained that they found the stolen vehicle at osisioma road leading to Ibeku.
translation.ibo: Ọnu na-ekwuru ndị uweojii na steeti ahụ bụ Geoffery Ogbonna kọwara na ha hụrụ ụgbọala a n'okporo ụzọ si Osisioma gaa Ibeku.

translation.en: Oshoala has joined the Barcelona football team.
translation.ibo: Oshoala abanyela otu egwu bọọlụ Barcelona

translation.en: A female football player, Asisat Oshola have joined the Barcelona football team.
translation.ibo: Ọkaibe na bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị bụ Asisat Oshola eferela otu egwu bọọlụ Barcelona.

translation.en: Spain football team has been selected.
translation.ibo: Ọ hapụru otu egwu bọọlụ ndị mba Spen.

translation.en: Abubakar Kamara have gone to Yeni malatyaspor
translation.ibo: Abubakar Kamara agaala Yeni Malatyaspor

translation.en: In the otherhand,Fulham team gave Yeni malataspor their player, Aboubaka kamara till the time ended.
translation.ibo: N'aka nke ọzọ, otu Fulham ebinyela otu egwu bọọlụ Yeni Malatyaspor onye egwu ha bụ Aboubakar Kamara rue ọgwụgwụ oge a.

translation.en: Atiku Abubakar will forgive those that stole Nigerian money

translation.en: Haruna said the accident happened by 8pm yesterday, being the 8th of February at Amwbia round about in Awka.
translation.ibo: Haruna kwuru na ihe mberede a n'elekere asatọ n'ụma nke abalị Februwarị asatọ n'okiri okiri Amawbia dị n'Awka.

translation.en: Nigeria Election 2019: Election will hold in Anambra according to Innec
translation.ibo: Nigeria Election 2019:: Ntuliaka ga-aga n'Anambara dịka e siri hiwe ya - Inec

translation.en: This is the 3rd time this week that we have experienced fire outbreak in Anambra INEC office.
translation.ibo: Ọkụ a gbara n'ụlọọrụ INEC Anambra emeela ya nke atọ n’otu izu.

translation.en: Fire out break
translation.ibo: Ókú gbara

translation.en: lnec said even after the fire outbreak in their office at Anambra state,election must be done as supposed.
translation.ibo: Inec ekwuola na agbanyeghị ọkụ gbara ụlọrụ ha na Anamara steeti, ntulliaka ga-aga dịka e siri kwado ya na steeti ahụ.

translation.en: there was a fire out break in INEC office at Awka Anambra state on Tuesday, whose source is yet to be known.
translation.ibo: Ọkụ amaghị ebe osi gbapịala ụlọọrụ Inec dị n'Ọka, Anambara Steeti ụbọchị Tuzde.

translation.en: Fire burnt the electoral office at Plateau state.
translation.ibo: Ọkụ agbaala ụlọ ntuliaka na Plateau steeti

translation.en: In the written note of INEC, approved by the commissioner of Information, Festus Okoye on the after effect of the fire outbreak, it was discovered that their equipment 'card reader' which has a total number of four thousand, six hundred and ninety six were destroyed by the fire.
translation.ibo: Dika ozi Inec wepụta nke Onye Kọmịshọna ha na-ahụ maka mgbasaozi bụ Festus Okoye binyere aka kwuru, otụtụ ngwaọrụ ha nke gụnyere 'Card Reader' dị pụkụ anọ, narị isii na iri itoolu na ise so na ihe ọkụ ahụ repịara.

translation.en: Though the incident caused delay in the preparation for the election in Anambra state but our office tried in providing the ' the card reader' used in Anambra state and any other state.
translation.ibo: N'agbanyeghị ndọghachi azụ ọdachie wetara na nknjikere anyị maka ntuliaka n'Anambara steeti, ụlọọrụ anyị gbalịrị nweta 'card reader' ndị etinyeghị nọ ọrụ na steeti ndị ọzọ a ga-eziga Anambara.

translation.en: It assured us that election must be conducted in Anambra state
translation.ibo: Nke a nyere anyị ọkịka obi na ntuliaka ga-aga n'Anambara dịka e siri kwado ya.

translation.en: speaking about the incident. Okoye said that this has made it , the 3rd time the incident has occurred within the twelve days it happened at their office in Isiala Ngwa. Abia state and the Qua'an pan local government of plateau state.
translation.ibo: Okoye kọwara na ọdachi nke Anambara bụ nke atọ ya n'ime abali iri na abụọ dịka ọkụ gbara ụlọọrụ ha dị na Isiala Ngwa, Abia steeti nakwa Opuru ọchịchị Qua'an Pan dị na Platu steeti.

translation.en: He went further to say that they have reported to the police and the state fire services for more investigation.
translation.ibo: Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na ha ewegarala ndị uweojii na ụlọọrụ na-agbanyụ ọkụ ozi, ndị maliterela nyocha.

translation.en: Football match is not taken serious in Africa, as it is done in Europe just like the explanation given by Oshoala that he was amazed and speechless
translation.ibo: Egwuregwu bọọlụ n'Afịrịka anaghị ewu ewu etu o si ewu na mba Europe dịka Oshoala si kọwa ma na-ekwusi ike na o nyeghị ọnụ.

translation.en: In Africa parents do not want their children to play football
translation.ibo: N'Afịrịka, ọtụtụ nne na nna achọghị ka nwa ha gbaa bọọlụ.

translation.en: They prefer them to go to school.
translation.ibo: Ha chọrọ ka ha gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ

translation.en: Francisca Ordega, a 25 years old Shanghai Shengli player, said that Nigeria did not follow in the world cup but if it were to be played by men, it would have been a different thing.
translation.ibo: Francisca Ordega dị afọ iri abụọ na ise n'agbara Shanghai Shengli kwuru na ndị Naịjịrịa anaghị esete iko mbaụwa a mana ọ bụrụ nke ụmụnwoke ihe dị iche ga-adị.

translation.en: People around me said that I will not get married to a man because I am a working class lady.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndị gbara m okiri na-ekwu na agaghị m alụ dị makana m na-arụ ọrụ.

translation.en: I insisted in doing that which I derive Joy in doing .
translation.ibo: Agbara m isi akwara na-eme ihe na-enye m obi aṅụrị.

translation.en: Today I have defeated them
translation.ibo: Taa emerie m ha

translation.en: These teachers refusal to work was as a result of their 9th month payment that has not been paid even after extra three months has been added without payment of salary
translation.ibo: Ndị nkuzi ahụ na-agba abụbụ ọrụ maka ọgwọ ọnwa itoolu eji ha kemgbe izuụka abụọ.

translation.en: Students learn on their own
translation.ibo: Ụmụakwụkwọ na-akuzi onwe ha

translation.en: Primary and secondary school teachers that went on strike as a result of outstanding salary payment has been called back to work.
translation.ibo: Ndị nkuzi ụlọakwụkwọ Praịmarị na Sekọndịrị nke Abia Steeti gbara abụbụọrụ n'ihi akwụghị ụgwọ ọnwa ga-alachi ọrụ.

translation.en: The primary school teachers went on strike as a result of not been paid the ' Teacher salary subsidy' while the secondary school teachers strike was as a result of their outstanding Ten months salary
translation.ibo: Ndị nkuzi praịmarị sị ka akwụghị ha ụgwọ a kpọrọ 'Teacher Salary Subsidy' ebe ndị nke sekọndịrị na-achọ ụgwọ ọnwa iri e ji ha n'ụgwọ.

translation.en: One of the school's supervisor with name withheld told BBC Igbo that they are still deliberating on the issue.
translation.ibo: Otu onye ngalaba n'ahu maka ndi nkuzi na steeti ahụ achọghị ka ekwu aha ya gwara BBC Igbo na ha nọ nzukọ maka ọnọdụ a.

translation.en: Ememanka Onyebuchi did not answer the call of BBC, Abia state secretary.
translation.ibo: Ekwentị Ode Akwụkwọ Mgbasaozi Abịa steeti bụ Onyebuchi Ememanka agaghị mgbe BBC Igbo kpọrọ ya.

translation.en: More news
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ka na-abịa.

translation.en: Mohammed morsi, the former president of Egypt died as he collapsed in the court
translation.ibo: Mohamed Morsi: aka chịbụrụ Egypt anwụọla ka ọ dara n'ụlọikpe

translation.en: Mohammed morsi was an impeached president of Egypt died as he went to Cairo to defend himself.
translation.ibo: Mohamed Morsi bụ onye ndị agha chụtụru n'ọkwa dịka onyeisiala mba Egypt anwụọla ka ọ gara ịzara ọnụ ya n'ụlọikpe na Cairo.

translation.en: Mohammed morsi in 2012
translation.ibo: Mohammed Morsi in 2012

translation.en: He was impeached in 2013
translation.ibo: Ndị agha chụtụrụ Morsi n'ọkwa n'afọ 2013

translation.en: The news getting to us now is that Mohammed morsi was the former president of Egypt who died in a law court at Cairo the capital of the country, as was narrated by the securities in the court.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ na-eru anyị ntị ugbua na-ekwu na sị na Mohammed Morsi bụbụ aka na'achị mba Ijipt nara mụọ n'ụlọikpe na Kaịro bụ isi obodo mba ahụ ka ọ gara ụlọikpe dịka ndị ọrụ nchekwa n'ikpe siri kwuo.

translation.en: one of the worker in the court said ' He was still talking to the court when he slumped '
translation.ibo: otu onye na-arụ ọrọ n'ụlọ ikpe sị: 'Ọ na-agwa ọkaikpe okwu tupu ọ daa.

translation.en: He was rushed to the hospital where he died'
translation.ibo: E buru ya gawa ụlọ ọgwụ bụ ebe ọ nọ nwụọ,'

translation.en: Abdel Fattah Al-sisi has become the chairman of African Union.
translation.ibo: Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi abụrụla onyeisioche African Union

translation.en: Morsi is the first Democratic president.
translation.ibo: Morsi bụ onye mbụ ritere ọchịchị n'ọnọdụ onye kwuo uche ya.

translation.en: He ruled for a year before he was impeached for conflict in the country
translation.ibo: Ọ nọrọ otu afọ n'ọkwa tupu ndị agha chutuo ya n'afọ 2013 ka ọgbaghara dara na mba ahụ.

translation.en: Morsi has been in prison on behalf of the people that died during the conflict.
translation.ibo: Morsi nọ mkpọrọ kemgbe a mara ya ikpe maka ndị nwụrụ n'ọgbaghara eji wepụ ya n'ọkwa.

translation.en: The government of Egypt treated harshly his supporters and those that took him into the government ' Muslim Brotherhood '
translation.ibo: Gọọmentị Ijipt ji aka ike sowe ndị na-akwado Morsi nakwa ndị otu Alakọba akpọrọ 'Muslim Brotherhood', bụ ndị o si n'okpuru ha nwete ọchịchị.

translation.en: The case of morsi before his death was that he was involved in the exposing of Hama's Nkle Palestine that happened in Egypt
translation.ibo: Ikpe a na-ekpe Morsi tupu ọ nwụọ bụ nke metụtara ebubo na aka ya dị n'ime ịgba ama a sị otu Hamas nkle Palestine mere n'Ijipt.

translation.en: Who is morsi?
translation.ibo: Onye bụ Morsi?

translation.en: morsi was born in El-Adwah at 'Nile Delta' of sharqiya in the year 1951.
translation.ibo: A mụrụ Morsi na obodo El-Adwah dị na Mpahra 'Nile Delta' nke Sharqiya n'afọ 1951.

translation.en: He studied his university education at Cairo before he went to America for his professorships
translation.ibo: Ọ gụrụ Nka na Mahadụm Kaịro tupu ọ ga mba Amerịka ga gụọ ọkamụta.

translation.en: A Muslim Britherhood chosed him to contest for election as a presidential candidate in the year 2012 as they forced their candidate to stepdown.
translation.ibo: Otu Muslim Britherhood hopụtara ya ka ọzọ ọchịchi dịka onyeisiala n'afọ 2012 ka a manyere onye ha chọrọ ka ọ pụọ.

translation.en: When he worn the election, he promised to rule the whole of Egypt.
translation.ibo: Ka o meriri, o kwere nkwa na ya ga achị ndi Ijipt niile.

translation.en: Those that were against him said he did not fulfill his promise in the first year.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndị akwadoghi ya sị na-omezughi nkwa ya n'ime otu afọ a ọ chịrị Ijipt.

translation.en: People conspired to impeach him on June 30 when his rule of Egypt was a year old.
translation.ibo: Ndi mmadu banyere ọzọ ịsị ya rituo n'ụbọchị o mere otu afọ n'ọchịchị n'ụbọchị Juun 30 nke 2013.

translation.en: In the evening of 3rd July ,the soldiers of Egypt made a new government.
translation.ibo: Na mgbede Julaị 3, ndi agha wezugara iwu ji mba Ijipt ma kwuo na ha enwela gọọmentị ọzọ.

translation.en: Morsi disagreed with them
translation.ibo: Morsi si na ekweghi na nke a.

translation.en: Soldiers apprehended and imprisoned him
translation.ibo: Ndị agha nwụchịrị ya were tuba ya na mkpọrọ.

translation.en: Nigeria vs France: France have defeated Nigeria twice.
translation.ibo: Nigeria vs France: Fransị agbarala Naịjirịa ụgbọ nwamkpi?

translation.en: Nigeria super Falcon are rounding off as France told them 'see you in the next four years'

translation.ibo: Ndị otu Naịjirịa na Fransị

translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ihe ịtụ anya mgbe Renard nyere goolu ya na nkeji 79 maka na ọ bụ ugboro abụọ ọ gbara ya bụ penariti.

translation.en: Nigeria vs Norway: Norway have faced Nigeria with badluck.
translation.ibo: Nigeria vs Norway: Norway akpọchuola Naijirịa ihu

translation.en: Nigeria female football team are as bright as the sky.
translation.ibo: Otu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa achakeela ka ugo

translation.en: Nnadozie prevented the first penalty goal but Renard played and was against the rule of VAR ,which made it to be played again
translation.ibo: Nnadozie chetara penariti nke mbụ Renard gbara mana ọ dara iwu nke teknụzụ VAR gosiri eji nye ya ọzọ.

translation.en: As a result of this rule that he failed, Nnadozi who is 18years was given a green card while Ngozi Ebere was given a red card at 75 minutes.
translation.ibo: Iwu a ọ dara mekwara na Nnadozie dị afọ 18 rite akwụkwọ edo ebe Ngozi Ebere ritere akwụkwọ ọbara na nkeji 75.

translation.en: Norway defeated the south Korea with two goals as they played.
translation.ibo: Norway ji kwa goolụ abụọ merie mba Sawụt Koria mgbe ha zutere onwe ha.

translation.en: France gave south Korea 4:0 and defeated Norway with 2:1, which enabled them to play in the second half in 'group A'
translation.ibo: Frans pịara Saụt Koria 4:0 ma jirikwa 2:1 merie Norway, nke nyere ha owere ịbụrụ sọsọ ndị gafere agba nke abụọ na 'Group A'.

translation.en: Nigeria itself did not score any goal when they played with Norway with 3:0 indicating they should learn more.
translation.ibo: Naịjirịa na onwe ha agbataghị ihe mgbe ha zutere Norway ji 3:0 sị ha ga nu mụta ọfụma.

translation.en: Falcon are still thinking whether to withdraw from the game or to move forward in the competition.
translation.ibo: Falcons na-eche ugbua ịchọpụta ma ha a ga-alachita ma ha a ga aga ihu n'asọmpi a.

translation.en: Atomic Bomb have killed thirty people in Borno.
translation.ibo: Ogbunigwe agbagbuola mmadụ iri atọ na Borno

translation.en: The emergency personnel said that the total number of deaths recorded where the bomb exploded in Borno state would definitely increase.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ gbata gbata na-ekwu ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadu nwụrụ n'ebe ndị omekome atọ gbara ogbunigwe dị ha n'ahụ na Borno Steeti nwereike rịa.

translation.en: Thirty people died where they were watching TV,as more than thirty seven were injured.
translation.ibo: Mmadụ iri atọ nwụrụ n'ihe a mere n'ebe a na-ekiri TV ka ihe ruru mmadụ iri anọ n'asatọ merụrụ ahụ.

translation.en: No group have identified to be responsible for this crime.
translation.ibo: Onwebeghị otu sị na ọ bu ha kpara mkpamkpa a.

translation.ibo: Ihe Peter Obi gwara Buhari

translation.en: Keep acting like the president of India in South Africa
translation.ibo: mewe ka ndị isiala India na Saụt Afịrịka!

translation.en: This was mentioned by the former governor of Anambra state , Peter Obi as he was advising president Buhari to quickly appoint the people that will work with him.
translation.ibo: Onye kwuru nke a bụ aka chịbụrụ Anambra steeti bụ Peter Obi ka o na-adụ Onyeisiala Buhari ndụmọdụ maka ime ọsịsọ wepụta aha ndi ya na ha ga-arụ ọrụ.

translation.ibo: Onye ga-achị Osun steeti?

translation.en: supreme court will settle the case between Ademola Adeleke of PDP and Gboyega Oyetola of APC for governership position in the state.
translation.ibo: Ụlọikpe ukwu bụ Supreme Court ga-ekpebi ikpe dị n'etiti Ademola Adeleke nke PDP na Gboyega Oyetola nke APC maka ọkwa Gọvanọ nke steeti ahụ.

translation.en: Nigerians in Ghana: Unknown persons Locked the market lines of Nigerians in Ghana.
translation.ibo: Nigerians in Ghana: Ndị amaghị ndị ha bụ kpochiri ọdọahịa ụmụ Najiria na Ghana

translation.en: The Market lines of Nigerians where motor parts are sold were locked up at Kumasi in Ghana since last Tuesday.
translation.ibo: A kpochiri ọgbọ ahia ebe ụmụ Naijiria a na-ere akụkụ ụgbọala na Kumasi dị na Ghana kemgbe ụbọchị Tọọzde gara aga.

translation.en: Important news today.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ndị dị mkpa taa:

translation.en: Unknown persons Locked the market lines of Nigerians in Ghana.
translation.ibo: Ndị amaghị ndị ha bụ kpochiri ọdọahịa ụmụ Najiria na Ghana

translation.en: Market lines of Kumasi in Ghana.
translation.ibo: Ọdọahịa dị na Kumasi Ghana

translation.en: More than thirty market lines owned by Nigerian citizens called ' Suame Magazine ' in Kumasi of Ghana was locked up by the youths.
translation.ibo: Ihe karịrị ọdọahịa iri atọ ndị ụmụafọ Naijiria nwere n'ahịa a kpọrọ, 'Suame Magazine' na Kumasi, dị na mba Gana ka ndị ndị ntorobịa obodo ahụ kpochiri.

translation.en: Remember it has been long this misunderstanding between Nigerians and the Ghana youths on the allegation that Nigerians normally sell inferior goods.
translation.ibo: Cheta na oteela nghọtahie ji dịrị n'etiti ndị ntorobị Gana na ndị Naijiria na-azụ ahịa n'obodo ahụ n'ihi ebubo na ụmụ Naijiria na-erekarị ahịa adigboroja.

translation.en: Government of Ghana was never in support of Nigerians selling of goods in retail.
translation.ibo: Gọọmenti mba Gana akwadoghi ka ndị si mba ọzọ na-ere ahịa mgbere nke ndị bekee kpọrọ 'retail'.

translation.en: As a result of this violation of the rules ,they have to lock up the shops of Nigerians in the year 2008.
translation.ibo: Ha mepụtara iwu iji machie ya nke mere ka e mechie ọtụtụ ọdọahịa ndị Naijira nwere n'afọ 2008.

translation.en: Nigeria government came into the matter which prevented the disturbances and intimidation given to Nigerians doing business in that country.
translation.ibo: Mana Gọọmenti Niajiria tinyere ọnụ n'okwu ahụ nke mere ka ha kwụsi ịcha ụmụ Naijiria na-azụ ahịa na mba ahụ ọkụ.

translation.en: As it stands now, the police men of that country promised to investigate the matter.
translation.ibo: Ka ọ dị ugbua, ndị uweojii mba ahụ ekwela nkwa na ha ga-elebanye anya na nsogbu ahu.

translation.en: Any police man that is found around kidnapers is no longer part of Us-policemen
translation.ibo: Onye uweojii e jidere ya na ndị ntọ abụghị onye otu anyị -Ndi uweojii

translation.en: The Nigeria police force said that Kingsley Udoyen whom people think is the assistant commissioner of police ,that was apprehended with kidnappers at Akwa- Ibom state whose picture was found in social media as a kidnapper was neither a police man nor assistant commissioner of police.
translation.ibo: Ndị uweojii Naijiria ekwuola na Kingsley Udoyen, onye e chere bụ Osote Kọmishiona ndị uweojii( Assistant Commissioner of Police) a nwụchiri n'Akwa-Ibom steeti nke foto ya na-efegharị na soshal midia dịka onye anwụchiri ya na ndị ntọ ọzọ abụghị onye uweojii ma ya fọdụ ịbụ Osote kọmịshọna ndị uweojii.

translation.en: They said that the reason for arresting Nwuchie Udoyen was because of impersonation, using their uniform to threaten people.
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru ihe e ji nwuchie Udoyen bụ maka ebubo ịbụ onye uweojii adigboroja ji uwe ha atụrụ ndị mmadụ ego.

translation.en: Policemen explained that they captured him on the second day of January this year, as his evil deeds caught up with him,at magistrate court of Abak in Awka Ibom state.
translation.ibo: Ndị Uweojii kọweara na ya nwụchiri ya na abali abụọ nke ọnwa Januarị afọ dịka iko ya juru ma kpụpụ ya ụlọikpe magie dị n'Abak dị n'Akwa-Ibom steeti.

translation.en: Abortion is more deadly than malaria.
translation.ibo: Ite ime ka egbu umụnwaanyị karịa Malaria

translation.en: Dr. Christopher Lamai said that this death affected mostly the northern parts of Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Dọkịta Christopher Lamai kwuru na ọnwụ a kachasị metụta ndị mpaghara ugwu Naịjirịa.

translation.en: Like he said, a woman must die as a result of Abortion, at utmost ever seven o'clock daily.
translation.ibo: Dịka o si kwuo 'kwa nkeji asatọ, otu nwaanyị na-anwụ site n'ite ime n'ụzọ ezighi ezi'

translation.en: Is abortion supposed to be against the law?
translation.ibo: Ite ime o kwesiri ịbụ ihe iwu n'amachịghị?

translation.en: He told the journalist there to create awareness on the negative effect of Abortion.
translation.ibo: Ọ gwara ndị ntaakụkọ gbakọrọ ebe ahụ ha gbasaa ozi ka ndị mmadụ mụta ọghọm dị na ite ime.

translation.ibo: Ikpe Nnamdi Kanu

translation.ibo: Otu a sị na nke a na-egbochi steeti ahụ irite uru ndị ọzọ nọ na nzụkọ a na-erite.

translation.ibo: Nrụrụaka n'ụlọomeiwu nta

translation.ibo: Otu kpọro onwe ha G-70 si na-enwere nrụrụaka na ya bụ ntuliaka ma kwukwa na ha ga-aga ụlọikpe maka ya.

translation.ibo: Mohammed Morsi awụọla

translation.en: Mohammed Morsi is a 67 year old convicted since 2013 as the Egypt impeached him from the government.
translation.ibo: E ji Mohammed Morsi bụ onye gbara afọ 67 n'ụlọnga kemgbe afọ 2013 ka ndị agha mba Ijipt chutuchere ya n'ọchịchị

translation.en: The former president of Egypt, Mohammed morsi died yesterday in court.

translation.en: While Muslim brotherhood among others, are claiming that government has a hand in his death, Amnesty International calls for more investigation on his death.
