translation.ibo: UK advises Citizens: 'Unu agakwala na steeti 21 ndị a na Naịjirịa'

translation.en: The 'Common Wealth' organization of UK advises their citizens not to visit any of these 21 States in Nigeria to avoid any kind of criminal acts.

translation.en: Sajid Javid
translation.ibo: Sajid Javid

translation.en: Sajid Javid is a great writer, who is responsible for migrants.
translation.ibo: Sajid Javid bụ nnukwu odeakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndị mbịara mbiara

translation.en: The common wealth of UK have warned their people against visiting those States as a result of insecurity.
translation.ibo: Steeti ruru iri abụọ na otu na Naịjirịa ka ụlọọrụ 'Common Wealth' nke mba UK gwara ndị be ha bụ agaga maka enweghị ezi nchekwa ebe ndị ahụ.

translation.en: This organization tagged it in their website and their is an increase in crime especially in the Northeast, Hausa and Naija Delta.
translation.ibo: Ụlọọrụ ahụ depụtara ozi ahụ n'elu webụsiati ha ma kwụkwa na arụrụala ndị oyiegwu agbalitela n'ugwu Hausa Naịjirịa, ekperima na ọdịda anyanwu, nakwa ikpaike na Naija Delta.

translation.en: In this advice, they went to where UK citizens are in Nigeria , where people gathered, churches , market , hospitals, vehicle garage and secluded areas.
translation.ibo: N'ime ndụmọdụ a, ha gwakwara ndị mba UK nọ Naịjirịa ha agala ebe ndị mmadụ gbakọjuru, ọgbakọ ebe a na-ekpe ekpere , ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ oriri na nkwari, ebe a na-agba ụgbọala nakwa ogige ebe ndị na-agba ọsọ ndụ bi.

translation.en: They said that the issue of kidnapping is always rampant during festive period or election
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru na oke ntọ na-eme na steeti ndị ahụ na-abụkarị maka ego maọbụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.

translation.en: According to them: while visiting those places, make sure your secured.
translation.ibo: N'ọnụ ha, 'ị ga-ebe ndị a bụ agaaga ,gba mbọ hụ na ị kpọ ndị nchekwa zuruoke.'

translation.ibo: World Sickle Cell Day: Onye na-arịa 'Sickle Cell' ga-enwete uru na nri ndị a

translation.en: Dr. McGinger Ibeneme explained the type of nutritional foods best for sickle cell patients.
translation.ibo: Dibia Bekee akpọrọ McGinger Ibeneme kọwara ụdịrị nrị ga-abara ndị na-arị ọrịa 'Sickle Cell' uru ma ha na-eri ha.

translation.en: Abatete celebrated greatly today.
translation.ibo: Ndị Abatete mere ihe puruiche na iri ha

translation.en: As today marks the remembrance of people living with sickle cell, nutritionists have advised them.
translation.ibo: Dịka taa bụ ụbọchị ncheta ọrịa ọbara nko nke bụ 'Sickle Cell' na Bekee, ndị ọkachamara na nri na ihe ọ na-enye n'ahụ enyela ndụmọdụ ọhụrụ

translation.en: Florence Ngozi Uchendu said that there are particular meals for sickle cell patients for them to look more healthy than those that are free from the sicknesses.
translation.ibo: Florence Ngozi Uchendu kwuru na o nwere ụfọdụ nri ndị na-arịa ọrịa a kwesiri ị na-eri iji chekwa onwe ha ọfụma karịa ndị enweghi ọrịa a.

translation.en: Did you remember when this blood sickness killed Tosyn Bucknor.
translation.ibo: Ị chetara mgbe ọrịa ọbara gburu Tosyn Bucknor

translation.en: He said that foods that contains carbohydrates like , Rice yam , casava are good for the supply of strength and Energy to them.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na nri ndị na-enye ike dịka akpụ, ji, osikapa na ndị ọzọ dị mma iji nye ha ike n'ihi na ọrịa a na-agwụ ike.

translation.en: He also said that fruits and vegetables helps in nourishing the body.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na akwụkwọ nri na mkpụrụ osisi dị icheiche na nye aka ịnye ha ihe ndị na-edozi ahụ.

translation.en: It is caused by lack of iron, vitamins and calcium in the body.
translation.ibo: Ọ kwuru na ọ bụ maka na ndị na-arịa ọrịa anaghị enweta ihe dịkia Ayọn, vitamins, kalshiụm wdg.

translation.en: Four things to know about malaria.
translation.ibo: Ihe anọ ị maghị maka ọrịa ịba

translation.en: Ụgụ is a type of vegetable recommended for patients with shortage of blood in the system.
translation.ibo: Ụgụ bụ akwụkwọ nri ndị ọrịa ọbara nko kwesiri ị na-eri

translation.en: Another food recommended is milk that supplies calcium to the body and water that stops body pain.
translation.ibo: Nri ọzọ ọ kpọrọ aha bụ mmiri ala ehi nke ga-enye ha kalshiụm n'ahụ nakwa mmiri ọṅụṅụ nke ga-akwụsị ahụ mgbu.

translation.en: Another doctor who contributed to this issue ,was McGinger Ibeneme who said that foods with Quality nutritional values helps to strengthen the life span of those suffering from shortage of blood.
translation.ibo: Dịbia bekee ọzọ tinyere ọnụ n'okwu a bụ McGinger Ibeneme kwuru na ezigbo nri zuruoke nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdọtị ndụ ndị na-arịa ọrịa ọbara.

translation.en: He narrated the symptoms of this type of sickness to be , pain in the bone ,heart and constant fever.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na ndị na-arịa ụdịrị ọrịa na-enwe ọtụtụ nsogbu gụnyere ọkpụkpụ mgbu, obi mgbu ịrịa ahụ mgbe ọbụla.

translation.en: Ụtazị is one of the vegetable that is normally eaten for people that has shortage of blood
translation.ibo: Ụtazị so n'akwụkwọ nri ndị ọrịa ọbara nko ga na-eri

translation.ibo: Akụkọ ihe na-eme na 'Alaigbo na gburu gburu Naijiria ebe a na-eme ntuliaka mmeju nke afọ 2019.

translation.ibo: A ga-agbaghara ndị Boko Haram chegharịrịnụ'

translation.ibo: Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ekwela nkwa ịgbaghara ndị otu Boko Haram chegharịrịnụ.

translation.ibo: Ka o si aga n'ihe gbasara ncheta Biafra na Naijiria na ụwa gburugburu taa bụ Mee 30, nke afọ 2018.

translation.en: Bombing in Ebonyi.
translation.ibo: Nigeria Election 2019: Ogbunigwe n'Ebonyi? - BBC News Ìgbò

translation.en: The news about the happenings across Nigeria as the 2019 election is a day to go.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ihe na-eme na Naijiria gbaa gburugburu ka ọ fọrọ naanị otu ụbọchị tupu eme ntuliaka 2019.

translation.en: The legislators are tired.
translation.ibo: Ekweremadu: Ike agwụla ndị ụlọ ome iwu

translation.en: Because of the numerous killings of people in Nigeria, the vice-senate president Ike Ekweremmadu has said the greatest need of Nigerians is maximum security.
translation.ibo: N'ihi oke ogbugbu ndị mmadụ na Naịjirịa gbagburu gburu, osota onyeisi ndị ome-iwu Naịjirịa bụ Ike Ekweremadu ekwuola na ihe Naịjiria chọrọ bụ nchekwa tara ọchịchị, tupu ekwuwa okwu ihe ọzọ.

translation.en: Ike Ekweremmadụ
translation.ibo: Ike Ekweremmadụ

translation.en: Ekweremmadu is tired of keeping quiet to the numerous killings in Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Ike ịda jụụ otụ nkeji banyere oke ogbugbu na-eme n'ala Naijiria agwụla Ekweremmadụ

translation.en: The vice senate president said that the house is tired of always observing a minute silence to the victims of the numerous killings across the country.
translation.ibo: Osote onye-isi ndị ome-iwu Naịjirịa bụ Ike Ekweremadu ekwuola na ike agwụla ndị Sịnatị iji otu nkeji darajụụ akwanyere ndị egburu n'ime oke ọgbaghara dị na Naịjirịa oge ọ bula.

translation.en: Ekweremmadu spoke against the kidnapping and killing of innocent citizens of the country by Fulani herdsmen. And the senate is tired of the continual one minute tribute to the victims.
translation.ibo: Ekweremadu katọrọ mwakpọ na ogbugbu ndị Naịjirịa aka ha dị ọcha nke ndị Fulani na-achị ehi mere, kwuo na ike agwụla ndị ome- iwu ịkwanyere ha ugwu n'otu nkeji'

translation.en: Remember that a week ago, the burial of about 70 people killed in Logo and Guma local governments of Benue state was held. While more than 50 people were said to have been killed in Taraba state.
translation.ibo: Cheta n'otu ịzụka gara-aga ka emere akwam ozu mmadụ ruru iri asaa egburu na Local Gọọmenti Logo na Guma nke Benue Steeti, e be ihe kariri mmadụ iri ise ka akụkọ kwuru n'egburu na Taraba Steeti.

translation.en: In the senate meeting today, Ekweremmadu expressed his grief over the killings of people in the country and said that peace and security must be achieved before national development would be possible.
translation.ibo: Ekweremadu gosiri iwe gbasara ogbugbu ndị mmadụ na nzukọ ndị ome-iwu n'ụbọchị taa, kwuo na Naịjirịa ga-ebu ụzọ nwe udo na nchekwa, tupu e kwuowa okwu iwulite obodo.

translation.en: He said: ' the law markers are not the only people affected but the entire citizens of Nigeria'.
translation.ibo: Ọ sịrị: 'Ndị ome-iwu abụghị sọ ọsọ ndị ihe a metụtara, kama ndị Naịjirịa niile.

translation.en: We are tired of always observing a minute silence. What we want is peace an security before development.
translation.ibo: Ike agwụla anyị iji otu nkeji dị jụụ maka nkwanye ugwu. Ihe anyị chọrọ bụ udo na nchekwa tupu echewa echịchị nwuli obodo.'

translation.en: The story I would tell is this- Simone Biles
translation.ibo: Akụkọ m ga-akarị nke a' - Simone Biles

translation.en: Simone Biles, the American representative in gymnastics has said that Larry Nassar, the doctor who took care of them rapped her.
translation.ibo: Simone Biles, nwata nwanyị na-anọchite anya Amerika na egwuregwu mmega ahụ(gymnaastics), ekwuola na dokịta na-eletabu otu ha bụ Larry Nassar metọrọ ya n'ụzọ mmekọahụ mgbe gara aga

translation.en: Simone Biles.
translation.ibo: Simone Biles

translation.en: Simone said that she would not let what happened rip her of her happiness.
translation.ibo: Simone kwuru na ọ gaghị ekwe ka ihe mere zuru oọṅụ ya

translation.en: Simone said this on twitter with the hash tag ME TOO.
translation.ibo: Simone kwupụtara nke a n'elu igwe okwu, Twitta, jiri akụkọ a na-akpọ #MeToo na bekee.

translation.en: she said that she would not let what happened 'steal her joy and happiness'.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na ọ gaghị ekwe ka ihe mere 'zuru ọṅụ m na obi aṅụrị m.'

translation.en: She said: 'I found it difficult to remember all these and it is disheartening to go back to train.
translation.ibo: O kwuru sị: 'Ọ hịara m ahụ ị cheta ihe ndị a, ma na-agbawa m obi na ịlaghachi azụ ebe ahụ.

translation.en: It is important to fulfil my wish of going for the 2020 Tokyo tournament.
translation.ibo: Ọ dị mkpa na imezu ebumnobi m maka ị ga asọmpị Tokyo n'afọ 2020.'

translation.en: But Simone told her followers that she would not disappoint them. That she would go ahead an win the gymnastic tournament.
translation.ibo: Mana Simone gwakwara ndị n'eso ya na ọ gaghị eme ha ihe nwute, na ọ ga-aga n'iru n'imeri na ihe ọ hụrụ n'anya bụ egwuregwu mmega ahụ.

translation.en: what brought this talk?
translation.ibo: Gịnị bụtere okwu a?

translation.en: The police, last year december,arrested Larry Nassar who was the doctor that took care of all the American team for child molestation.
translation.ibo: Ndị uwe ojii wakporo, Larry Nassar, onye bụ dokịta ochie na-eleta ndị otu egwuregwu Amerika niile na Disemba afọ gara aga maka mpụ gbasara ụmụaka n'ịhe mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị.

translation.en: About three thousand women have sued Nassar who is also a proffessor in the university of Michigan.
translation.ibo: Ihe dịka ụmụ nwanyị narị iri atọ akpụrụ la Nassar, bụrụ kwa ọka-mmụta na Mahadụm steeti Michigan, ga ụlọ-ikpe maka mmetọ o mere ha.

translation.en: Nassar said that he also molested people from other American team.
translation.ibo: Nassar kwuputara na ọ metọrọ ndị otu egwuregwu Amerika ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: As this went on, Simone told his own story
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ka nke a na- aga ka Simone jiri kọ akụkọ nke ya.

translation.en: More than seven hundred million people have been unemployed since 2016.
translation.ibo: Ọrụ adịghi: Mmadụ nde narị asaa na ọkara enweghị ọrụ kemgbe 2016

translation.en: Buhari promised to employ but NBS explains that hundred million people are unemployed.
translation.ibo: Buhari kwere nkwa na ọ ga enye orụ, mana NBS na akọwa na mmadụ nde narị enweghị ọrụ.

translation.en: A woman who sells yam and bean cake.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị na eri ji na akara

translation.en: Many people are either craftmen or traders.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ mmadụ na arụ ọrụ aka, mọ na azụ ahia

translation.en: When Muhammadu Buhari was campaigning for election, one of his key promises was to give employment.
translation.ibo: Mgbe Muhammadu Buhari na-azọ ọchịchị, otu ịhe bụ okwu ọ kpụ n'ọnụ bụ nkwa ọ ekwere na ya ga enye ndị mmadụ ọrụ.

translation.en: Buhari's speech in the 2015 election instigated the recent criticizm mostly as the national population commission published that seven million five hundred people have been unemployed since 2016.
translation.ibo: Okwu a Buhari kwuru na isi ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na 2015 bu ịhe eji kpụrụ ya na ọnụ ugbua, ọkachasị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ a na-akpọ National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) nwepụtara ozi n'akọwa na mmadụ ruru nde asaa na nari ise so na ndị enweghi ọrụ kemgbe afọ 2016.

translation.en: NBS said this in its book titled ' Labour Force Statistics. Vol 2: Employment by Sector Report'.
translation.ibo: NBS kwuru nke a na akwụkwọ ọ kpọrọ 'Labour Force Statistics Vol. 2: Employment by Sector Report,'.

translation.en: This book was published in Abuja last Sunday.
translation.ibo: E wepụtara akwụkwọ a na Abuja n'ụka a gara aga.

translation.en: What does this news mean?
translation.ibo: Ke ihe ozi a pụtara?

translation.en: BBC Igbo asked Cheta Nwaeze, who works with SB Morgen, ministry of information. Cheta told us that the things involved in giving information is complex. But he said that a lot has happene in different places of work for the past two years.
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo jụrụ Cheta Nwanze, bụ onye na arụ na SB Morgen bụ ụlọ ọrụ aka ha dị na nkọwa otu ịhe sịrị dị. Cheta gwara anyị na ihe dị na ọrụ nkọwa ihe ọgụgụ na enwe otu ọ dị, mana ọ sị na nnụkwụ ịhe mere na ụlọ ọrụ dị ichiche na Naịjịra n'ime afọ abuo gara aga.

translation.en: My wife was sacked when Nigeria had a dispute with MTN that it affected her work place.
translation.ibo: Achụrụ nwunye m na ọrụ mgbe Naịjirịa na ndị MTN nwere nsogbụ ọ were metụta ebe o na aru ọrụ.

translation.en: This dispute has affected lots of enterprises who could no longer get contract from MTN.
translation.ibo: Okwu MTN ahu metutakwara ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ha na ha na arụkọ ọrụ ka MTN ekweghị inye ha contract.

translation.en: I know a lot of people that worked in Proctor and Gamble but were sacked when the one-fourth of the workers were layed off.
translation.ibo: A mam ọtụtụ ndị mmadu na arụbụ ọrụ na Proctor and Gamble, mana achụkwara ha n'ọrụ mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chụrụ oke anọ ndi ọrụ ha.

translation.en: This dispute has affected lots of people just as Cheta Nwanze has said.
translation.ibo: Yabu ịhe metutara ọtụtụ mmadu,' Ka Cheta Nwanze siri kwu.

translation.en: Some children (not the ones in this picture), are no longer going to school because their parents are unemployed.
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ ụmụaka (ọ bụrọ ndị egosiri eba) anọghịzị na akwụkwọ maka nne na nna ha enweghị ọrụ

translation.en: BBC Igbo asked Nwanze about the steps taken by the Nigerian government to create employment opportunities.
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo juru Nwanze maka okwu ndị gọọmenti Naịjirịa na ekwu banyere imepụta ọrụ.

translation.en: He said that ' the NBS findings show that petroleum business is no longer lucrative as it should'.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na 'nchọpụta ndị NBS na-akowa na ọrụ mmepụta mmanụ agbịdị agaghị n'ihu ka ọ sị kwesi.

translation.en: This shows that despite the inflow of money in the petroleum sector, how many people have been employed in that sector?
translation.ibo: Nke a na egosị na agbaneghi na ego batara na ọrụ gbasatara mmanụ agbịdị, madụ ole ka ana ewo na ọrụ na mpaghara a?

translation.en: When there is a gahering, you will see that there is hardship.
translation.ibo: Mgbe e mere mgbakọ, ị ga ahụ na ịhe sirị ike ọfụma

translation.en: BBC Igbo called the representatives of the Nigerian government to comment on the NBS release but non among them responded.
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo kpọrọ ndị na-ekwuchịtere gọọmenti Naịjirịa ka ha kwuo uche ha banyere ịhe a NBS wepụtara mana onweghị onye zara n'ime ha.

translation.en: But the Buhari led government introduced N-Power, school feeding programme and other 'social empowerment programmes' they will use to help the Nigerian citizens.
translation.ibo: Mana, gọọmentị Buhari weputara N-POWER, School Feeding Programme na ndị ọzọ dị na ime ịhe ha kpọrọ 'Social Empowerment Programmes' ha sị na ha ga ejị nyere ndị mmadụ aka na Naịjirịa.

translation.en: Google has paid tribute to late Keshi.
translation.ibo: Google akwanyerela Keshi ugwu n'ọnwụ

translation.en: Google workers has honoured Stephen Keshi on the day he marks his birthday. Although, he would have been 56 years old on that day.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụlọọrụ Google ji ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ Stephen Keshi kwanyere ya ugwu n'agbanyeghi na ọ bụ ụbọchị ọ gaara agba afọ 56.

translation.en: Google doodle
translation.ibo: Google doodle

translation.en: Google marks Keshi's birthday
translation.ibo: Google na-echeta ụbọchị ọmụmụ Keshi

translation.en: In memorial of the famous Nigerian coach Stephen Keshi, Google honoured him in a special way by making the sign for google search to bear his face.
translation.ibo: Iji cheta ọmụmụ onye nkuzi bọọlụ Najiria a ma ama bụ Stephen Keshi, Google kwanyere ya ugwu n'ụzọ pụrụiche site na ime ka akara e ji achọta ihe n'igwe intanetị bụrụ ihu ya.

translation.en: Today being the 23rd of January marks the birthday of Keshi who died in the year 2016 at the age of 54.
translation.ibo: Taa bụ ụbọchị 23 nke ọnwa Jenuwarị 2018, bụ ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ Keshi onye nwụrụ n'afọ 2016 ka ọ gbara afọ 54.

translation.en: What you should do about Christy Essien-Igbokwe
translation.ibo: Ihe i kwesịrị ịma maka Christy Essien-Igbokwe

translation.en: Femi Otedola has agreed to pay the hospital bill of about fifty thousand dollars for Christain Chukwu.
translation.ibo: Femi Otedola ekwetala ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọọgwụ ruru $50,000 maka Christian Chukwu

translation.en: Google Africa said on Twitter that: ' today we are honouring the famous football coach Stephen Keshi. Football took Keshi round the world both as a player and as a coach. teacher, great father!'
translation.ibo: Google Africa kwuru n'igwe okwu Twitter sị: 'Taa, anyị na-akwanyere onye egwuregwu bọọlụ a ma ama, Stephen Keshi ugwu. Egwuregwu bọọlụ bugharịrị Keshi ụwa niile dịka onye ọgba bọọlụ na onye nkuzi bọọlụ. Ọnụ ọmụmụ, nna nnukwu!'

translation.en: What google did, made lots of Nigerians happy and made them to recall the efforts Keshi made in Nigerian football when he was alive.
translation.ibo: Ihe a Google mere, mere ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria obi ụtọ, mekwa ka ha chetakwa ndụ na ike Keshi kpara n'ihe gbasara egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naijiria mgbe ọ dị ndụ:

translation.en: Keshi won the 2013 African world cup.
translation.ibo: Keshi meriri iko mba Afrika na 2013

translation.en: Mutiu Adepoju, who played for Nigeria alongside Keshi told BBC that, 'Keshi is someone who loves people. I remember the time that I joined the 'National Team' then he was our captain, he was a good leader. Keshi is well known. He is no longer alive, but he would be remembered for his good works while he was alive.'
translation.ibo: Mutiu Adepoju, onye ya na Keshi gbakọrọ Naijiria bọọlụ, gwara BBC na, 'Keshi bụ onye hụrụ ndị mmadụ n'anya. Echetara m oge m banyere 'National Team' mgbe ahụ ọ bụ onye ndu anyị, ọ bụ ezi onye ndu. Keshi bụ onye a ma ama. Ọ nọzịghị ndụ mana a ga-eji ihe ọma ndị o mere mgbe ọ dị ndụ were na-echeta ya.'

translation.en: Keshi coached the Super Eagles since the year 2011 and led them to different tournaments that includes; African cup of nations 2013 (which they won), cup of different African tournaments2013, and helped Nigeria get a good podition in the 2014 world cup.
translation.ibo: Keshi chịrị ndị otu egwuregwu Super Eagles kemgbe afọ 2011 ma durukwa ha gaa asọmpi dị iche iche nke gụnyere; Iko Mba Afrika na 2013 (nke ha bulatara Naịjirịa), iko mpaghara Afrịka dị iche iche na 2013, ma nye aka wetara Naijiria ọnọdụ n'asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa niile na 2014.

translation.en: The Republican's win
translation.ibo: Trump na-asị na mmepe gọọmenti Amerịka bụ ihe mmeri ndị Republican

translation.en: Trump and the US legislators have agreed to sign for the commencement of work in that country.
translation.ibo: Trump na ndị omeiwu US ekwekọrịtala maka itinye aka n'akwụkwọ ka ọrụ malite ọzọ na mba ahụ.

translation.en: Donald Trump
translation.ibo: Donald Trump

translation.en: Donald Trump is speaking strongly concerning immigrants
translation.ibo: Donald Trump na-ekwu okwu ike gbasara ndi mbịabịa

translation.en: The US legislative house has agreed to sign for work to commence again in that country.
translation.ibo: Ụlọ nzụkọ ome iwu US ekwekọrịtala maka itinye aka n'akwụkwọ ka ọrụ malite ọzọ na mba ahụ.

translation.en: Remember that the Democrats and the Republicans had a dispute because they disagreed on the national budget.
translation.ibo: Cheta na ndị Democrat na ndị Republican sere okwu maka itnye aka na ya bu akwụkwọ maka ha ekwekọrịtaghị na ihe gbasara nkpata na mmefu akụ bụ bọjet.

translation.en: The Democrats said that the Republicans have agreed to meet in other to discuss the immigration policies in US.
translation.ibo: Ndị otu Demokrat kwuru na ndị Republicans kwetara na ha ga-eme nkparịta ụka maka onọdụ ndị mbiambia bị n'ala US.

translation.en: They will also look into the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) law of government workers for the children of immigrants to be able to live in the US.
translation.ibo: Ha ga-elebaanya n'iwu nke a na-akpọ Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) n'olu bekee bụ iwu na-agba mgbọ hụ na ndị umuaka ndị mbiabia nwere ike ị bị na US.

translation.en: Trump is shaking hands with people that have accepted his winning.
translation.ibo: Trump na-atụrụ ndị ekwekọrịtara na mmeri ya aka.

translation.en: But now, Trump's governance has stopped that law. This means that this law will no longer be effective from the fifth day of March.
translation.ibo: Mana ugbua, ọchịchị Trump akabiela iwu ahụ. Nke a pụtara na iwu nke a ga-akwụsi n'ụbọchị ise na ọnwa nke maachị.

translation.en: The Democrat's representative in the senate Steny Hoyer has begged other members of the senate to look into this. .
translation.ibo: Onye na nọchịte anya ndị Demokrat n'ulọ omeiwu bụ Steny Hoyer arịọla ndị otu ibe ya ka ha lebaa anya na ya bụ okwu.

translation.en: On news about the close down of merica, read:
translation.ibo: Maka akụkọ gbasara mmechi Amerika, gụọ:

translation.en: Close of work in America
translation.ibo: Mmechi ọrụ na Amerịka

translation.en: Rochas Okorocha:'those that have been warned'.
translation.ibo: Rochas Okorocha: 'Ndị asịrị kpachara anya ha!'

translation.en: Rochas Okorocha has refused to give grazing settelement to fulani herds men because it is not in the Nigerian constitution.
translation.ibo: Rochas Okorocha ajula ị nye ndị Fulani na achụ ehi ala n'Imo Steeti maka na-ọdịghị n'iwu Naịjirịa

translation.en: Rochas and Fulani grazing settlement.
translation.ibo: Rochas na ala Fulani na achụ ehi

translation.en: many Imo citizens do not support the grazing settlement
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndị Imo Steeti akwadoghị ị nye ndị Fulani na-achụ ehi ala

translation.en: The Imo State governor, Rochas Okorocha has said that he would not grant any land settlement for Fulani herds men in Imo State. He said this yesterday being the twenty-third of January in the state's capital Owerri..
translation.ibo: Gọvanọ na-achị Imo Steeti bụ Rochas Okorocha ekwuola na onweghị ala ya ga amaputa maka ndị Fulani na achị ehi n'Imo Steeti. Okwuru nke a unyahụ bụ mkpụrụ ụbọchị Jenụwarị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọwerri, isi obodo Imo Steeti.

translation.en: He said this through the commissioner of information Professor Nnamdị Obiaraeri. The message read that the governor Rochas has never considered giving anybody land owned by Imo citizens.
translation.ibo: Okwuru nke a site n'onu komishiona na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi bụ ọkammụta Nnamdị Obiaraeri. Ozi ahụ kwuru na onweghị mgbe Gọvanọ Rochas jiri chee echichi ị nye onye ọbụla ala ndị Imo steeti.

translation.en: He said that all the rumurs of giving grazing settelement in Imo State is the handwork of enemies and oppositions.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na-asịrị niile ana anụ maka ịnye ndị Fulani na-achị ehị ala ndị Imo Steeti bụ ọrụaka ndị iro nakwa ndị mgbam na ndị ntụ.

translation.en: News have previously read that governor Okorocha said that he would give the herds men land settlement in Imo State which many Igbos openly showed their disapproval. BBC Igbo tried to speak to the personal assistant to the governor on information but he got infuriated and banged the phone on the reporters.
translation.ibo: Akwụkwọ akụkọ ekwubuola na Gọvanọ Okorocha sị na ya ga-enye ndị na achị ehị ala n'Imo Steeti nke ọtụtụ ndị Igbo katọrọ na ezoghị ọnụ. BBC Igbo gbara mbọ I kwuru Oje ozi Rochas maka mgbasa ozi mana nwaamadị ahụ bawara BBC mba gbanuọ ekwenti ya.

translation.en: As it is now, other Igbo governors have said that they will not allocate any land to the Fulani herds men for grazing. The people of Igbo have ruled that nobody will give any Igbo land out for grazing.
translation.ibo: Ka ọdị ugbua, ndị Gọvanọ ndị ọzo n'ala ịgbo ekwuola na ha agaghị amapụta ala ọbụla maka ị nye ndị Fulanị na-achị ehị. Ohaneze Ndị Igbo akabichiela na onweghị onye ga enye ala ndị Igbo maka ịchị ehi.

translation.en: In Rivers State, governor Nyesom Wike has said that does not have any lang to work on , talk more of the one to let out.
translation.ibo: Na River Steeti, Gọvanọ Nyesom Wike ekwuola na ya nweghị ala ya ji arụ ọrụ ma ya fọkwa nke ya na-enye mmadụ.

translation.en: A tanker load of fuel got burnt at Ojo.
translation.ibo: Tanka bu mmanụ ụgbọ-ala agbaala ọkụ n' Ojo

translation.en: A fuel tanker of about thirty-three thousand got burnt at Ojo, Lagos.
translation.ibo: Otu tanka bu mmanụ ụgbọ-ala ruru lita puku iri ato na ato agbaala ọkụ na Ojo Legos.

translation.en: Ijegun fire
translation.ibo: Ijegun fire

translation.en: In the past, tanker has burnt many people in Lagos.
translation.ibo: Ọkụ tanka agbala ọtụtụ mmadụ na oge gara aga na Legos

translation.en: Rasak Fadipe has said that nobody died from.
translation.ibo: Onyeisi ndị na-emenyu ọkụ na, Legọọsi steeti bụ Rasak Fadipe ekwuola na onweghi onye nwụrụ n'ime ọkụ ahụ gbara n'ehihie ụbọchị 24 Jenuwarị, 2018.

translation.en: got burnt in Lagos State.
translation.ibo: Ọkụ tanka bu mmanụ ruru puku iri atọ na atọ n'ime ya, gbaara ọkụ n'Ojo, Lagos Steeti.

translation.en: This made lots of people to run for their lives there
translation.ibo: Nke a mere ka ọtụtụ mmadụ na-agbaọsọ ndụ n'ebe ahụ.

translation.en: Rasak Fadipe told news men that 'immediately I heard of this fire outbreak, I called the fire service men in Ojo, they rushed to the fire scene.
translation.ibo: Rasak Fadipe gwara ndị ntaakụkọ na 'Ozugbo m nụrụ maka ọkụ a ka m kpọrọ ndị na-emenyụ ọkụ dị n'Ọjọ, ha gbatakwara ebe ọkụ a na-ere.'

translation.en: But when we got there, we saw that it was a fuel tanker that was being burnt. It was then that we immediately called other fire service workers.
translation.ibo: Mana mgbe anyị ruru ebe a ka anyị hụrụ na ọ bụ mmanụ ụgbọala na-agba ọkụ. Ọ bụ mgbe ahụ m kpọkọtara ụlọọrụ ndị ọzọ na-emenyụ ọkụ ozugbo ozugbo.

translation.en: News on fuel leakage on a major road
translation.ibo: Okwu mmanu ugbọala gbara n'uzọ ana-agbakarị

translation.en: The police and the fire service men helped the Lagos State Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) to put out fire at three-thirty in the afternoon.
translation.ibo: Ndiuweojii na ndị agha mmiri nyere ndị Lagos State Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) enyemaka ịmenyụ ọkụ ahụ n'elekere atọ na nkeji iri atọ nke ehihe

translation.en: Olayinka ajeba the NEMA representative said that this problem started from the manual drilling of fuel.
translation.ibo: Olayinka Ajaba bụ onye nnọchịanya NEMA kwuru na nsogbu nke a sị n'oge ha jị aka na-amịpụta mmanụ ụgbọ ala .

translation.en: The police leader of Ijegun, SP Audu Ibrahim, told press men that they tried to ensure peace during the fire outbreak.
translation.ibo: Onye isi ndịuweojii n'Ijegun bụ SP Audu Ibrahim, gwara ndị ntaakụkọ na ha gbaara mbọ hụ na udo di mgbe ya bụ ọkwụ na-agba.

translation.en: Now, the people of Ijegun Ibasa have said that they want the Lagos State government to erect a fire service building beside there just as NAN has said.
translation.ibo: Ugbua, ndi obibi Ijegun Ibasa ekwuola na ha chọrọ ka gọọmentị Lagos steetị guzobe ulọ mmenyụ ọkwụ n'akụkụ ebe ahụ dika NAN sịrị kọọ.

translation.en: The video of how American soldiers were killed in Niger have been released.
translation.ibo: Ihe nkiri zikọrọ otu esi gbuo ndị agha Amerịka na Niger apụtala

translation.en: News from the American soldiers said that they are investigating the trending video on Twitter.
translation.ibo: Ozi si n'aka ndị agha Amerịka siri na ha na enyocha ihe nkiri na ewu na Twitter.

translation.en: The corpse of an American soldier.
translation.ibo: Ozu onye agha Amerịka

translation.en: The dead American soldiers who died in Niger have been buried.
translation.ibo: E nịela ndị agha Amerịka nwụrụ na Niger

translation.en: American soldiers said that they are investigating the trendy video on the internet that shows dead people that are claimed to be American soldiers killed by terrorits in the year 2017 in Niger
translation.ibo: Ndị agha Amerịka si na ha na-eleba anya na ihe nkiri n'ewu ewu na intanet nke na-egosi ndị nwụrụ anwụ a sịrị na ha bụ ndi agha Amerịka ndị oyi egwu wakporo na afọ 2017 na mba Niger.

translation.en: News from the group of American soldiers in charge of Africa called African command (USAFRICOM) said: 'We are investigating the twitter handle that released this news to know if throughly it came with a video.'
translation.ibo: Ozi si na mpahara ndị agha Amerika na ahụ maka Afrịka a na-akpọ African command (USAFRICOM) siri: 'Anyi na enyocha akara twitter bu ozi a, iji mara ma ọ bụ na ezi na onwere ihe nkiri so ya.'

translation.en: They also said that they will not let another thing get in the way of this investigation till it is concluded.
translation.ibo: Ha kwukwara na ha agaghị ekwu ihe ọzọ banyere ihe a ma ọ bụrụ na ha emechaghi nyocha.

translation.en: 4 October 2017, twelve American soldiers and thirty soldiers from Niger were killed by terrorists in Tongo Tongo, a city in the East of Niger.
translation.ibo: Na ọctoba 4, 2017, mmadụ iri na abuo ndị agha Amerịka na mmadụ iri atọ ndị agha Niger ka ndị oyi egwu wakporo na Tongo Tongo, bụ obodo di na ọdịda anyanwụ nke mba Niger.

translation.en: This story tells of about fifty terrorists with different ammunition, especially those called machine gun and rocket-propelled grenade are behind this crime.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ na akọwa na ihe ruru mmadụ iri ise ndị oyi egwu ji ngwa agha dị ichiche, ọkacha ndị a na-akpọ machine gun na rocket-propelled grenade na asụsụ bekee bu ndi kpara arụ a.

translation.en: A news man wrote on twitter that the terrorist group released a video of dead American soldiers and a wounded soldier.
translation.ibo: Otu onye ndị nchọpụta dere na twitter na ndị oyi egwu a zipuru ihe nkiri a sikọrọ ozu ndị agha Amerịka na otu onye agha meruru ahụ.

translation.en: The soldiers are on the lookout for the whereabout of the terrorist leaders in the Niger.
translation.ibo: Ndị agha a nọ na ọrụ ị nwete akụkọ maka ndị isi ndị otu otu egwu no na mpahara Niger ahu.

translation.en: Niger, the Hill broadcasting house released this news first.
translation.ibo: Ndị Amerịka nwere ihe ruru ndị agha nari asato na Niger, ụlọ nta akụkọ Hill, bụ ndị buru ozi a na mbụ, kwuru.

translation.en: Thomas Dennerby is the new coach of the Super Falcons.
translation.ibo: Thomas Dennerby bụ onye nkuzi ọhụrụ Super Falcons

translation.en: The Nigerian coach Amajụ Pinnick has said that Thomas Dennerby is a new coach of the Super Falcons
translation.ibo: Onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naijiria Amajụ Pinnick ekwuola na Thomas Dennerby bụ onye nkuzi ọhụrụ otu Super Falcons

translation.en: Thomas Dennerby
translation.ibo: Thomas Dennerby

translation.en: Thomas Dennerby is fifty-six years old.
translation.ibo: Thomas Dennerby di afọ iri ise na isi

translation.en: The Super Falcons of Nigeria has a new coach by name Thomas Dennerby.
translation.ibo: Otu egwuregwu Super Falcons nke ala Naijiria enwela onye nkụzi ọhụrụ aha ya bụ Thomas Dennerby.

translation.en: The Nigerian football coach said this on twitter.
translation.ibo: Onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naijiria bụ Amajụ Pinnick kwuru nke a n'elu Twita.

translation.en: Super Falcons have won in the African female category seven times.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons emeriela na asọmpi iko ụmụ nwanyị Afrika ugboro asaa

translation.en: Immediately some football fans heard this, they expressed their gratitude to Pinnick on twitter.
translation.ibo: Ozigbo ụfọdụ ndị hụrụ egwuregwu bọọlụ n' anya nụrụ nke a ha bidoro na-ekele Pinnick n'elu Twita.

translation.en: Dennerby was a football player of Hammarby club in Sparvagens.
translation.ibo: Dennerby bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ otu Hammarby na Sparvagens na oge gara aga.

translation.en: He is also a player of the Sweden under twenty one male football category.
translation.ibo: O sokwa na otu ndi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ okorobia dị afọ iri abụọ na otu nke Sweden.

translation.en: Dennerby also was a police man, he was also a teacher in Allsvenskan in Hammarby in the year 2001.
translation.ibo: Dennerby rụkwara ọrụ ndị uwe ojii. Bụrụkwa onye nkụzi nke otu Allsvenskan na Hammarby na afọ 2001.

translation.en: China has created an animal through an artifical means.
translation.ibo: China arụpụtala anụmanụ na-amụghị amụ

translation.en: A science laboratory in China is the first to create an animal from the 'Primate' family.
translation.ibo: Ụlọ ọrụ sayensi na China bụ nke mbụ arụpụtala anụmanụ 'Primate' na amụghị.

translation.en: People have castigated the news of two monkeys formed in a science laboratory saying that it would be easier to create humans like that.
translation.ibo: Ndị mmadụ akatọọla akụkọ na-apụta maka ụmụ enwe abụọ a rụpụtara n'ụlọ sayensi n'ihi na ha-sị na ọ ga-adị mfe ị rụpụta mmadụ etu aha.

translation.en: The government of America: Trump begged for peace and unity.
translation.ibo: Ọchịchị mba Amerịka: Trump arịọla maka udo na ịdịnaotu

translation.en: The president of America has talked on 'unity in America' but the democrats said that he has 'divided' America.
translation.ibo: Onyeisiala mba Amerịka ekwuola maka 'otu ezinaụlọ mba Ameịka' mana ndị otu pati Demokrat si na ọ 'gbajiela' Amerịka.

translation.en: Donald Trump
translation.ibo: Donald Trump

translation.en: The US government closed down last week because the senate did not approve their budget.
translation.ibo: Gọọmenti mba US mechiri n'izu gara ga maka na ndị sineti akwadoghi bọjetị ha

translation.en: The president of America Donald Trump has made his first press release on how his governance has been since he resumed office in 2017.
translation.ibo: Onyeisiala mba Amerịka bụ Donald Trump emela mgbasa ozi nke mbụ gbasara etu ọchịchị Amerịka si aga kamgbe o were ọchịchị n'afọ 2017.

translation.en: Trump through the media said that he would give the Democrats the opportunity to work with him.
translation.ibo: Trump site na mgbasa ozi ahụ o mere kwuru na ya na-enye ndị otu pati Demokrat ohere ka ha rụkọ ọrụ.

translation.en: Trump said that he wants the Guantanamo Bay prison to be reopened in reverse of the law made by the former president of America Obama for it to be closed down.
translation.ibo: Trump kwukwara na ya chọrọ ka ụlọmkpọrọ a na-akpọ Guantanamo Bay ghere oghe na-eweghachi iwu onye buburu onyeisiala Amerịka bụ Obama nyere ka emechie ya.

translation.en: The economy of America is on the increase yet people have not accepted their president Trump.
translation.ibo: Akụnaụba mba Amerịka na-arị elu mana ndị mmadụ anabataghị onyeisiala ha bụ Trump.

translation.en: the actors of 'Black Panther' show cased Africa in their opening ceremony.
translation.ibo: Ndị ome ihe nkiri 'Black Panther' gosiri Afrịka n'emume mbido ha

translation.en: The actors of 'Black Panther' are being talked of for portraying Africa in their opening ceremony..
translation.ibo: Akpụ ndị mere ihe nkiri 'Black Panther' n'ọnụ maka otu ha si gosi Afrịka n'emume mbido ha.

translation.en: Actors of the movie 'Black Panther' portrayed African tradition in the unveiling of this movie produced by Marvel studio.
translation.ibo: Ndị so mee ihe nkiri 'Black Panther' goziri omenala Afrịka mgbe ha gara mmeme mbido ya bụ ihe nkiri nke ụlọọrụ Marvel mepụtara.

translation.en: They all dressed like people from different African countries in other to portray Africa well.
translation.ibo: Ha niile kere ekike mba Afrịka di icheiche maka na ha kwuru sị na ọ dị mkpa igosi Afrịka nke ọma.

translation.en: Chadwick Boseman who acted as T'Challa, king of Wakanda, who the movie 'Black Panther' was made for, led other actors to Los Angeles where the ocassion was held.
translation.ibo: Chadwick Boseman bụ onye jere ozi dịka T'Challa, Eze mba Wakanda, bụ onye e ji maka ya mee ihe nkiri 'Black Panther', duuru ndị ọzọ nọ n'ihe nkiri a gaa ebe emere mmeme a na Los Angeles.

translation.en: People like Lupita Nyong'o, David Oyelowo, Daniel Kaluuya, Michael B Jordan, Danai Gurira and Angela Bassett dressed like Africans.
translation.ibo: Ndị dịka Lupita Nyong'o, David Oyelowo, Daniel Kaluuya, Michael B Jordan, Danai Gurira na Angela Bassett kere ekike ndị Afrịka.

translation.en: In the invite for this occassion, they were asked to dress like 'African kings'.
translation.ibo: N'akwụkwọ eji gwa ndị mmadụ maka mmeme a, e dere sị ha jikere ka 'ndị eze Afrịka'.

translation.en: David Oyelowo who is a Nigerian and his Jessica also came for this occasion.
translation.ibo: David Oyelowo bụ nwa afọ Naịjirịa na Nwunye bụ Jessica so bịa emume a

translation.en: Janeshia Adams-Ginyard replaced Danai Gurari as older Dora Milaje in this movie
translation.ibo: Janeshia Adams-Ginyard nọchitere anya Danai Gurari dịka Okoye Dora Milaje na ihe nkiri a

translation.en: Lupita Nyong'o from Kenya got an Oscar award because of this movie.
translation.ibo: Lupita Nyong'o bụ onye Kenya nweterela ihe nrite ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Oscar

translation.en: Chadwick Boseman acted as T'Challa in this movie
translation.ibo: Chadwick Boseman bụ onye mere ka T'Challa n'ihe nkiri a

translation.en: Danai Gurira from Zimbabwe acted as older Dora Milaje in this movie.
translation.ibo: Danai Gurira bụ nwa afọ Zimbabwe mere ka Okoye Dora Milaje n'ime ihe nkiri a

translation.en: Would it be good for other actors in Hollywood to immitate their behaviour.
translation.ibo: Ọ ga-adị mma ka ndị ome ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na Hollywood bido ije omume ha a?

translation.en: Prostitution business: eleven people have been arrested in Spain.
translation.ibo: Mgbere Akwụna: Anwụchiela mmadụ iri na otu na Spain

translation.en: Nigerian women that were used for prostitution in Spain said that charms were used to scare them on phone.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị Naijirịa eji agba mgbere akwụna na Spain sị na-eji ọtụmọkpọ yi ha egwu na ekwenti.

translation.en: Prostitutes in Benin
translation.ibo: Ndị akwụna nọ na Benin

translation.en: The Nigerian government have expressed great grief on women traffiking.
translation.ibo: Izupu ụmụnwaanyị n'ala Naijirịa na-eweta nwute nye ndị gọọmentị Naijirịa

translation.en: The police in Spain have arrested eleven persons that are involved in prostitution business.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụweojii nọ na Spain anwụchiela mmadụ iri na otu ndị asi na-atụ mgbere akwụna.

translation.en: it was also said that they sent some Nigerian women out for money.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ kwukwara na ha ji ụfọdụ ụmụ nwaanyị Naijirịa ezupuru n'obodo akpa ego.

translation.en: They were locked up in Zaragoza where the police rescued sixteen women from sexual slavery.
translation.ibo: Anwụchiri ha na obodo akpọrọ Zaragoza ebe ndị uwe ojii zọpụtara umu nwaanyi iri na isii emere ohu mmetọ ahụ.

translation.en: charm was used to scare them on phone.
translation.ibo: E ji ọtụmọkpọ yi ha egwu n'ekwenti.

translation.en: They were mandated to pay some sum that was used to send them out.
translation.ibo: A manyere ha iwu ikwụ ụgwọ akpakọtara ejị si na Naijirịa zupu ha.

translation.en: These women were convinced that they would live better lives in Europe.
translation.ibo: Aghọriri ụmụnwaanyi ndịa n'ikwete na ha ga-ebi ndụ kacha nma na yuropụ

translation.en: It was said that the members of this group have meetings in Italy, Germany and also Denmark.
translation.ibo: E kwuru na ndị otu a nwere njikọ na Italy,Germany nakwa Denmark.

translation.en: US and EU have expressed disapproval of Odinga's swearing in of himself to office.
translation.ibo: Mba US, EU akatọla idu iyi ọrụ Odinga dụrụ onwe ya

translation.en: US and the European Union have shown disapproval to Raila Odinga of Kenya who took over the government forcefully.
translation.ibo: Mba US na otu jikọrọ mba ndị ọcha akpọrọ EU n' aha ịchafụ akatọla iyi ọrụ Raila Odinga nke Kenya dụrụ onwe ya

translation.en: The US president Donald Trump has said that he is in great sorrow for African nations.
translation.ibo: Onyeisi ala US bụ Donald Trump kwuola na ya nwere 'nnukwu mkwayere ugu nye ndị mba Afrịka

translation.en: In the 'US Department' publication on the internet, they said that: ' The United States is saddened by the swearing in to office of Raila Odinga on the thirtieth of January who is in opposition to the Kenyan government.
translation.ibo: N' akwụkwọ ozi, ngalaba 'US Department' tinyere na websait ha, ha kwuru sị: ' Yunaited Steeti na-enwe obi mwute n' iyi ọrụ nke onye ndu ndị na- ama gọọmenti Kenya aka n'ihu bụ Raila Odinga duru onwe ya ka ọnwa Jenuwari gbara ịrị atọ.

translation.en: We reject any form of opposition to the Kenyan government.
translation.ibo: Anyi na-ajụ agwa ọbụla nke megidere Iwu ala Kenya.

translation.en: 'Uhuru Kenyatta was elected as the president of Kenya on the twentieth of October 2017. That was adopted by the Kenyan high court'.
translation.ibo: 'A họpụtara Uhuru Kenyatta dịka onyeisi ala Kenya ka ọnwa Ọctoba afọ 2017 dị iri abụọ na ntuliaka nke ụlọikpe kachasị elu na Kenya kwadoro.

translation.en: Anyone who does not agree to this should follow the due process.
translation.ibo: 'Onye ọbụla nwere mkpesa ọbụla kwesiri isoro usoro iwu ala debere.

translation.en: US also showed their displeasure on the Kenyan government that shut down a press house in Kenya saying that it is a democratic system that the leaders in Kenya, should start creating room for peaceful dialogue and unity.
translation.ibo: US katọkwara otu gọọmentị Kenya siri mechie ụlọ ntaakụkọ na Kenya si, na ohere onye kwue ka ọ dị ya dị mkpa na ọchịchị onyekwueuche ya, ma rịọ ka ndị ndu na ndị a na-achị na Kenya bido mkparịta ụka maka ịkpa udo na ịdịnaotu.

translation.en: In the same vein, the EU union said that the swearing in of Raila Odinga is against the law and also showed disapproval in the shutting down of the media house, Uhuru Kenyatta .
translation.ibo: N' otu aka ahụ, otu EU kwuru na iyi ọrụ Raila Odinga duru onwe ya megidere iwu ma katọkwa mmechi gọọment Uhuru Kenyatta mechiri ụlọ ntaakụkọ atọ.

translation.en: Remember that the government has previouly shut down three TV stations for showing the swearing in of Raila Odinga as the president of Kenya, while the court in Kenya stopped this on Wednesday.
translation.ibo: Cheta na Gọọmenti etiti mechiburu ụlọọrụ ngosi TV atọ maka na ha gbasara ozi gosịrị Raila Odinga ebe ọ na-edu onwe ya iyi ọrụ ma kpọkwa onwe ya onyeisiala mba Kenya, ebe ulọikpe Kenya akwụsịrị mmechi ahụ ụbọchị Wenesde.

translation.en: Urinary cancer has killed more people than breast cancer.
translation.ibo: Ọrịa Kansa akpamamịrị egbuola karịa kansa ara

translation.en: Research has shown that many men die of urinary cancer
translation.ibo: Nchọpụta ekwuola na ọtụtụ ụmụnwoke na-anwụ site n'ọrịa kansa akpamamịrị.

translation.en: A cancer patient
translation.ibo: Onye na-arịa kansa

translation.en: Urinary cancer is more evidenced in men that are up to forty years old.
translation.ibo: Ọrịa Kansa akpamamịrị na-aka egosi oge ụmụnwọke ruru afọ iri anọ

translation.en: The number of men who die of urinary cancer has outnumbered the number of women who die of breast cancer as research has shown in UK.
translation.ibo: Ọnụọgụgụ ụmụnwoke na-anwụ site n'ọrịa kansa akpamamịrị akarịala ọnụogụgụ ụmụnwaanyị na-anwụ site n'ọrịa kansa ara dịka nchọpụta siri kwuo na mba UK.

translation.en: Men grow old means that many still die from that illness.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwoke na-aka nka pụtakwara na ọtụtụ ka na-enweta mana anwụ site n'ọrịa ahụ.

translation.en: scientists for cancer in UK have sid that the search for the cure of breast cancer is yielding fruits while investing on urinary cancer would be helpful.
translation.ibo: Ndị nyocha gbasara ọrịa kansa nọ na mba UK kwuru na nchọpụta na ọgwugwọ a na-eme maka kansa ara na-amịta mkpụrụ ebe itinye ego gbasara kansa akpamamịrị umụnwoke ga-enyekwa aka.

translation.en: Statistics has shown that from 2015, 11,819 people died from urinary cancer while 11,442 people died from breast cancer
translation.ibo: Nchọpụta ọnụọgụgụ pụtara site n'afọ 2015 gosiri na mmadụ 11,819 nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa akpamamịrị ebe mmadụ 11,442 nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa ara.

translation.en: Cancer of the bladder is common among men in UK
translation.ibo: Kansa akpamamịrị kachasị n'ụmụnwoke nọ na UK

translation.en: health workers have said their findings on the best time to cure cancer
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụahụike ekwuola na nchọpụta n'oge kachasị mkpa iji gwọ akpụ kansa.

translation.en: BBC Igbo asked doctor Remi Ajekibe a question, he said that breast cancer kills more than urinary cancer in Nigeria
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo gbara Dọkịnta akpọrọ Remi Ajekigbe ajụjụ ọnụ,o kwuru na ọrịa kansa ara ka egbu karịa ọrịa kansa akapamamịrị na Naijirịa.

translation.en: He said that the problem comes more when the men do not come for test on time. They always come when the situation is worse.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na ebe nsogbu na dịkari bụ na ụmụnwoke anaghị bia nyocha ahụ n'oge.Ha na bia mgbe ihe ọ ka njọ.

translation.en: They go round teaching people in schools, churches, banks and other places about cancer and how to prevent it.
translation.ibo: A na-agagharị na-akuziri ndị mmadụ n'ulọ akwukwọ,chọọchị,ulọakụ na ebe ndị ọzọ maka ọria Kansa nakwa ka esi egbochi ya'.

translation.en: These activities will be held to commence the day for fight against cancer on the fourth of Februry.
translation.ibo: Emume ndị a ka a ga-eji nabata ụbọchị nrụbama ibuso agha ọrịa kansa bụ Februwarị anọ.

translation.en: Tinubu: Obasanjo's letter is a campaign joke.
translation.ibo: Tinubu: Edemede Obasanjo bụ egwuregwu ndọrọndọrọ

translation.en: Bola Tinubu has called Obasanjo's famous letter to Buhari 'a campaign joke'.
translation.ibo: Bola Tinubu akpọọla edemede n'ewu ewu nke Obasanjo degara Buhari 'egwuregwu ndọrọndọrọ'.

translation.en: Tinubu in an APC gathering of 2015 election said 'the letter is a cunny one'.
translation.ibo: Tinubu ebe ọ nọ na ọgbakọ ndị otu ya bụ APC na ntuliaka nke afọ 2015 kwuru sị 'Edemede ahụ bụ nke aghụghọ'

translation.en: The leader of the political party, APC, Bola Ahmed Tinubu has spoken about Obasanjo's letter to Buhari.
translation.ibo: Onyeisi otu nọ n'ọkwa ọchịchị nke a na-akpọ APC bụ Bola Ahmed Tinubu ekwupụtala okwu maka ihe edemede Obasanjo degara Buhari.

translation.en: He said that Obasanjo is playing 'campaign joke' in that letter.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na Obasanjo na-egwu 'egwuregwu ndọrọndọrọ' n'edemede ahụ.

translation.en: He said that they both ruled under the military regime, Obasanjo was supposed to privately advice him instead of a public display.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na ebe ha abụọ bụ ndịchịrị n'okpuru ndị agha, Obasanjo kwesiri ịkpọ ya n'azụ dọọ ya aka na ntị kama ị gwa ya n'ihu ọha.

translation.en: It is about two weeks Obasanjo wrote a letter to Buhari asking him not to run for the 2019 election.
translation.ibo: O ruola izuụka abụọ Obasanjo degara Buhari edemede ahụ na-asị ya ritue n'ọkwa, ghara ịzọ ọchịchị na afọ 2019.

translation.en: He said that if Obasanjo was sincere, he would have called president Buhari in private.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na ọbụrụ n'obi dị Obsanjọ ocha, o kwesiri ịkpọ onyeisiala Buhari n'akụkụ gbaa ya izu.

translation.en: He said this to press men who asked him questions in Owerri as he was about going for the ceremony in honour of Alex Ekwueme.
translation.ibo: O kwuru nke a ebe ndị ntaakụkọ gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ na Owere (Owerri) ka ọ na-akwado ịga mmemme nkwanye ugwu Alex Ekwụeme.

translation.en: The wife of the boko haram doctor has surrendered to the soldiers.
translation.ibo: Nwunye dibia Boko Haram achịliele aka elu nye ndị agha

translation.en: Rabi Abu-Yasir told the Nigerian soldiers that her husband is the doctor to the boko haram leader Abubakar Shekau.
translation.ibo: Rabi Abu-Yasir gwara ndị agha Naịjirịa na di ya bụ dibia onyeisi ndị otu Boko Haram bụ Abubakara Shekau.

translation.en: Boko haram members.
translation.ibo: Ndị agaha Boko Haram

translation.en: Lafia Dole is the name given to the war against boko haram since 2015.
translation.ibo: Lafia Dole bụ aha agha ebidoro ibuso Boko Haram kamgbe afọ 2015.

translation.en: The wife of the doctor that sees to the health of the boko haram leader Rabi Abu-Yasir surrendered to the Nigerian soldiers on saturday third of February in Lafia Dole war.
translation.ibo: Onye bụ nwunye dibia na-ahụ maka ahụike onyeisi otu Boko Haram bụ Rabi Abu-Yasir chiliri ndị agha Naịjirịa aka elu ụbọchị Satodee abalị atọ nke ọnwa Febuwarị dịka ha naebu agha a na-akpọ Lafia Dole.

translation.en: The commander of the Lafia Dole war, Major general Rogers Nicholas said this when he gave the Borno State police seventy-two women and children rescued from boko haram.
translation.ibo: Onye nchịkwa agha Lafia Dole bụ Major General Rogers Nicholas kwupụtara nke a oge o nyefere ụmụnwaanyị na ụmụaka dị mmadụ iri asatọ na abụọ ha gbapụtara n'aka ndị Boko Haram ma nyefee ha n'aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa na Borno steti.

translation.en: Rabi told news men that her husband is the doctor in charge of the well being of the boko haram leader Abubakar Shekau.
translation.ibo: Rabi gwara ndị ntaakụkọ na di ya bụ dibia na-elebanye anya n'ahụike onyeisi Boko Haram bụ Abubakar Shekau.

translation.en: She said that she was rescued on Friday as the Nigerian police chased the boko haram members out from Sambisa forest.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na a gbapụtara ya ụbọchị Fraide dịka ndị agha Naịjirịa chụpụrụ ndị Boko Haram nọ nime ọhịa Sambisa.

translation.en: As she told of her ordeal with them, Rabi said that she was pleased with the care she got as Shekau's doctor's wife.
translation.ibo: Dịka ọ na-ekwupụta ka ya na ihe si gaa, Rabi kwuru na ọ masịrị ya etu esi na eledo ya anya maka ọkwa ọ nọ dịka nwunye dibia Shekau.

translation.en: In her words, 'my husband, Abu-Yasir Shekau's doctor also takes care of other sick persons that are in pains.
translation.ibo: N'okwu ya, 'Dị m, abu-Yasirbụ dibia Shekau, ọ na-eledokwa ndị ọzọ ahụ na-adịghị ma na-emekwa iwe ahụ.

translation.en: I was treated as the wife of doctor Shekau
translation.ibo: Etu esi eme m Rabi dịka nwunye dibia Shekau

translation.en: The food I eat is different from the food given to women and children in the forest.
translation.ibo: Ụdị nri m na-eri dị iche n'ihe a na-enye ụmụnwaanyị na ụmụaka ndị ọzọ nọ n'ogige ahụ.

translation.en: We suffered in their hands and they warned us that the Nigerian soldiers would kill anyone who surrenders himself to them.
translation.ibo: Anyị tara ahụhụ n'aka ha, ha dọkwara anyị aka na ntị na ndị agha Naịjirịa ga-egbu onye ọbụla nyefere onwe ya n'aka ha.'

translation.en: Shekau is most wanted in Nigeria now.
translation.ibo: Ana chosi Shekau ike na Naịjirịa ugbua.

translation.en: They told us to always be for them and obey their members but the Nigerian soldiers takes care of us beyond what the Boko Haram told us
translation.ibo: Ha gwara anyị oge ọbụla ka anyị nọnyere ha ma rube isi nye ndị otu ha, mana ndị agha Naịjirịa na-eledo anyị anya na-abụghị ihe ndị Boko Haram gwara nyị.

translation.en: Rabi praised the Nigerian soldiers for releasing them and beckoned on others who were kidnapped and are still in the forest to come out and surrender themselves to the soldiers.
translation.ibo: Rabi toro ndị agha Naịjirịa maka mgbapụta agbapụtara ha ebe ọ kpọkuru ndị a tọrọatọ bụ ndịka nọ nime ọhịa ka ha pụta bịa nyefee onwe ha n'aka ndị agha.

translation.en: Nicholas the press man in the Lafia Dole war explained that Rabi is one of the seventy-four people released by the soldiers.
translation.ibo: Nichola bụ onye nchịkọta agha Lafia Dole kọwara na Rabi sọ na mmadụ iri asatọ na anọ ndị agha gbapụtara.

translation.en: He said that seven out of seventy-four people released are receiving treatment in good Nigerian hospitals.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na mmadụ asatọ nime mmadụ iri asatọ na anọ ahụ agbapụtara na-anata ọgwụgwọ n'ụlọọgwụ ndị agha elu Naịjirịa.

translation.en: The press man said that those people kidnapped by Boko Haram are passing through great pain/punishment.
translation.ibo: Onye nchịkota ahụ kwuru na ndị ahụ a tọrọ na-agabiga ntaramahụhụ di egwu n'aka ndị Boko Haram.

translation.en: Nicholas revealed that those people were released by Boko Haram, chased them away and took over the headquarters Shekau in Sambisa forest.
translation.ibo: Nicholas mere ka a mata na a gbapụtara ndị ahụ site n'aka ndị Boko Haram,chụpụb ha ma nọchie isioche Shekau dị n'ọhịa Sambisa.

translation.en: civil servants in Imo will go back to working for five days in a week.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ Imo ga-alaghachị ịrụ ọrụ abali ise n'izuụka

translation.en: Rochas Okorocha said that the crisis has ended thus, civil servants will start working all through the working days of the week.
translation.ibo: Rochas Okorocha sị na ọtanisi ebeela, yabụ na ndị ọrụ ga-ebido ibịazu ọrụ n'izu.

translation.en: Rochas Okorocha has instituted the minisrty of happiness that is headed by his sister.
translation.ibo: Rochas Okorocha wepụtara ụlọọrụ na ahụ maka aṅụri nke nwanne ya nwaanyị bụ onye ndu.

translation.en: The governor of Imo State, Rochas Okorocha has lifted the law of civil servants working for just three days in a week.
translation.ibo: Gọvanọ Imo Steeti bụ Rochas Okorocha eweliela iwu ahụ o tinyere maka ndị ọrụ bekee ịbia ọrụ abalị atọ n'izuụka.

translation.en: Okorocha said this when he met with news men in the seven years celebration of no payment of school fees in Imo State.
translation.ibo: Okorocha kwuru nke a mgbe ya na ndị ntaakụkọ zukọrọ ka ọ na-akwado ime mmemme o ji echeta na ụmụ akwụkwọ n'Imo steeti anọọla afọ asaa ma akwụghị ụgwọ akwụkwọ.

translation.en: Rochas mandated against payment of school fees in Imo State when he resumed office.
translation.ibo: Rochas machiri ịkwụ ụgwọ akwụkwọ n'Imo steetị mgbe ọ banyere n'ọchịchị.

translation.en: He said that workers will start going to work five days in a week starting from the first day of March because Nigeria is no longer in crisis.
translation.ibo: Ọsị na ndị ọrụ ga-amalite ịga ọrụ ụbọchị ise n'ime otu izu site n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị maka na ọtanisi nke jibu obodo Naịjirịa ebeela.

translation.en: The witness has said that he was called to join the killing.
translation.ibo: Onye akaebe ekwuola na a kpọrọ ya n'ọrụ ọchụ Ozubulu

translation.en: The eye witness to the Ozubulu killings of 2017 has said in court that he was called to join in the killing
translation.ibo: Onye akaebe n'ikpe ọnwụ mere n'ụlọụka Ozubulu n'afọ 2017 ekwuola na-akpọrọ ya ka o soro ga ọrụ ahụ.'

translation.en: Saint Philip Catholic Church, Ozubulu.
translation.ibo: Ụlọụka St Philip Catholic Church Ozobulu

translation.en: Gun men went to Saint Philip Catholic Church and killed thirteen people who came to church in the month of August, 2017.
translation.ibo: Ndị ji egbe gara ụka na St Philip Catholic Church, Ozobulu gbagbu mmadụ iri na atọ biara ụka n' ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017

translation.en: Chukwujekwu Eze said in the high court in Nnewi, Anambra State that he was called for a work to deal with a man named Aloysius Ikegwuonwu who is also known as 'Bishop' but he refused because he does not want to kill for money.
translation.ibo: Chukwujekwu Eze kwuru n'ụlọikpe ukwu dị na Nnewi, Anambara Steeti na a kpọrọ ya n'ọrụ imemila otu nwoke bụ Aloysius Ikegwuonwu nke ama ama dịka, 'Bishọp' mana ya ekweghị n'ihi na ya achọghị inweta ego site n'ịkwafu ọbara.

translation.en: gun men killed thirteen people in church at St. Philip Catholic Church, Ozobulu in the month of August 2017.
translation.ibo: Ndị ji egbe gbagburu mmadụ iri na atọ ndị biara ụka na, St Philip Catholic Church, Ozobulu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017.

translation.en: we want peace and justice.
translation.ibo: Anyị chọrọ udo na ikpe zuru oke

translation.en: Chukwujekwu Eze said: There was a young man whose name is Okpanda that told me that they wanted to go for work in Bishop's place at Ozubulu
translation.ibo: Chukwujekwu Eze kwuru sị: 'O nwere otu nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Okpanda onye gwara m na ha chọrọ ịga be 'Bishop' n'Ozubulu ga rụọ ọrụ.

translation.en: I asked him what type of work it is, he told me that bishop is owing people in South-Africa, that they want to go to his place and kill every living thing there.
translation.ibo: A jụrụ m ya ụdị ọrọ ọ bụ, ya agwa m na Bishop ji ndị mmadụ ụgwọ na Saụt-Afrịka, na ha chọrọ ịga be ya gbagbuo ihe niile dị ndụ.

translation.en: I asked him who sent him, he said Obrocho.
translation.ibo: 'A jụrụ m ya onye zigara ha, ya asị na ọ bụ Obrocho.

translation.en: When I brought it up, Okpando said that he would help me if I go with them for the work at Bishop's place. I told him that I did not want to soil my hands with blood.
translation.ibo: Mgbe m kwulitere ya, Okpanda, kwuru na ọ ga-enyere m aka ma ọ bụrụ na m soro gaa ọrụ n'ụlọ Bishọp. Agwara m ya na achọghị m ịkwọ aka ọbara.

translation.en: Eze went on to say that it was when he went to answer Okpanda's invite to his house on that day was one of the days he saw Doby (Onyemaechi Mbanefo), one of the people accused to have committed the crime, the two persons tried to convince him to join them in the crime but he refused.
translation.ibo: Eze gara n'ihu kwuo na ọ bụ mgbe ọ gara ịza oku Okpanda kpọrọ ya n'ụlọ ya ụbọchị so ụbọchị ahụ ka ọ hụrụ Dobby (Onyemaechi Mbanefo), otu na ndị eboro ebubo na ha kpara mkpamkpa ahụ, ha abụọ ndị gbara mbọ rịọ ya ka o soro gaa ije ahụ mana o kweghị.

translation.en: In the crime investigation is : Onyebuchi Mbanefo.
translation.ibo: Ndị e boro ebubo na ọ bụ ha kpara nkata ghọrọ ngịga n'okwu mkpamkpa ahụ mere bụ: Onyebuchi Mbanefo, 46, Chukwudi Ugwu, 30 na Great Chinedu Akpunonu, 44.

translation.en: Others who were said to have joined in this vice have not been caught.
translation.ibo: E jidebeghị ndị ọzọ e kwuru na ha soro mee mpụ a.

translation.en: These news would interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ndị ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: the burnt Timbershade market is being rebuilt.
translation.ibo: Aruziwela ahịa Timbershade gbara ọkụ
