translation.ibo: Uru ọmụgwọ bara n'omenala Igbo

translation.en: Two Nigerian soldiers have been killed in Plateau
translation.ibo: Egbuola ndịagha Naịjirịa abụọ na Plateau

translation.en: Dani Carvajal: no charm can stop Neymar
translation.ibo: Dani Carvajal: Onweghi ọgwụ ga egbochi Neymar

translation.en: Dani Carvajal of Real Madrid has said his thought on Neymar because of their match with PSG
translation.ibo: Dani Carvajal nke Real Madrid ekwuola uche ya n'ebe Neymar nọ maka asọmpi ha na ndị PSG.

translation.en: Neymar left Barcelona club for PSG club
translation.ibo: Neymar siri otu bọọlụ Barcelona gawa PSG

translation.en: As the sixteenth EUFA champions league is being planned to commence within this week, where Real Madrid club will meet Paris Saint Germain club.
translation.ibo: Dịka a na-akwado igba asọmpi Eufa Champions nke agba iri na isii n'ime izuka a, ebe ndị Real Madrid ga-ezute ndị Paris Saint-Germain.

translation.en: Dani Carvajal a Madrid player said that there is no 'charm' that can stop Neymar as he expects Neymar to go on a day rest.
translation.ibo: Onye na-agbara Madrid bọọlụ bụ Dani Carvajal kwuru na onweghi 'ọgwụ' nwereike igbochi Neymar, dịka ọ na-atụ anya ka Neymar laa ezụmike n'otu ụbọchị.

translation.en: Neymar poses a threat to Real Madrird players as they are about to play against PSG in the premier league.
translation.ibo: Neymar dịka ihe iyi egwu nye ndị Madrid dịka ha na-aga izuta ndị PSG n'asọmpi ụkwụ nke mbụ.

translation.en: Carvajal who would not play in this premiership league said that 'while playing against Neymar, nothing could stop him from beating one in the game;.
translation.ibo: Carvajal, onye na-agaghị agba bọọlụ nke mbụ a si; 'Mgbe gị na Neymar na-amaka bọọlụ, o nweghi ụdị ọgwụ ọbụla pụrụ igbochi ya emela nke ọma.'

translation.en: He also said that Madrid players 'should be hopeful that he 'Neymar' would not be on his good day.
translation.ibo: Ọ sikwa ka ndị Madrid 'Nwe olileanya ka ọ [Neymar] ghara ị nọ n'ụbọchị ọma ya'

translation.en: He said that nobody knows who would be the winner in the competition between these two groups.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na amabeghi onye ga-eme nke ọma n'asọmpi ahụ ga-adị n'etiti ndị otu abụọ ndị a.

translation.en: This story will interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị

translation.en: What you do not know about the bread fruit that you eat
translation.ibo: Ihe ị na-amaghị maka ụkwa ị na-eri

translation.en: Can you cook egusi soup?
translation.ibo: Ịma esi ofe egwusi?

translation.en: Learn it here
translation.ibo: Mụta ya ebe a

translation.en: A woman with gun has injured three people in YouTube headquarters.
translation.ibo: Nwanyị bu egbe emerụọla mmadụ ato ahụ n'isiụlọọrụ YouTube

translation.en: Two people have been injured from a bullet of a messenger who broke his leg while running for his life on YouTube.
translation.ibo: Mmadụ abụọ emerụọla ahụ site na mgbo ebe otu onye ọzọ lojiri ọkpa ebe ọ na-agba ọsọ na mwakpo Youtube.

translation.en: Police in front of the YouTube office
translation.ibo: Ndị uweoji n'ihu ụlọọrụ Youtube

translation.en: YouTube is a subsidiary of Google
translation.ibo: Youtube bụ ụlọọrụ nọ n'ọkpuru Google

translation.en: Police from the Northern California has said that an armed woman injured three people in YouTube headquarters before committing suicide.
translation.ibo: Ndị uweoji na mpaghara ugwu California ekwuola n'otu nwaanyị bu egbe emerụọla mmadụ atọ ahụ n'isiụlọọrụ na-emepụta ihe onoyonyo a kpọrọ Youtube tupu o gbuo onwe ya.

translation.en: American press men have identified the woman as Nasim Aghadam and said that it was family dispute that instigated such act.
translation.ibo: Ndị ntaakụkọ na mba Amerika enye la aha nwanyị a ka Nasim Aghadam ma kwukwa na ọ bụ esemoku ezịnaụlọ kpatara mwakpo a

translation.en: It is believed that among the injured persons is a man who is her friend in the office. CBS speaks.
translation.ibo: E chere na otu nwoke so na ndị merụrụ ahụ ụnyahụ bụ enyi ya nwoke ụlọọrụ, CBS na-ekwu.

translation.en: Two women of ages 32 and 27 were injured in the killing.
translation.ibo: Umu nwaanyị abụọ dị afọ 32 na ọzọ dị 27 merụrụ ahụ na mwakpo a.

translation.en: Despite this, news men are saying, the police has not said why the woman got armed and killed people on YouTube
translation.ibo: N'agbanyehi nke a ndị ntaakụko na-ekwu, ndị uweoji ekwụpụtabeghị ihe nwaanyị ji buru egbe wakpo ndị mmadụ na Youtube.

translation.en: YouTube workers explained what happened on air.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ na Youtube kọwara ihe na-eme n'elu igwe okwu:

translation.en: Aghadam who was a video producer on YouTube castigated YouTube in the past because he said that they hinder his videos from going on air.
translation.ibo: Aghadam bụbu onye na-emepụta ihe onyonyo na Youtube katọrọ Youtube n'oge gara aga maka ọ sị na ha na-akpachị ihe onyonyo ya.

translation.en: This story will interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị

translation.en: Five reporters can replace Conte
translation.ibo: Ndị nchịkọta ise nwere ike ịnọchi Conte

translation.en: Ibrahimovic has entered LA Galaxy with two goals.
translation.ibo: Ibrahimovic ejirela goolu abụo bata LA Galaxy

translation.en: a sibling has killed a sibling in Sango Ota
translation.ibo: Nwanne egbuola nwanne ya na Sango Ota

translation.en: Do you know that cola nut does not understand English in Igbo land?
translation.ibo: Ị ma na ọjị anaghị anụ bekee n'ala Igbo?

translation.en: The Igbos say that he who brings cola, brings life. That is why cola nut is very important in the Igbo culture.
translation.ibo: Igbo na-asị n'onye wetara ọjị wetara ndụ, ya mere ọjị ji bụrụ ihe dị oke mkpa n'omenala Igbo.

translation.en: Igbo Cola nut
translation.ibo: Oji Igbo

translation.en: He who brings cola, brings life.'
translation.ibo: Onye wetara ọjị wetara ndụ'

translation.en: Cola nut is one of the things that must be seen in any occasion in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Ọjị bụ otu ihe ị ga-ahụrịrị n'emume ọbụla gbasara ala Igbo.

translation.en: Cola nut and breaking of cola nut is very important in the Igbo tradition because the Igbos say ' he who brings cola, brings life'.
translation.ibo: Ọjị na ịwa ọjị dị oke mkpa n'omenala ndị Igbo, maka na Igbo na-ekwu na 'onye wetara ọjị wetara ndụ'.

translation.en: Some Igbos believe that cola nut means 'a tradition that binds the Igbos together'.
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ ndị Igbo kwenyere na ỌJỊ pụtara 'Omenala Jikọtara Igbo'.

translation.en: How cola nut is gotten
translation.ibo: Etu esi enweta ọjị

translation.en: Cola nut is a seed that is planted. It also germinates on its own.
translation.ibo: Ọjị bụ mkpụrụ osisi a na-akụ akụ ma na ọ na-epukwara onwe ya.

translation.en: cola nut can germinate in a domestic area or in the forest
translation.ibo: Ọjị nwere ike ịmị n'ụlọ ma mịkwaa n'ọhịa.

translation.en: types of cola nut
translation.ibo: Ụdịrị ọjị dị

translation.en: There are different types of cola nut, some are named based on their nature.
translation.ibo: Enwere ụdịrị ọjị dị iche iche, ụfọdụ na-aza aha site n'etu o si mịpụta.

translation.en: In Nigeria, there is colanut for the Igbos and Hausas. There also is for the Westerners known as the Yorubas.
translation.ibo: Abịa na Naịjirịa, enwere ọjị Igbo ma nwee ọjị ugwu Awụsa ma nwekwaa nke ndị ọdịda anyanwụ bụ ndị Yoroba.

translation.en: Igbo cola nuts are naturally segmented from three to seven parts.
translation.ibo: Ọjị Igbo na-agbakarị n'ibe sitere n'atọ ruo ibe asaa.

translation.en: The Igbos respect cola nuts that have seven partitions, some even kill fowls when they see this cola nut.
translation.ibo: Igbo na-akwanyere ọjị gbara ibe asaa ugwu, ụfọdụ na-egbukwa ọkụkọ ma ha hụ ya bụ ọjị.

translation.en: Hausa Cola nut
translation.ibo: Ọjị Awụsa

translation.en: Different cola nut names
translation.ibo: Aha ọjị dị iche iche

translation.en: Eagle cola nut is the one that is white in colour, it is called Eagle because it is beautiful to behold.
translation.ibo: Ọjị ugo bụ nke na-acha ọcha, a na-akpọ ya ugo maka na ọ na-ama mma n'anya

translation.en: Ikenga colanut has three parts, it is mostly red in colour.
translation.ibo: Ọjị ikenga na-enwe ibe atọ, na-achakarị uhie uhie

translation.en: The Hausa colanut is called 'Gworo' it has two parts and it is mostly white in colour.
translation.ibo: Ọjị ndị awụsa bụ nke a na-akpọ 'gworo', ọ na-enwe ibe abụọ na-achakarị ọcha

translation.en: Importance of Colanut
translation.ibo: Uru ọjị bara

translation.en: The Igbos believe that colanut does not in anywy understand English, that is why it is used for different Igbo traditions such as:
translation.ibo: Ndị Igbo kwenyere na ọjị anaghị anụ bekee n'ụzọ ọbụla, ya mere eji eji ya eme omenala ndị Igbo dị iche iche dịka:

translation.en: It is used for marriage in Igbo land
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị alụ nwaanyị n'ala Igbo

translation.en: It is used to welcome visitors
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị anabata ọbịa

translation.en: It is used to reconcile a dispute between people
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị edozi esemokwu n'etiti ndị mmadụ

translation.en: It is used to pray
translation.ibo: Eji agba agọ ọfọ/ekpe ekpere

translation.en: It is used to offer sacrifice
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị achụ aja

translation.en: It is used for convenants
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị agba ndụ

translation.en: It is used for burials
translation.ibo: Eji ọjị akwa ozu

translation.en: In Igbo land , giving a stranger colanut means that you have welcomed him, it also shows that you love him and trusts him.
translation.ibo: N'ala Igbo, inye onye ọbịa ọjị gosiri na ị nabatara ya, o na-egosikwa na ị hụrụ ya n'anya nke ukwuu ma nwekwaa ntụkwasị obi n'ebe ọ nọ.

translation.en: Things that are eaten with colanut
translation.ibo: Ihe a na-eji ata ọjị

translation.en: In the Igbo tradition, there are other things that are eaten with colanut.
translation.ibo: N'omenala Igbo, enwere ihe ndị ọzọ a na-eji ata ọjị

translation.en: what the whites call Alligator pepper
translation.ibo: Ose ọjị nke bekee kpọrọ alligator pepper

translation.en: What the whites call bitter cola
translation.ibo: Akị ilu nke bekee kpọrọ bitter kola

translation.en: pepper fruit
translation.ibo: Mmịmị

translation.en: Some eat colanut with chalk
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ na-eji nzu ata ọjị

translation.en: Peanut Butter
translation.ibo: Ose ọjị akwọrọ akwọ

translation.en: Breaking of colanut
translation.ibo: Ịwa ọjị

translation.en: Before colanut is broken in Igbo land, prayer is said first
translation.ibo: Tupu awaa ọjị n'ala Igbo, a na-ebu ụzọ gọọ ọjị (kpeere ya ekpere).

translation.en: It is the law for the oldest person to pray on the colanut, while some five the youngest person the colanut to break and share.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ iwu na onye kachasị bụrụ okenye ga-agọ ọjị, ebe ụfọdụ na-enye onye kacha bụrụ nwata ka ọ waa ya ma kesaa ya.

translation.en: A man cannot break colanut in the place he married from, neither can he break the colanut in the gathering where there are older persons unless he was mandated to.
translation.ibo: Nwoke anaghị awa ọjị na be ndị ọgọ ya, ọ gaghị awakwa ọjị ebe ndị tọrọ ya nọ na-abụghị ma ha nyere ya ikike ịwa ya.

translation.en: It is also the law that women do not break colanut in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụkwa iwu na nwaanyị anaghị awa ọjị n'ala Igbo.

translation.en: Women and colanut
translation.ibo: Ọjị na ụmụnwaanyị

translation.en: In Igbo land, a woman does not climb the colanut tree neither does she pluck it from its tree.
translation.ibo: N'ala Igbo, nwaanyị anaghị arị elu ọjị, ọ naghị aghọtu ọjị n'osisi ya.

translation.en: A woman does not pray on colanut
translation.ibo: Nwaanyị anaghị agọ ọjị.

translation.en: A woman does not climb on a colanut tree but she sells colanut.
translation.ibo: Nwaanyi anaghị arị oji elu mana nwaanyị na-ere oji

translation.en: A woman is not allowed to take colanut from a plate if all the men in the gathering have not taken.
translation.ibo: Anaghị ekwe ka nwaanyị tinye aka n'ime efere were ọjị ma ọ bụrụ na ụmụnwoke nọ ebe ahụ ewerechabeghị.

translation.en: Some go ahead to give women colanut themselves to prevent the women from dipping their hands into the plate used for sharing the colanutl.
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ na-aga n'ihu were aka ha nye nwaanyị ọjị ka ọ ghara inwe ohere tinye aka n'efere e jiri kee ọjị.

translation.en: Watch this video and see how Pete Edochie prayed on the colanut for BBC Igbo.
translation.ibo: Lee ihe nkiri a ịhụ ka Pete Edochie si gọọrọ BBC Igbo ọjị:

translation.en: That christainity came did not prevent people from praying with the colanut just as it was done in the past.
translation.ibo: Na ụka bịara egbochighị ndị mmadụ iji ọjị ekpe ekpere dịka esi eme ya mgbe gboo.

translation.en: See ten poor man's food that the rich also eat
translation.ibo: Lee nri ogbenye 10 ọgaranya na-erizi

translation.en: Some food that were meant for the poor in the past is now what the rich has listed for healthy living.
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ nri a ma na mbụ dịka nke ndị ogbenye bụzi ihe ndị ọgaranya wakporo n'ihi okwu gbasara ahụike.

translation.en: In Nigeria, about thirty or fourty years ago, some food are food are seen to be for the poor.
translation.ibo: N'ala Naijiria, ihe dịka afọ iri atọ maọbụ iri anọ gara aga, a na-ahụ ụfọdụ nri dịka nri ndị ihe na-esiri ike.

translation.en: Some of these food are what people get from their farms or buy cheap in the market because they are not on great demand.
translation.ibo: Ọtụtụ nri ndị a bụ nri ndị mmadụ na-enwetara onwe ha n'ugbo ha maọbụ zụta ọnụ ala n'ime ahịa n'ihi na ndị na-achọ ha adịghị ọtụtụ.

translation.en: But now, these food now interest the rich because of diseases such as high blood pressure, diabetes, heart problem, stroke, cancer and obessity that are known as sickness for the rich.
translation.ibo: Mana ugbua, nri ndị a bụzị ihe na-amasị ndị ọgaraanya n'ihi mbawanye ọrịa tara nchara dịka ọbara mgbalielụ, ọrịa shuga, ọrịa obi, ọtụrụọkara (stroke), kansa na oke ibu bụ ọrịa ndị a na-ewe dịka 'ọrịa ndị ọgaranya'.

translation.en: In the 2008 research statistics of the World Health Organization (WHO), it was found that out of one hundred and sixty-nine persons, 11.2 percentage of the population are High Blood Pressure Nigerian patients while, 2.7 percent are Nigerian diabetes patients.
translation.ibo: Na nchọpụta ngalaba na-ahụ maka ahụike na mba ụwa bụ WHO n'aha ịchafụ mere n'afọ 2008, ndị Naijiria pasenti 11.2 n'ime nde 169 bụ ndị nwere ọbara mgbalielụ ebe pasenti 2.7 nwere ọrịa shuga.

translation.en: The fear of these sickness made people to go back to the food that were previously overlooked which led to an increase in their prices that the poor can no longer afford.
translation.ibo: Egwu ọrịa ndị a mere ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ji alaghachị na nri a na-eleda anya na mbụ nke mere na ugbua nrị ndịa a na-ada oke ọnụahịa nke bụ na aka ụmụogbenye anaghị eruzị ha.

translation.en: See 10 out of those food:
translation.ibo: Lee 10 n'ime nri ndị ahụ:

translation.en: Ice fish
translation.ibo: Azụ friji

translation.en: Ice fish was previously regared as food for the poor.
translation.ibo: A na-ahụbu azụ friji dịka nri ndị ogbenye

translation.en: For more than thirty years ago, ice fish is usually seen when the poor cook in their homes, students or when there is no money available. but beef or chicken was for the rich.
translation.ibo: Ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ gara aga, a na-ahụ iji azụ 'friji' sie nri n'ụlọ ndị ogbenye, ụmụakwụkwọ maọbụ mgbe ego adịghị mmadụ n'akpa, ebe anụ ehi maọbụ anụ ọkụkọ bụ maka ndị rijuru afọ.

translation.en: Kingsley Udofa a person who lives in Lagos explained how ice fish was disregarded, he said 'there was a time in Nigeria when ice fish was only for the poor.
translation.ibo: Otu onye bi na Lagos bụ Kingsley Udofa kọwara anya a na-eleda azụ mbụ n'okwu ya sị: 'O nwere oge n'ala anyị bụ Naijiria mgbe azụ friji bụ maka ndị ogbenye.

translation.en: Then, ice fish was called different names to humiliate it such as 'fish corpse by the Igbos, Lagos corpse by the Yorubas, walking corpse by the Ibibios.
translation.ibo: Oge ahụ, a na-akpọ azụ friji aha ọjọọ dị icheiche iji kwaa ya emo dịka, 'Ozu azụ' n'asụsụ Igbo; 'Ókù Ékò' n'asụsụ Yoruba nke pụtara, 'Ozu Lagos' ; 'Àkpa asuko nse' n'asụsụ Ibibio nke pụtara, 'ọ nwụrụ anwụ ma mụrụ anya.'

translation.en: People stopped eating and buying ice fish.
translation.ibo: Ndị mmadụ na-ahara ịzụ ma rie azụ ndụ.

translation.en: Now everything has changed
translation.ibo: Ugbua, egwu adagharịala.

translation.en: Ice fish is now scarce and on high demand by a lot of people including the rich that it is now costly in the market.
translation.ibo: Azụ friji bụ ahụghị ma erighị nke ọtụtụ mmadụ gunyere ndị ọgaranya nke bụ na azụ na-adazị oke ọnụ n'ahịa.

translation.en: What you do not know about the breadfruit you eat.
translation.ibo: Ihe ị na-amaghị maka ụkwa ị na-eri

translation.en: What health value does your melon soup give to you?
translation.ibo: Kedu ihe ofe Egusi gị na-enye ahụ gị?

translation.en: Do you know how to make tapioca?
translation.ibo: Ị ma etu esi agwọ abacha?

translation.en: learn it here
translation.ibo: Mụta ya ebe a

translation.en: Just as the minister of Agriculture Sen Heineken Lokpobiri said, Nigerians consume about 3.2 million metric tone of fish yearly that seventy percent from it are imported.
translation.ibo: Dịka Mịnịsta nta na-ahụ maka ọrụugbo bụ Sen Heineken Lokpobiri siri kwuo, ndị Naijiria na-eri azụ ruru nde 3.2 metrik tọn kwa afọ nke a na-atụbata ihe karịrị pasentị iri asatọ n'ime ya.

translation.en: ten thousand metre and metric ton is produces three hundred and thirty- four thousand containers.
translation.ibo: Mata na metrik tọn puku iri pụtara kọntena puku nari atọ iri atọ na anọ.

translation.en: cocoyam
translation.ibo: Ede

translation.en: cocoyam is becoming expensive
translation.ibo: Ede na-agalazị oke ọnụ

translation.en: Uri cocoyam or Koko cocoyam or bread, cocoyam is food for the wretched, food for the poor because they cannot afford yam.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụ ede ụrị ka ọ bụ ede koko ma ọ bụ achịcha, ede bụ nri ụganị, nrị ndị onweghị ka ọra ha ji agbado ume n'ihi na ha enweghị ego zụrụ ji.

translation.en: But now, cocoyam is common because everbody eats it.
translation.ibo: Mana ugbua, nri ede bụzị ụkwa achị n'aka ya a na-agba n'ihi na oke na ngwere na-erizi ya.

translation.en: Aside the towns that cocoyam pounds is one of their famous meals, those who are diabetic, hypertensive, weight lossers has made cocoyam unreachable to the poor, that buying cocoyam for cooking is as though one is buying contraband.
translation.ibo: Ewepụ obodo jiri ụtaraede mere nnukwu nri, ndị na-asọ nsọ nrị n'ihi ọrịa dịka ọrịa shuga, ọbara mgbalielu na ndị chọrọ ịta ahụ ekweghịzị ka aka ogbenye rute ede, nke na i go ede e ji esi ofe dịzị ka igo ahịa iwu.

translation.en: 3. Cow skin
translation.ibo: 3. Kanda

translation.en: Cow skin populary called 'kpọmọ' by the yorubas, was eaten by the poor when there was no money for beef or chicken.
translation.ibo: Akpụkpọanụ ehi nke ndị Yoruba na-akpọ, 'kpọmọ', bụbu ihe ndị ogbenye ji emegharị ọnụ oge ha ahụghị ego zụrụ anụ ehi ma maọbụ anụ ọkụkọ.

translation.en: As it is now, the rich has taken it to be a healthy food, it is used to cook vegetable soup or mix it with pepper and drink with it.
translation.ibo: Dịka ihe si aga ụgbụa, ndị ọgaranya ewerela ya mee ezi nri, ebe e ji ya esi nri ọpụrụiche dịka edikakong maọbụ gwọ ya na ose ma were ya anụ mmanya.

translation.en: In 2014, when the government spoke through the former minister of Agriculture Akinwumi Adesina that they want to ban people from eating cow skin. This was not accepted by the people which made the government to refrain from the idea.
translation.ibo: N'afọ 2014 mgbe gọọmenti si n'ọnụ onye bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụugbo bụ Akinwumi Adesina kwuo na ha chọrọ ịmachi ndị mmadụ iri kanda nke butere oke iwe ndị mmadụ ma mekwa ka gọọmenti kpofuo atụmatụ ahụ n'ọhịa.

translation.en: Just as scientists said, cow skin does not have fats or cholesterol just as beef, which they said that too much consumption of it causes a terminal illness like hypertension.
translation.ibo: Dịka ndị ọkachamara sị kọwa, kanda enweghị abụba maọbụ mmanụ ọjọọ a kpọrọ kọlesịtọrọl na bekee dịka anụ ehi nke ha kwuru na oke iri ya na-ebute ajọ ọrịa tara nchara dịka ọrịa obi na ọbara mgbalienu.

translation.en: Plantain
translation.ibo: Ojoko

translation.en: Some people call it ogede, some abịrịka, others plantain, while many call it une or unere.
translation.ibo: Ụfọdụ na-akpọ ya ogede, ụfọdụ abịrịka, ndị ọzọ ojoko, ebe ọtụtụ na-akpọ ya une maọbụ unere.

translation.en: The poor eat the roasted one with red oil, and also use it to cook beans but now, the rich has made plantain a food on high demand.
translation.ibo: Ụmụ ogbenye na-eji mmanụ eri nke ahụrụ n'ọkụ, ma jiri ya sie agwa mana ugbua, ọgaranya emeela ojoko nnukwu nri.

translation.en: Plantain is a good food that replenishes the body because it has fibre and other minerals that are good for the health such as magnesium, phosphorous na potassium.
translation.ibo: Ojoko bụ ezi nri na-edochi ahụ nihi na o nwere faiba, na mineral ndị ọzọ na-enyere ndụ aka dịka magnesium, phosphorous na potassium.

translation.en: Just as health scientists have said, plantain gives blood when cooked unripped.
translation.ibo: Dịka ndị ọkachamara ahụike siri kọwa, ojoko na-enye ọbara mgbe e siri ya na-achaghị acha.

translation.en: Snail
translation.ibo: Ejula

translation.en: Snail is a good food that is nutritious but it is expensive now
translation.ibo: Ejula bụ ezi nri na-enye ihe n'ahụ ma ọ na-adazi oke ọnụ ugbua

translation.en: If there is no meat or fish, the poor goes into the forest in search of snail.
translation.ibo: Ma anụ adighị, azụ adịghị, ogbenye na-aba n'ọhia kpara ejula, were sie nri.

translation.en: The rich had no time for snail just as the Igbo says that there is suffering in its preparation.
translation.ibo: Ogaranya, enwebughị efe ejula mgbe mbụ n'ihi na, dịka ndị Igbo ji ya ekwu okwu, ahụhụ dị na imecha ejula.

translation.en: But now, cooking with snail is a sign that one is rich because of the high price of snail in the market
translation.ibo: Ma ugbua, iji ejula isi nri bụzị akara ejiri mara ọgaranya n'ihi oke ọnụ ahịa ya.

translation.en: Snail is a good food that gives protein, calcium, selenium, magnesium and gives blood.
translation.ibo: Ejula bụ ezi nri nwere proten, calcium, selenium, magnesium ma na-enye ọbara.

translation.en: Garri.
translation.ibo: Garị

translation.en: Garri is food for both the poor and the rich
translation.ibo: Garị bụ nri ma ogbenye ma ọgaranya na-erizi

translation.en: In the past, eating garri especially when it is drank is regarded as food for the poor or food eaten when one is broke.
translation.ibo: Iri garị, ọ kachasị mgbe aṅụrụ ya aṅụ, bụ ihe a na-ewe dịka nri ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ maọbụ mgbe ego kọrọ gị n'akpa na mbụ.

translation.en: If you ask students who live in school, they will tell you how drinking garri with groundnut, fried fish or roasted meat has saved their lives
translation.ibo: Ị jụọ ụmụakwụkwọ bi n'ụlọakwụkwọ ha ga-akọwara gị etu ịji ọpapa, azụ e ghere eghe maọbụ anụ mkpọ aṅụ gari si zọọ ha ndụ.

translation.en: Now garri is a contraband
translation.ibo: Ugbua garị bụzị ahịa iwu.

translation.en: Now the rich and the poor struggle for garri that a painter costs more than five hundred naira.
translation.ibo: Ọgaranya na ogbenye na-azọzị garị nke otu ọba a na-akpọ 'painter' na-ada ihe karịrị nari naira ise (N500).

translation.en: A cancer specialist in the Lagos University Teaching Hospital, Dr Remi Ajekigbe said that many Nigerians are suffering from cancer because they no longer eat our local foods like garri, yam that has fibre rather they eat foreign foods.
translation.ibo: Onye ọkammụta ọrịa kansa n'ụlọọgwụ Lagos University Teaching Hospital, bụ Dr Remi Ajekigbe kwuru na ihe mere ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria ji arịa ọrịa kansa ugbua bụ na ha anaghị erizi nrị ala anyị dịka garị, ji nke nwere faiba ka ma ha na-eri nri ndị bekee.

translation.en: Beans
translation.ibo: Agwa

translation.en: Beans is a good food for the health
translation.ibo: Agwa bụ ezi nri na-edozi ahụ

translation.en: Beans is another peculiar food for the poor but the rich now eat it.
translation.ibo: Agwa bụ nri ọzọ e jiri mara ndị ogbenye mana ọtụtụ ọgaranya na-erizi ya.

translation.en: beans gives protein and also blood
translation.ibo: Agwa na-enye proten ma na-enyekwa ọbara.

translation.en: Food nutritionists are saying that beans is a better protein source than meat because it does not contain cholesterol
translation.ibo: Ndị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara nri na ihe ha na-enye na-ekwu na agwa kacha mma maka nweta protein karịa anụ ehị n'ihi na onweghị abụba ọjọọ nke a kpọrọ Kọlesịterọl.

translation.en: Breadfruit
translation.ibo: Ukwa

translation.en: Breadfruit is a special food prepared by a hardworking person
translation.ibo: Ụkwa bụ oke oriri pụrụ iche onye ike dị na-akwado

translation.en: Breadfruit was usually over looked by the rich probably because of the tedious task of its preparation but now only those who can afford it can eat it.
translation.ibo: Ụkwa bụ nrị ndị ọgrlanya na-eleghara anya na mbụ, ikekwa n'ihi ahụhụ dị na-ikwado ya, mana ugbua, ọ bụzị onye ji ego na-eri ụkwa.

translation.en: Breadfruit gives protein, blood, potassium and other healthy nutrients.
translation.ibo: Ụkwa na-enye proten, ọbara, potassium nakwa ngwa ndị ọzọ na-edozi ahụ.

translation.en: Water yam.
translation.ibo: Ji mmiri

translation.en: Water yam has fibre
translation.ibo: Ji mmiri nwere fibre

translation.en: Water yam is not usually eaten by people probably because it is not tasty.
translation.ibo: Ji mmiri bụ nri ndị mmadụ anaghị erikarị na mbụ n'ihi na ọ naghị atọ ka ji.

translation.en: only the poor used it to satisfy their hunger
translation.ibo: Sọọsọ ndị ogbenye jibu ya achụ agụụ.

translation.en: But now lots of people including the rich eat it.
translation.ibo: Mana ugbua, ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ gunyere ndị ọgaranya na-eri ya.

translation.en: diabetes patients still take sugar
translation.ibo: Ndị na arịa ọrịa shuga na-erikwa ya.

translation.en: Scientists explains that water yam contains lots of fibre, small 'sodium' and a lot of 'potassium' that it is said to be good for diabetic patients.
translation.ibo: Ndị nchọpụta na-akọwa na ji mmiri nwere fibre rie nne, obere 'sodium' na nnukwu 'potassium' nke mere e ji kwuo na ọ na-adị ndị na-arịa ọrịa shuga mma n'ahụ.

translation.en: Remember that 'fibre' helps in digestion, too much 'sodium' causes hypertension, while 'potassium' regulates the blood, and prevents one from having kidney stone.
translation.ibo: Cheta na 'fibre' na-enyere nrị aka igwepịa n'afọ (digestion), oke 'sodium' so ebute ọbara mgbalienu, ebe 'potassium' na-akụjulata ọbara, chụmie mmadụ inwe ọrịa okwute akụrụ (kidney stone).

translation.en: crayfish
translation.ibo: Isha

translation.en: crayfish is now expensive that some poor people can no longer afford it
translation.ibo: Isha na-adazị oke ọnụ nke na aka ụfọdụ ogbenye eruzi ya

translation.en: The poor usually cooked with crayfish when they could not afford fish or meat. But now, periwinkle is now for the rich because of its cost in the market.
translation.ibo: Ndị enweghi ego na-ejibu isha esi nri oge ha e nweghị ego anụ maọbụ azụ, ma ugbua, isha bụzikwa maka ndị nwere ego n'ihi oke ida ọnụ ahịa.

translation.en: Why people now prefer food meant for the poor
translation.ibo: Ihe mere ndị mmadụ ji achụzị nrị ndị ogbenye

translation.en: Just as a doctor of food and nutrition Dr Florence Uchendu explained why a lot of people now eat food that were avoided is because of the illness that are in Nigeria now such as diabetes, high blood pressure, stroke, cancer.
translation.ibo: Dika ọkammụta na ihe gbasara nri na ihe ọ na-arụ n'ahụ bụ Dr Florence Uchendu si kọwa ihe mere na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-eri nri a na-agbara ọsọ ugbua karia bụ maka na ọrịa dị na Naijiria ugbua dịka ọrịa shuga, ọbara mgbalienu, ọtụrụọkara (stroke), kansa.

translation.en: The illness in Nigeria now are foreign illnesses we did not suffer from before now.
translation.ibo: Ọrịa dịzị na Najiria bụ ọrịa dị n'obodo oyibo anyị anaghị arịabu mbụ.

translation.en: Such illnesses as diabetes and hypertension are very common now.
translation.ibo: Ihe dika ọbara mgbalienu, ọrịa shuga juziri kịta.

translation.en: People now know the food that are not good for the health.
translation.ibo: Ndị mmadụ amatago ihe ị ga-eri onyewe gị nsogbu n'ahụ ma nwekwa ike nyewe gị nsogbu n'ahụ.

translation.en: The story that will interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: South Korea armored car has gone to Ghana.
translation.ibo: Ụgbọ agha Saụt Korịa agala Ghana

translation.en: Anthony Joshua Vs Joseph Parker: who is stronger?
translation.ibo: Anthony Joshua Vs Joseph Parker: Onye bụ dike?

translation.en: did Igbo start from here?
translation.ibo: Ebee ka Igbo malitere?

translation.en: The king of Nri Emelie Okika has insisted that Nri is the origin of the Igbo race.
translation.ibo: Eze na-achị Nri bụ Emelie Okika kwụdosiri ike na-ekwu na Nri bụ isi mmiri Ndigbo.

translation.en: masquerade in occassions
translation.ibo: Mmanwụ n'ọgbọ mmemme

translation.en: Masquerade is one of the Igbo culture
translation.ibo: Mmanwụ bụ otu njirimara Ndigbo

translation.en: The king of Nri chief Emelie Okika has warned Aguleri and Igboukwu to refrain from claiming to be the origin of the Igbo race.
translation.ibo: Eze na-achị Nri bụ Ichie Emelie Okika adọọla obodo Aguleri na Igboukwu aka na ntị ka ha kwụsị ịzọ onye bụ isi mbido Ndigbo niile.

translation.en: Okika vehemently said that the Igbos originated from Nri and also added that the discussion of the origin of the Igbos is a spiritual one that should not be used for political ambition.
translation.ibo: Okika kwuru kusie ike na ọ bụ Nri bụ ebe Ndigbo siri pụta, ma kwukwa n'ihe gbasara isi mmiri Ndigbo bụ okwu mmuọ na e kwesịghị iji mee ihe ndọrọndọro ọchịchị.

translation.en: He scolded Aguleri and Igboukwu for their efforts in trying to change the Igbo history and told them to refrain from their actions.
translation.ibo: Ọ bara obodo Aguleri n'Igboukwu mba maka mbọ ha na-agba idegharị akụkọ mbido ala Igbo, ma gwa ha ka ha wepụ aka enwe n'ofe ka iwe ghara iwe ndị chi e nwere.

translation.en: importance of post-natal visitation in the Igbo tradition.
translation.ibo: Uru ọmụgwọ bara n'omenala Igbo

translation.en: Do you know how to make tapioca?
translation.ibo: Ị ma etu esi agwọ abacha ?

translation.en: learn it here
translation.ibo: Mụta ya ebe a

translation.en: What is your view on mourning?
translation.ibo: Kedụ ihe bụ ebumnuche gị maka ịgba mkpe?

translation.en: He said that ' it is true that we are one with peole from Aguleri but they are politically ambitious
translation.ibo: O kwuru sị 'Ọ bụ eziokwu na anyị na ndị Aguleri bụ otu mana ihe dị iche bụ na agụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dị be ha.

translation.en: Igboukwu did not commit sacriledge in this story.
translation.ibo: Igboukwu abịadịghị nso n'ihe gbasara akụkọ a'.

translation.en: Okika said that Eri is the ancestoral father of the Igbo race from the tribe of Isreal, fifth son of Gad the seventh son of Jacob.
translation.ibo: Okika sị na Eri bụ nna ala Igbo niile si ala Israel mapụta bụ ọkpara nke ise Gad bụ nwa asaa nke Jacob.

translation.en: And Eri and other tribes left Egypt before other tribes left Egypt.
translation.ibo: Nakwa Eri na ndịotu ndịọzọ sị ala Egypt pụta njem tupu ọpụpụ ndị ala Israel n'Egypt.

translation.en: He said ' they sojourned across the river till they got to the meeting point of Omambala and Ezu river called 'Agbanabo' in Aguleri where the spirit leading them told them to stop and build a community.
translation.ibo: O sị 'Ha mere njem n'elu mmiri ma rue ebe mmiri Omambala na Ezu zuru onwe ha a na-akpọ 'Agbanabo' dị n'obodo Aguleri ebe mmụọ na-edu ha sị ha kwụsị rụọ obodo'.

translation.en: News that would interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: Maaida Bio has become the president of Sierra Leone
translation.ibo: Maaida Bio abụrụla onyeisiala Sierra Leone

translation.en: Lasa fever has spread through twenty states.
translation.ibo: Iba Lasa ekesala rue steeti 20

translation.en: Convenant university disobeyed the law-court
translation.ibo: Mahadum Covenant dara iwu - ọkaiwu

translation.en: Kukah: there would be havoc in 2019
translation.ibo: Kukah: Ọgbaghara ga-ada na 2019

translation.en: Bishop Matthew Kukah has said that might be crisis in the 2019 election if things continue the way they are.
translation.ibo: Bishop Matthew Kukah ekwuola na ọgbaghara nwere ike ịda na ntuliaka 2019 ma ihe dịrị otu a gawa n'ihu.

translation.en: Matthew Kukah in Nigeria
translation.ibo: Matthew Kukah na Naịjirịa

translation.en: Bishọp Kukah said that killing and destruction of properties is on the increase in Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Bishọp Kukah sị na mwufu obara na mmebi akụnaụba obodo Naịjiria karịrị akarị.

translation.en: Bishop of the catholic diocese of Sokoto Bishọp Matthew Kukah has said that there might be crisis in the upcoming 2019 election
translation.ibo: Bishọp nke Sokoto Katọlik Dayọsis bụ Bishọp Mathew Kukah ekwuola na ọgbaaghara nwere ike ịda na Naịjiria dịka ime ntụlịaka ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke 2019 nna-abịa nso.

translation.en: He said that nothing can stop the country from being in crisis unless the fights are stopped in the different parts of the country.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na onweghị ịhe ga eme ka ọgbaaghara aghara ịda na Naịjirịa ma ọbụrụ na akwụsịghị ọgụ na mgba a n'ada ebe niile na Naịjirịa.

translation.en: Kụkah said this in his report in Africa Report Magazine of April
translation.ibo: Kụkah kwuru nke a na-ozi ya na Africa Report Magazine nke Eprelu.

translation.en: Bishọp Kukah said that it would be very difficult to prevent the crisis of the 2019 election.
translation.ibo: Bishọp Kukah kwuru na ọ ga ata akpụ ị gbanahụ ọgbaaghara na ntụliaka nke 2019.

translation.en: In his words, 'it would be a great miracle if there is no crisis in the 2019 election'.
translation.ibo: N'ọnụ okwu ya, 'ọ ga abụ ezigbo ọlụ ebube ma ọbụrụ na ọgbaaghara adaghị na ntụliaka 2019'.

translation.en: story that would interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị

translation.en: soldiers have replied TY Danjuma
translation.ibo: Ndịagha asaala TY Danjuma

translation.en: Dapchi children have met with Buhari
translation.ibo: Ụmụaka Dapchi ezutela Buhari

translation.en: We don't have anything to say to the mother of Boko Haram
translation.ibo: Anyị enweghị okwu ịsa ihe Mama Boko Haram kwuru'

translation.en: He said that it is because of the many crisis across Nigeria now.
translation.ibo: Ọ sịrị na ihe ojiri kwuo nke a bụ maka ọgụ na mgba juru ebe niile na Naịjiria ugbua.

translation.en: I have not felt this way before
translation.ibo: O metubeghị m n'obi otu a mbụ.

translation.en: He said that the condition of Nigeria is supposed to be of uttermost concern to every Nigerian citizen.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na ọnọdụ Naịjirịa ugbua kwesiri ịna-emetu nwafọ obodo a ọbụla n'obi.

translation.en: What of the billions of dollars the government allocated for security?
translation.ibo: Kedụ maka ijeri dọla gọọmenti weputere maka nchekwa obodo?

translation.en: When Bishọp Kukah and BBC workers met, they asked him about the money allocated for security in the country
translation.ibo: Mgbe Bishọp Kukah na BBC gbaritara ụka anyị jụrụ ya maka nde naịra gọọmenti tinyere na nchekwa obodo.

translation.en: Bishọp Kukah resoponded that the extravagant lives of the politicians would not in any way help the citizens of the country
translation.ibo: Bishọp Kukah zara na ihe kacha mkpa abụghị ị me gbanụgbanụ me ihe ga enye aka ị me ntụliaka ọchịchị nke ga eme ka ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị biwakwa ndụ okeọzụ ka ha si ebe, nke a gaghị abara ndị ha n'achị ụrụ.

translation.en: He said that killing must be stopped before peace would be restored in Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Ọ sị na tupu udo abata na Naịjirịa na nkwafu obara ga akwusị kpamkpam.

translation.en: Bishọp Kukah responded to this by saying that ' peace cannot be bought with money'.
translation.ibo: Bishop Kukah zara na ajụjụ a sị: 'Ejighị ego egote udo.

translation.en: Listen well to what he said in English
translation.ibo: Nụrụ ihe okwuru na ụjụ na asụsụ bekee.

translation.en: It is not lack of money that has caused crisis in Nigeria, rather, too much money.
translation.ibo: Ọbụghị ụkọ ego mere na udo adịghị na Naịjirịa, ka ma ọ bụ oke ego dị na obodo a kpatara ya.

translation.en: A lot of money has been invested in politics but it yielded nothing
translation.ibo: Etinyela otụtụ ego na ndọrọndọro ọchịchị onweghị isi.

translation.en: Investing too much money is not the problem especially in a country like Nigeria where money rules.
translation.ibo: Ya bụ itinye ọtụtụ egọ abụghị nsogbụ, ọkachasị na obodo ihe niile bụ ego dịka Naịjirịa.

translation.en: Government has invested a lot of money in water, yet we do not have water.
translation.ibo: Gọọmenti etinyela ọtụtụ ego na mmiri, anyị enweghị mmiri.

translation.en: They have invested so much in electricity, yet we do not have light.
translation.ibo: Ha etinyela ọtutụ ego na ọkụ, anyị enweghị ọkụ.

translation.en: What will bring peace to Nigeria is not guns and bullets .
translation.ibo: Ihe ga enweta udo na Naịjịrịa abụghị egbe na mgbo.

translation.en: He went on to say that politicians are only after the elections and not what would be beneficial to the citizens.
translation.ibo: Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na ihe ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-eme bụ ka enwe ike mee ntụliaka ọzọ ma ghara ime ihe ga-abara ndị mmadụ uru.

translation.en: Bishop Kukah said that the government is supossed to work for the people to trust them
translation.ibo: Bishọp Kukah kwuru na ọrụ gọọmenti bụ ime ka ndị a na-achịachị nwee ntụkwasị obi na agbamume.

translation.en: But a number of Nigerians do not have it
translation.ibo: Mana ọtụtụ ndị Naịjiria enweghị ya.

translation.en: This situation destroys democracy that we are practicing.
translation.ibo: Ọnọdụ dị otu a na-emebi ọchịchị onyekwụọụche ya anyị nọ n'ime ya .

translation.en: What do you think about the Dapchi kidnapped kids?
translation.ibo: Kedụ ihe i chere maka ụmụaka Dapchị a tọhapụrụ ?

translation.en: This points to how the government organizes information to its citizens
translation.ibo: Ihe ahụ rụtụrụ aka ịgosị ka gọọmenti sị ahazị ozi a na ezigara ndị a na achị.

translation.en: Bishọp Kukah said that it is surprising that such thing could happen and nobody has a detailed information on how or why it happened.
translation.ibo: Bishọp Kukah sị na ọbụ ihe mgbagwoju anya na ụdị ihe ahụ mere onweghị onye mara isi ya na ọdụ ya maọbụ ihe kpatara ya bụ ihe.

translation.en: What you heard is mere rumour
translation.ibo: Ihe a na-anụ bụ sọsọ asịrị.

translation.en: This typ of news should not be heard of in Nigeria today.
translation.ibo: Ụdị ihe a abụghị ihe e kwesiri ị na-anụ na Naịjịrịa ugbua.

translation.en: It is so terrible.
translation.ibo: Ọ jọgbụrụ ụdele ma sịgbụọ nkakwụ .

translation.en: Offa: Gun men have killed seventeen people
translation.ibo: Offa: Ndịohi egbuola mmadu 17

translation.en: There is noise in Offa, Kwara State as to the number of people and police men killed.
translation.ibo: Ụzụ na-akpọ n'obodo Offa dị na Kwara steeti maka ndị uweoji, mmadụ ndị ọzọ ndị ojiegbeezu gburu.

translation.en: banks that are in that state
translation.ibo: Ụlọakụ nke dị n'obodo ahụ

translation.en: the picture of one of the banks that were robbed
translation.ibo: Ihu otụ n'ime ụlọakụ ndị a wakporo

translation.en: More than fifteen people are dead, nine of which are police men killed by gun men who rubbed up to five banks in Offia, Kwara State.
translation.ibo: Mmadụ karịrị mmadụ iri na ise anwụọla, n'ime ha ndị uweojii itoolu mgbe ndịohi bu egbe wakporo ụlọakụ ruru ise n'obodo Offa dị na Kwara steeti ụbọchị Tọọdse.

translation.en: Eye witnesses said that the armed rubbers bombed the bank bolt before they made away with the money.
translation.ibo: Ndị nọ ebe ihe a mere sị na ndịohi ahụ ji ogbunigwe gbawa ebe ụlọakụ ahụ na-echekwa ego mmadu tupu ha-eburu ya pụọ.

translation.en: They also said that the armed rubbers killed all the police men they saw in the police station first before going to rob in those banks.
translation.ibo: Ha kwukwara na ndị a bu ụzọ ga n'ụlọọrụ ndị uweoji gbagbuo ihe niile ha hụrụ ebe ahụ tupu ha gaa ebe ụlọakụ ndị ahụ dị.

translation.en: They also blocked the two roads that leds to Ilorin and Osogbo, and other neighbouring towns of Offa.
translation.ibo: Ha gbakwara mbo gbochie ụzọ abụọ batara obodo ahụ si na Ilorin n'Osogbo, obodo ndị agbatobi dị nso n'Offa.

translation.en: The state's police representative Ajayi Okasanmi (DSP) confirmed this story and also said that the culprits killed seven citizens.
translation.ibo: Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii steeti ahụ bụ Ajayi Okasanmi (DSP) onye kwuru na nke a bụ ezie kwukwara na ndị omekome ahụ gburu ndị nkịtị asaa.

translation.en: Aguleri and Igboukwu are not the origin of Igbo people.
translation.ibo: Aguleri na Igboukwu abụghị mbido Ndigbo'

translation.ibo: Nwoke agbagbuola nwunye na nwa ha

translation.en: It greatly saddened people as they expressed on the news.
translation.ibo: Ihe a wutere ndị mmadụ nnukwu dịka ha gosiri n'elu atụmatụ mgbasa ozi:

translation.en: What are the different names you call someone you love?
translation.ibo: Kedụ aha otutu ị na-etu onye ị hụrụ n'anya?

translation.en: The Igbos have different names for their loved ones such as siblingd, mother, father, husband, wife and others.
translation.ibo: Ndị Igbo nwere aha otutu ha na-etu ndị masịrị ha nke ukwuu dịka ụmụnne, nne, nna, di, nwunye na ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: BBC Igbo asked people the different names they call their loved ones.
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo gbara ndị mmadụ ajụjụọnụ gbasara ụfọdụ aha ụtọ ha na-akpọ ndị dị ha n'obi.

translation.en: They also called out different interesting names
translation.ibo: Ha kpọpụtakwara aha ụtọ dị icheiche.

translation.en: listen to these that have been said here
translation.ibo: Gere ihe ndị a kwuru ebe a.

translation.ibo: Onye mere akụkọ a: Chioma Nkemdilim

translation.ibo: Akụkọ kachasi n'ụtụtụ a: Super Falcons kpọchuru ajọọ ihu ụnyahụ

translation.en: France scored the Super Falcons seven goals to none, the need to promote education and EU has agreed to join in the fight against press in Nigeria.
translation.ibo: Ndị France gbara ndị Super Falcons ọkpụ asatọ asataghị otu, mkpa ọdị ịkwado agaum akwụkwọ na EU ekwetala ịkwado agha a na ebuso mpụ ọzọ na Naịjirịa.

translation.ibo: Akụkọ ndị kachasị mkpa mere taa.

translation.ibo: Social media' nwuru ọkụ maka Aisha Wakil

translation.en: Aisha Wakil has said that Boko Haram will release the Dapchi girl called Leah Sharibu.
translation.ibo: Aisha Wakil kwuru na Bokoharam ga-atọghapu nwa Dapchi akpọrọ Leah Sharibu

translation.en: Since Aisha Wakil told BBC Igbo the dialogue she had with the terrorists, there has been different reactions of Igbos on social media
translation.ibo: Kamgbe Aisha Wakil kọwachara BBC Igbo n'asụsụ Igbo ka ya ndị oyi egwu a sị akpa,ọtụtụ ndị Igbo na-ekwu uche ha na igwe okwu 'social media'.

translation.en: Fold here like the front
translation.ibo: pia ebe a kị ihụ ya.

translation.en: France 8 Super Falcons 0
translation.ibo: France 8 Super Falcons 0

translation.en: Chikwelu Oparanozie is the captain of the Super Falcons in this tournament.
translation.ibo: Chikwelu Oparanozie bụ onye ndụ ndị Falcons na ya bụ egwụrụegwụ

translation.en: The female Nigerian league, Super Falcons on Friday played a friendly match with France.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị egwu bọlụ nke Naịjirịa bụ Super Falcons na nke ndị France sọrọmpi enyi na enyi ụnyahụ bụ Fraide.

translation.en: That is, the match against the Super Falcons was drastic by scoring seven goals to none in the MMArena na Le Mans, France.
translation.ibo: Ya bụ mpi ha sọrọ kpọrọ ndị super Falcons ihụ ọjọọ site na ịgba ha ọkpụ asatọ chara acha na ọgbọ egwuruegwu MMArena na Le Mans, France.

translation.en: Governor Obiano has expressed the need to uphold education
translation.ibo: Gọvanọ Ọbialọ kwuputara mkpa ọdị ịkwado agaumakwụkwọ

translation.en: Willie Obiano is the governor of Anambra State.
translation.ibo: Willie Obialo bụ Gọvanọ Anambra Steeti

translation.en: Governor Willie Obiano of Anambra State has expressed the importance of educational development in the State.
translation.ibo: Gọvanọ Willie Obialo nke Anambra Steeti ekwupụtala mkpa ọdị ịkwalite agụm akwụkwọ na steeti ahụ.

translation.en: Super Eagles are fearless
translation.ibo: Super Eagles anaghị atụ onye ọbụla egwu

translation.en: London based Nigerians have shown their support to Super Eagles and said that they would do well in the Russia 2018 World Cup.
translation.ibo: Ụmụ afọ Naịjirịa bi na Lọndọn e gosila nkwado ha n'ebe ndị Super Eagles nọ ma kwuo na ha ga-eme nkeọma n'Iko Mba Uwa nke Rọshịa 2018.

translation.en: BBC reporter in London Peter Okwoche asked the London based Nigerians what they think about the Super Eagles.
translation.ibo: Onye ntaakụkọ BBC na Lọndọn bụ Peter Okwoche gbara ụmụ afọ Naịjirịa bị na Lọndọn ajụjụ maka ebumnobi ha n'ebe Super Eagles nọ.

translation.en: They said that Super Eagles will do well in the Russia 2018 world cup and they would get to the fourth stage or the quarter finals.
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru na super Eagles ga-eme nkeọma n'asọmpi Iko Mba Ụwa nke Rọshịa 2018, na ha ga-eru agba anọ ma ọ bụ ọkara ikpeazụ.

translation.en: They went on to say that the Super Eagles are not afraid of any team
translation.ibo: Ha gara n'ihu kwuo na onweghị otu bọọlụ ọbụla ndị Super Eagles na-atụ egwu.

translation.en: Another person also said that it was only the Belgium team that he was afraid of
translation.ibo: Onye ọzọ kwuru na ọ bụ mba Beljọm ka ọ na-atụ egwu n'asọmpi ahụ.

translation.en: French Open: Serena Williams has gone out
translation.ibo: French Open: Serena Williams apụọla

translation.en: A female tennis champion has gone out of the 'French Open' tournament because of her heart injury.
translation.ibo: Agbara nwaanyị n'egwuregwu Tennis apụọla n'asọmpị 'French Open' maka mmerụ ahụ n'obi ya.

translation.en: Serena Williams
translation.ibo: Serena Williams

translation.en: Williams stopped playing six months ago for her child birth
translation.ibo: Williams kwụsịrị ịsọmpi n'ọnwa isii gara aga ịga mụọ nwa

translation.en: The broadcasting house AP is sying now that the tennis expert Serena Williams has gone out of the French Open tournament.
translation.ibo: Ụlọ ntaakụkọ AP na-ekwu ugbua na agbara ewguregwu Tennis bụ Serena Williams apụọla na French Open.

translation.en: They said that Williams went out of the competition when she had to play against Maria Sharapova.
translation.ibo: Ha kwuru Williams pụrụ na-egwurewgu ka ọ pụtara na o nwere asọmpị ya na Maria Sharapova ka ga-agba.

translation.en: Breaking news: Serena is back again
translation.ibo: Akụkọ kachasị n'ụtụtụ a: Serena awakela ọzọ

translation.en: Serena and Venus Williams will compete.
translation.ibo: Serena na Venus Williams ga-asọmpi

translation.en: See where the AP media house released their story on Twitter.
translation.ibo: Lee ebe ndị AP gbasara akụkọ a n'elu akara soshal midia Twitter ha:

translation.en: Serena at thirth-six years old told news men in Roland-Garros city of France today that she opted out of the tournament because of her heart injury.
translation.ibo: Serena dị afọ ịrị atọ n'isii gwara ndị ntaakụkọ n'obodo Roland-Garros nke mba France taa n'ọbụ n'ihi ahụ ọ merụrụ n'obi ka o ji pụọ n'asọmpị ahụ.

translation.en: Serena and Maria Sharapova are getting ready to play the fourth round today being Monday.
translation.ibo: Serena na Maria Sharapova na-akwado ịgba asọmpị agba nke anọ taa bụ Mọnde.

translation.en: See what BBC Sport wrote that Serena said:
translation.ibo: Lee ihe BBC Sport dere na Serena kwuru:

translation.en: This shows that she left the tournament because of their family.

translation.ibo: E zuola Nwankwo Kanu ohi na Rọshịa

translation.en: Igbos will play in the world cup
translation.ibo: Ụmụafọ Igbo ga-agba asọmpi Iko Mba Ụwa

translation.en: Why I anointed people - Okorocha
translation.ibo: Ihe mere m ji tee mmanụ n'isi ndị mmadụ - Okorocha

translation.en: APC has told Okorocha to stop accusing their leaders
translation.ibo: APC agwala Okorocha ka ọkwụsị ebo ndị isi ha ebubo

translation.en: The ruling party has said that Okorocha was supposed to go through the APC due process to express his displeasure on an ill treatment.
translation.ibo: Pati na-achị si na Okorocha kwesiri isoro usoro di na iwu ji APC gosi iwe ya na ebe ochere na-emeidere ya.

translation.en: Owele Rochas Okorocha
translation.ibo: Owele Rochas Okorocha

translation.en: Okorocha is accusing the APC leader in the Imo election.
translation.ibo: Okorocha na-ebo onye isi oche APC ebubo maka ntuliaka emere n'Imo

translation.en: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has warned the governor of Imo State Owelle Rochas Okorocha for accusing the party leaders.
translation.ibo: Otu ndọrọndọrọ na-achị bụ All Progressives Congress (APC) adọla aka na-achị Imo steeti bụ Owelle Rochas Okorocha aka na ntị maka ebubo ha si na ọ na-ebo ndị isi otu pati ahụ.

translation.en: Okorocha moreso said that the APC chairman John Odigie-Oyegun did not obey the court order on the party leaders election and the party's Imo gubernatorial flag bearer.
translation.ibo: Okorocha kwuburu na onye isi oche APC bụ John Odigie-Oyegun akwanyeghị iwu ọlụikpe nyere banyere ntuliaka a ga-eji họpụta ndị ga-achị pati ha na onye ga-azọrọ ha ọchịchị n'Imo.

translation.en: In the letter the APC secretary Bolaji Abdullahi wrote, APC defended the accusation Okorocha leveled against them as something that is not genuine at all, he also said that they did not get any mandate from the court to stop the election.
translation.ibo: N'akwụkwọ Bolaji Abdullahi bụ ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke APC dere, APC kọwara ebubo Okorocha boro ha ka ihe enweghị ụkwụ ọbụla, ma kwuo na ha enweteghị akwụkwọ si ụlọ iwu maka ị kwụsi ntuliaka ahụ.

translation.en: Okorocha did not join the meeting held by APC leaders.
translation.ibo: Okorocha esoghi na nzụko ndị isi APC mere

translation.en: Can Okorocha make his son-in-law the governor of Imo State?
translation.ibo: Okorocha ọ pụrụ imeli ọgọ ya Gọvanọ Imo steeti?

translation.en: APC building fire outbreak- PDP set the fire- Onwuemeodo
translation.ibo: Ọkụ ụlọọrụ APC: Ọ bụ PDP mere ihe a - Onwuemeodo

translation.en: Abdullahi said ' to respond to the accusation the governor of Imo State leveled on Oyegun' he did not obey the court orders' there is no truth in it.
translation.ibo: Abdullahi kwuru 'N'ịza ebubo aka na-achị Imo boro Oyegun na 'ọkwanyeghị ụlọikpe ugwu' eziokwu adịghị na ya.

translation.en: Because of this, we are telling the governor of Imo State to refrain from such accusation because it is not true.
translation.ibo: Maka nke a, anyi na-agwa gọvanọ Imo ka ọkwụsị ebo ụdịrị ebubo a maka na ha abụghị eziokwu.

translation.en: To hold this election across Nigeria, and to screen them individually and to swear them in, it is the National Working Committee (NWC) that sees to these in line with the Party's rules,' This newsletter said.
translation.ibo: Na-ime ntuliaka a na gbụrụgbụrụ Naịjirịa, na ị nyocha ha n'otu n'otu nakwa idu ndị ga-achi pati na steeti dị icheiche n'ịṅụ iyi, ndị na-ahụ maka ya bụ National Working Committee' (NWC) soro usoro na iwu pati,' Akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi a kwuru.

translation.en: APC went on to advice Okorocha to follow the due process of reporting his problems or maltreatment.
translation.ibo: APC gara n'ihu nye Okorocha ndụmọdụ ka osoro usoro iwu ha kpesa nsogbu ọ bụla maọbụ ụzọ ọbụla esi megide ya.

translation.en: Remember that Okorocha and some APC members in Imo State have a problem with the way the election was held for the Imo party leader's election and the support he is giving his son-in-law to become the next governor of Imo State.
translation.ibo: Cheta na Okorocha na ụfọdụ ndị APC n'Imo steeti nwere nsogbu maka etu esiri mee ntulika iji họpụta ndị ga-achị pati ahụ n'Imo nakwa nkwado ọ na-enye ọgọ ya nwoke ị bụrụ aka ga-achị Imo ma ọ rituo.

translation.en: See what the so called 'Restoration Group' said about the election and Okorocha in their meeting in Abuja last month.
translation.ibo: Lee ihe ndị kpọrọ onweha 'Restoration Group' kwuru maka ntuliaka a na Okorocha mgbe ha mechara nzụkọ n'Abuja n'ọnwa gara aga.

translation.en: Nigeria will sell public property to meet up with the 2018 budget.
translation.ibo: Naịjirịa ga-ere akụnaụba ọha iji mezuo ego bọjetị 2018

translation.en: The ministry for public property in Nigeria has said that they will sell up to four hundred billion properties to meet up to the 2018 budget.
translation.ibo: Ngalaba na-ahụ maka akụnụba ọha nke Naịjirịa ekwuola na ha ga-ere akụnụba ruru ijeri naịra 400 maka bọjetị 2018.

translation.en: Electricity
translation.ibo: Igwe ọkụ latrik

translation.en: The power holding company is among the properties to be sold
translation.ibo: Ngalaba ọkụ latrik so na ndị a ga-etinye n'ahịa

translation.en: Nigeria expects to make up to four hundred billion in the sell of public properties to help in the 2019 budget says the minister for public properties.
translation.ibo: Naịjirịa na-ele anya na ọ ga-erete ijeri naira 400 na akụnụba ọha nke ga-enye aka tinye ego na bojeti nke 2019, onyeisi ngalaba na-ahụ maka akụnụba ọha kwuru.

translation.en: Alex Okoh, the head of Bureau of Public Enterprises, said that government has organized the method of selling the government properties in other to borrow from the world bank.
translation.ibo: Alex Okoh, onyeisi ngalaba ahụ akpọrọ 'Bureau of Public Enterprises' n'asụsụ bekee, kwuru na gọọmentị ahazịela usoro atụmatụ ha ga-eji ree akụnụba gọọmenti, bụ nke ha jiri bụte ego n'aka ulọakụ mba ụwa.

translation.en: This borrowed money would be used to develop the electricity that is not functioning well.
translation.ibo: Ego a ha bụtere ga-abanye ibulite nkekọrịta ọkụ latrịk, bụ nke ha sị adịghị eme ọfụma.

translation.en: The senate has increased the budget by five hundred billion naira.
translation.ibo: Ụlọomeiwu ejirila N500bn bulite bọjeti

translation.en: Enugu State has bugeted one hundred and three billion for 2018
translation.ibo: Enugwu steeti ekewapụtala ijeri naira 103 maka 2018

translation.en: Will the 2018 buget will empower the youth?
translation.ibo: Bọjetị 2018 ọ ga-enyere ndị ntoroọbịa aka?

translation.en: In the interview between Okoh and Reuters broadcasting house last week, he told them that the government has plans to sell or give the stadium and power holding company to private sectors.
translation.ibo: Na mkparịtaụka Okoh na ụlọ ntaakụkọ Reuters nwere na izuụka gara aga, ọ gwara ha na gọọmentị Naịjirịa nwere atụmatụ ire maọbụ inye ụlọ ọrụ ndị nkịtị ihe dị ka ọgbọ egwuregwu na ụlọ ọkụ latrịk.

translation.en: Reuters workers said that the government told them that they want to sell their shares in Nigerian Reinsurance Company to the public in this November
translation.ibo: Ndị Reuters nwere na gọọmentị gwakara ha na achọrọ iresi ọha ụfọdụ oke gọọmentị nwere na ụlọọrụ Nigerian Reinsurance Company n'ọnwa Novemba nke afọ a.

translation.en: In 2013, Nigeria started selling shares in the electric sector with hope that it would help build a steady electricity and also bring in foreign investors but none was achieved.
translation.ibo: N'afọ 2013, Naịjirịa bidoro ire akụnụba ọkụ latrịk ya n'uche na ọ ga-enye aka ime ka me ka ọkụ na-adị karịa ka ọ na-adị na mbụ ma webata ego si mba ofesi, mana onweghị otu n'ime ihe mere.

translation.en: Okoh said that the electricity sector is among the thirty seven public properties that were sold that has not benefitted from the scheme, but he did not say the number of government properties that were sold.
translation.ibo: Okoh kwuru na ngalaba ọkụ latrịk so n'ime ngalaba 37 ọha erere eritebeghị uru ekwesiri na ha, mana o kwughi akụnụba ole gọọmentị rere.

translation.en: He went on to say that Nigeria has made up to 7.8 billion dollars from foreign investors.
translation.ibo: Ọ gakwara n'ihu kwuo na Naịjirịa alabatala ego ruru ijere dọla 7.8 site n'ake ndị mba ofesi ji ego achụ ego.

translation.en: Buhari has not endorsed the 2018 budget for it to be enforced.
translation.ibo: Buhari ebinyebeghị aka n'akwụkwọ eji eke ego nke 2018, bụ nke ga-eme ya iwu.

translation.en: The Nigerian budget increased more since Buhari's governance.
translation.ibo: Bọjetị Naịjirịa riri elu karịcha kemgbe Buhari batala ọchịchị.

translation.en: Why is female football not lucrative in Nigeria?
translation.ibo: Gịnị mere bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị anaghị aga ahịa na Naịjirịa?

translation.en: Super Falcons is a famous football club in Africa that plays well but people do not watch them.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons bụ otu ama ama na Afrika dịka ndị na-agba nke ọma mana ọtụtụ mmadụ anaghị e kiri a.

translation.en: Super Falcons.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons

translation.en: Super Falcons has been winner of the African cup of nations for about ten times.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons eburuola iko mba Afrika ugboro iri

translation.en: Football is a game that has lots of fans in Nigeri and the world at large.
translation.ibo: Egwuregwu bọọlụ bụ egwuregwu nwere ọtụtụ mmadụ ọ na-amasị na Nịjirịa na kwa n'ụwa niile.

translation.en: Now, world cup tournament is trending because it will start in three days time, but what we are asking in this news is: why is the female football cup not getting enough recognition as it should?
translation.ibo: Ugbua, asọmpị iko mba ụwa bụ nke na-akpọtụ akpọtụ nke ọma makana ọ ga-ebido n'ụbọchị atọ na-abịa, mana ajụjụ anyị na-ajụ n'akụkọ a bụ: gịnị mere egwuregwu bọọlụ gbasara ụmụnwanyị anaghị enwe mmasị dịka o kwesiri ị nwe?

translation.en: Do you know that women are out for the Super Eagles?
translation.ibo: Ị ma ụmụnwaanyị ji ndị Super Eagles n'ọrụ?

translation.en: Predict the winner of the 2018 world cup through this game.
translation.ibo: Jiri ihe egwuregwu BBC News kaa onye ga-emeri n'iko mba ụwa 2018

translation.en: Let us recognize the Super Falcons.
translation.ibo: Ka anyị leebe anya n'otu Super Falcons.

translation.en: Today, Super Falcons won Queen Scorpions of Gambia six goals to none in the second qualifying stage of the female African cup.
translation.ibo: Taa, Super Falcons meriri Queen Scorpions nke Gambia ọkpụ isii na asataghị ihe n'agba nke abụọ n'itozu n'isonye n'asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụnwaanyị.

translation.en: Super Falcons do not benefit like the Super Eagles.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons anaghị irete uru ka ndị Super Eagles

translation.en: Remember that the Falcons have won ten times since the inception of this cup.
translation.ibo: Cheta kwa na Falcons ebuliela iko a ugboro iri kamgbe e ji malite emume a.

translation.en: Till now, many people do not watch the football match of women as it is expected.
translation.ibo: Mana ruo ugbua, ọtụtụ mmadụ anaghị e kiri egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị dịka a esịrị tụ anya.

translation.en: BBC Igbo asked football fans questions concerning this
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo jụrụ ndị bọọlụ na-amasị ajụjụ ọnụ gbasara okwu a.

translation.en: Why do many people not watch female football match.
translation.ibo: Gịnị mere ọtụtụ mmadụ anaghị ekiri bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị?

translation.en: Chisom Mbonu-Ezeoke is a lady that has much interest in football.
translation.ibo: Chisom Mbonu-Ezeoke bụ nwaanyị egwuregwu bọọlụ na-amasị nke ọma.

translation.en: She said that it is because the government does not invest in this game.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na ọ bụ makana gọọmentị anaghị etinye ego n'egwuregwu a.

translation.en: Super Falcons are the leading team in African female football.
translation.ibo: Super Falcons bụ ndi nọ n'isi egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị n'Afrịrịka

translation.en: she said that news men do not broadcast about the female football match as they should.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na ndị ntaakụkọ anaghị agbasa ozi gbasara egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụnwaanyi ka ha kwesiri ịme.

translation.en: But Kenneth Umeru said that a lot of men do not watch the female football match because they believe that the game is meant for men.
translation.ibo: Mana Kenneth Umerue kwuru na ọtụtụ ụmụnwoke anaghị ekiri egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị makana n'ụche a egwuregwu a bụ nke nwoke.

translation.en: Umerue said that the whites called it 'Gender Issues'.
translation.ibo: Umerue kwuru na 'Ndị bekee kpọrọ ihe a 'Gender Issues'.

translation.en: But Mbonu-Ezeoke disagreed with this. He said that 'you would notice that whenever the Super Falcons are playing their final match, the stadium is always filled to the brim'.
translation.ibo: Mana Mbonu-Ezeoke ekwetaghị n'okwu nke a. O kwuru na 'ị lee anya oge ọbụla ndị Super Falcons na-agba agba nke ịkpeazụ, ọgbọ egwuregwu na-eju gbọm!.

translation.en: This shows that people have interest in this game.
translation.ibo: Nke a gosiri na egwuregwu a na-amasị ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ'

translation.en: Stephen Mbonuagreed to what Mbonu-Ezeoke said, but he warned saying: 'the time has come for people to recognize the skill of many women in football.
translation.ibo: Stephen Mbonu kwetala na ihe a Mbonu-Ezeoke kwuru, mana ọ dọrọ aka na ntị sị: 'oge eruola ịchọpụta ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị nwere ike ị gba bọọlụ ọfụma ọfụma.

translation.en: This can happen when the interest in grown continually'
translation.ibo: Ihe a ga-eme ka mmasị egwuregwu a na-eto oge ọbụla.'

translation.ibo: Enyi nwaanyị onye agbataobi anyị kpọrọ ya pụọ

translation.en: The mother of a missing two years old child since first May is begging the public to help find her child who was taken by their neighbour's girlfriend since the first of May.
translation.ibo: Nne nwa dị afọ abụọ furu kemgbe Mee 1 na-ayọ ọha enyemaka ịchọta nwa ya enyi nwaanyị onye agbataobi ha kpọrọ pụọ kemgbe ụbọchị mbụ nke n'ọnwa Mee.

translation.en: The mother of the missing two years old child has begged the public to help her find her child.
translation.ibo: Nne nwa afọ abụọ furu kemgbe Mee 1 na-ayọ ọha enyemaka ịchọta nwa ya.

translation.en: Since then, the family has been in great sorrow for the missing child.
translation.ibo: Kamgbe ahụ ezinaụlọ nọ na nnukwu nwute gbasara ọfufu nwa ha.

translation.en: The police men BBC Igbo interviewed said that they have arrested two people who are friends with the lady who lost their child.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụweojii BBC Igbo gbara ajụjụ ọnụ na-ekwu na ha anwụchiela mmadụ abụọ bụ enyi nwaagbọghọ nwa ha furu n'aka ya.

translation.en: World Cup 2018: Falcons are praying for the Super Eagles
translation.ibo: World Cup 2018: Falcons na-ekpere Super Eagles ekpere

translation.en: the lady who plays for Super Falcons Ugochi Desire Oparanozie has expressed her support for the Super Eagles
translation.ibo: Nwa agbọghọ na-agbara Super Falcons bọọlụ bụ Ugochi Desire Oparanozie ekwupụtala nkwado ya n'ebe ndị Super Eagles nọ.

translation.en: Yesterday at the end of the match between Gambia where they won six goals to none, Oparanozie told BBC Igbo that she is happy to have scored four goals in the match.
translation.ibo: Na ngwụcha asọmpi ha na ndị Gambia ụnyaahụ ebe ha ji ọkpụ goolu isii a na-asataghị otu merie, Oparanozie gwara BBC Igbo na obi dị ya ụtọ inye goolu anọ n'ime egwuregwu ahụ.

translation.en: She went on to say that she knows that the Super Eagles would do well in the world cup.
translation.ibo: Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo na ọ maara na ndị Super Eagles ga-eme nkeọma n'asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa.

translation.en: Oparanozie prayed for the success of the Super Eagles.
translation.ibo: Oparanozie kpeere ndị Super Eagles ekpere ọganihu.

translation.en: Nigeria scored a total of seven goals to none against Gambia to qualify for the African cup of nations this year in Ghana.
translation.ibo: Naịjirịa ji nchịkọta ọkpụ asaa asataghị otu merie ndị Gambia iji tozuo oke n'asọmpi Iko mba Afrịka a ga-agba na Ghana n'afọ a.

translation.en: Tell us why your father is different from other fathers?
translation.ibo: Gwa anyị ihe mere nna gị ji pụọ iche tunyere nna ndị ọzọ?

translation.en: Today is father's day celebration in the Anglican communion
translation.ibo: Taa bụ ụbọchi emume ncheta ndị nna n'ụka Anglịkan na mbaụwa niile.

translation.en: BBC Igbo went on to ask people why their fathers are special.
translation.ibo: BBC Igbo gara ijụta ndị mmadụ ihe puru iche na-ebe nna ha nọ.

translation.en: The fathers are the head of the family
translation.ibo: Ndị nna bụ ide ji ụlọ.

translation.en: America has deported about thirty-four Nigerians
translation.ibo: Amerịka achụlatala ụmụafọ Naịjirịa ruru 34

translation.en: Closing of American border has affected Nigerians as the deportees got to MM@ airport yesterday.
translation.ibo: Mgbachị oke ala ndị Amerịka na-eme emetụtala ndị Naịjirịa ka mmadụ ha chụlatara rutere ọdọụgbọelu MM@ na Legos ụnyaahụ.

translation.en: Immigrants
translation.ibo: ndị mbịambịa

translation.en: A lot of Nigerians were also deported from Libya earlier this year
translation.ibo: E sikwa mba Libya chụlata ọtụtụ ụmụ Naịjirịa na mbido afọ a

translation.en: Atleast thirty-four Nigerians were deported from America for their misconduct.
translation.ibo: Opekatampe mmadụ 34 bụ ụmụ Naịjirịa ka ndị Amerịka chụghachitere Naịjirịa maka na ha kpara arụ n'obodo ahụ.

translation.en: The deported persons include thirty- two men and two women
translation.ibo: Ndị ahụ achụlatara gụnyere ụmụnwoke mmadụ 32 na ụmụnwanyị abụọ.

translation.en: The police representative Joseph Alab said this to the press men at the airport.
translation.ibo: Onye nkwuchiteọnụ ndị uweojii n'ọdọ ụgbọelu Legos steeti bụ Joseph Alabi kwupụtara nke a nye ndị ntaakụkọ.

translation.en: He said that twenty-five out of the culprits were drug pushers while the rest went against the immigration law
translation.ibo: O kwuru na mmad 25 n'ime ndị kpara arụ gbasara ọgwụike ebe ndị ọzọ dara iwu gbasara ndị mbịara mbịara.

translation.en: one hundred and thirty-six people have arrived from Libya
translation.ibo: Mmadụ 136 esịla Libya laghachịte

translation.en: fifty people have been released from the sea
translation.ibo: Agbapụtala mmadụ iri ise na mmiri

translation.en: Human trafikers have kidnapped students in Benin
translation.ibo: Ndị na-ere mmadụ atọọrọla ụmụakwụkwọ na Benin

translation.en: Alabi said that the Nigerian Immigration Service (NIS), the National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking and the police were the people who received the deportees.
translation.ibo: Alabi kwuru na ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka ọpụpụ na mbata na Naịjịrịa bụ Nigerian Immigration Service (NIS) na Bekee na ndị na-ahụ maka ịkwụsị mgbere mmadụ a na-akpọ National Agency for the Prohibition of Trafficking in Persons na ndị uweojii bụ ndị nabatara ndị ahụ achụlatara.

translation.en: Airport workers were also there to receive them alongside the National Drug and Law Enforcement Agency.
translation.ibo: Ndị ọrụ njem ụgbọelu nọkwa ebe ahụ soro nabata ha nakwa ndị na-ahụ maka ịkwụsị ibubata na ibupu ọgwụike na Naịjirịa bụ National Drug and Law Enforcement Agency.

translation.en: He also said that the different groups took note of their names before taking them to their different destinations.
translation.ibo: O kwukwara na otu ndị ahụ dị icheiche debere aha ndị ahụ n'ebe di icheiche tupu e bulaa ha n'ebe ha ana-aga.

translation.ibo: Osite Yoroba siri onugbu
