translation.ibo: Onugbu a dị iche n'ihi n'ọbụ nke ndị na-achọ nrị enweghị nnukwu mmanụ ma na-enye ihe dị nma na-ahụ.

translation.en: Kolawole Dosunmu known as 'KD Prime' is a man who loves to cook.
translation.ibo: Kolawole Dosunmu a ma dịka 'KD Prime' bụ nwoke ị sị nrị na-amasị.

translation.en: He cooked for BBC Igbo bitter leaf soup with no maggi and little red oil
translation.ibo: O siere BBC Igbo ofe onugbu pụrụiche ya bụ nke ejighị 'Maggi' na obere mmanụ nrị were sie.

translation.en: The story that would interest you
translation.ibo: Akụkọ ga-amasị gị:

translation.en: This work is from Jessica Nwankwo
translation.ibo: Ọrụ a si n'aka Jessica Nwankwo

translation.en: Driver: I jumped into the gutter to escape the fire outbreak
translation.ibo: Ọkwọ-ụgbọala: Awụbara m n'ọwa mmiri iji gbanarị ọkụ ahụ

translation.en: A driver named Wasiu Olaitan explained to BBC Igbo how he escaped the tanker fire outbreak that happened in Lagos.
translation.ibo: Otu nwoke bụ onye ọkwa ụgbọala aha ya bụ Wasiu Olaitan kọwara BBC etu o si gbanarị ọkụ ọgbagba tanka mmanụ agbidi gburu ndị mmadụ na Legọs.

translation.en: In his words, Olaitan said that he dived into the gutter to escape the fire
translation.ibo: N'okwu ya, Olaitan kwuru na ọ wụbara n'ime ọwa mmiri (gụtter) i ji gbanarị ọkụ ahụ.

translation.en: He said that he had lots of passengers but God saved them all.
translation.ibo: O kwuru na o bu ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ n'ụgbọala mgbe mke mere mana Chineke zọrọ ha ndụ.

translation.en: Kindred and other four important groups in Igbo
translation.ibo: Ụmụnna na otu anọ ọzọ kacha mkpa n'ala Igbo

translation.en: The Igbos had ways to govern themselves before the whites came to corronate kings, chiefs and other tittles.
translation.ibo: Ndị Igbo nwere etu ha si achị onwe ha oge mbụ tupu ndị ọcha abịa e bido ichi igwe na eze na echichi ndị ọzọ dị icheiche.

translation.en: kings
translation.ibo: Ndị eze

translation.en: The Igbos have no king' is a saying that is well known to even the least in the land . That there is no single person known as King.
translation.ibo: Igbo enwe eze' bụ otu okwu ma nwa a mụrụ n'ala Igbo taa mara maka na ndị igbo na-ahụta onwe ha dịka ndị enweghi otu onye a kpọrọ eze.

translation.en: But this does not mean that the Igbos have no existing sytem of governance in the past.
translation.ibo: Mana nke a apụtaghị na igbo enweghị usoro ọchịchị na-agara ha nke ọma na mgbe ochie.

translation.en: The method might not be acceptable to others, but it is the way they have understood to govern themselves without problem.
translation.ibo: Usoro ahụ nwere ike ọbụghị usoro ndị ọzọ nabatara mana ọ bụ etu ha ghọtara iji chịa onwe ha na-enweghi nsogbu ọbụla.

translation.en: Five things that interest women
translation.ibo: Ihe ise masịrị ụmụnwaanyị

translation.en: Women have reintroduced a new form of braiding wool
translation.ibo: Ụmụnwaanyị ewechighala isiowu n'ụdị ọhụrụ

translation.en: Would you wear the hair style that was worn in the past?
translation.ibo: I ga-egbu ụdịrị ichi a egburu mgbe gboo?

translation.en: When the whites came, this process was not clear to them
translation.ibo: Mana oge ndị ọcha bịara, usoro a edoghi ha anya.

translation.en: This system is the different groups who have their various functions to ensure peace and non sacrilegious acts.
translation.ibo: Usoro a bụ otu dị iche iche nwere ọrụ ha na-arụ n'obodo ịhụ na enweghi nsogbu dapụtara nakwa enweghi arụ ọbụla ga-emerụ ala.

translation.en: These groups are; First born sons, kinsmen, first daughters, age grade, title holdersand masquerade.
translation.ibo: Otu ndị a bụ; Ọkpala, Ụmụnna na ụmụada, otu ọgbọ, ndị nze na ọzọ na mmanwụ.

translation.en: My kindsmen said that Ishould not come back home again till I find a husband
translation.ibo: Ndị ụlọ anyị sị m ma alọtazina ụlọ ọzọ ma m ahụghị di'

translation.en: Will Outcast be stopped in Igbo land?
translation.ibo: Osu a ga-akwụsị n'ala Igbo?

translation.en: see the traditional marriage attires of the Igbos
translation.ibo: Lee uwe ndị Igbo na-eyi aga igba nkwu

translation.en: functions of Igbo groups
translation.ibo: Ihe otu ndị igbo na-arụ

translation.en: Title holders- the council of title holders is the highest group in the community, they are the last resort to every case.
translation.ibo: Ndị nze na ọzọ - Ndị nze na ọzọ bụ dị kachasị n'obodo, ha bụ ndị ikpeazụ okwu na-agakwu.

translation.en: They have the final say in the community
translation.ibo: Ha bụ ekwucha ọgwụ n'okwu niile gbasara obodo.

translation.en: They are the holders of the tradition and 'ọfọ' of the community to ensure justice and also see that everyone is just.
translation.ibo: Ha bụ ndị na-eji omenaala na ọfọ obodo ịhụ na a na-ekpe ikpe ziri ezi nakwa ịhụ na aka mmadụ niile kwụ ọtọ.

translation.en: Before one is accepted into this group, the person must be an extremely wise person who has show cased it
translation.ibo: Tupu anabata mmadụ n'otu a, ọ ga-abụ onye amamihe ha na-akpụ n'ala site n'ihe ọ hụrụla na ihe ọ gabigarala

translation.en: That is why men who went to fight in wars in the past, come back sometimes with human skulls.
translation.ibo: Ya mere o ji abụ ụmụnwoke garala ọgụ na agha na mgbe mbụ, merie n'agha ma oge ụfọdụ jiri okpokoro isi mmadụ lọta.

translation.en: They are accorded great respect in Igbo land while members of the title holders wear eagle on their cap to show that they are reverenced in the community because Eagle is the most beautiful bird in Igbo land.
translation.ibo: A na-akwanyere ha ugwu pụrụiche n'ala Igbo ebe ndị nọ n'otu nze na ọzọ na-eyi ugo n'okpu ha igosi na ha bụ ndị e ji eme ọnụ n'obodo maka na ugo bụ nnụnnụ kachasị mma n'ala Igbo.

translation.en: The white clothes they wear signifies purity of hear and character and also in justice.
translation.ibo: Akwa ọcha ha na-eyi na-egosi ndị dị ọcha n'obi nakwa n'agwa nakwa n;ikpe ziri ezi.

translation.en: Their red cap signifies that the progress of the community lies in their sacrifice of blood and pain.
translation.ibo: Okpu mmemme ha na-ekpu na-egosi na site n'ahụhụ ha nakwa ọbara ha mefuru n'agha ka ndị obodo ha ji aga n'ihu.

translation.en: They are divided into two: elders and chiefs.
translation.ibo: E kere ya udo abụọ; ndị nze na ndị ọzọ.

translation.en: The elders are higher in rank than the chiefs.
translation.ibo: Ndị nze karịrị ndị ọzọ n'ọkwa.

translation.en: Kinsmen - These are the first born sons from every family in the community.
translation.ibo: Ụmụnna - Ndị a bụ ụmụnwoke ụmụọkpala si n'ezinaụlọ dị icheiche n'obodo.

translation.en: They are the decision makers of the different decisions made for the progress of the community.
translation.ibo: Ha bụ ndị na-eme mkpebi gbasara okwu dị icheiche n'obodo etu o si gbasara agamnihu na ọdịmma obodo.

translation.en: All defaulters are reported to the kinsmen, they go to the deities to find out about the things concerning the community or their families.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụnna ka a na-ekpesara ma onye ọbụla mee ihe ọjọọ, ha bụ ndị na-aga n'ọnụ arụsị ịchọpụta ihe arụsị na-ekwu gbasara obodo maọbụ gbasara ezinaụlọ ha.

translation.en: Every house hold has kinsmen to whom they take cases concerning land dispute, sharing boundaries, inheriting wives and crime against the land such as murder, theft, fornication or adultery.
translation.ibo: Ezinaụlọ niile na-enwe ndị ụmụnna ha bụ ebe a na-ebido ikpe ọbụla gbasara esemokwu dịka okwu ala, okwu ime obi, okwu gbasara ihe nketa nwaanyị na arụ megidere ala dịka onye gburu mmadụ, izu ohi, ịkwa iko maọbụ idina nwunye maọbụ di mmadụ.

translation.en: Any decision they take stands in the whole community
translation.ibo: Mkpebi ọbụla ha mere na-adịgịde n'obodo niile.

translation.en: The kindsmen are seen as representatives of different families
translation.ibo: A na-ahụ ụmụnna dịka ndị nnọchite anya si ezinaụlọ dị icheiche.

translation.en: First daughters- this is the female group in the community, this is where women unite to discuss about their house holds, husbands and children
translation.ibo: Ụmụada - Otu nke a bụ otu ụmụnwaanyị n'obodo, ebe a ka ụmụnwaanyị na-ejiko onwe ha ọnụ kpaa maka ọdịnaihu ezinaụlọ ha na ihe gbasara di ha na ụmụaka ha.

translation.en: The first born daughters are called to enforce peace in the dispute between two communities and their decisions are not refuted.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụada ka a na-akpọ ikpe udo oge ọbụla e nwere esemokwu n'etiti obodo na obodo ma ihe niile ha kpebiri, anaghị agbagha ya agbagha.

translation.en: The first born daughters are also called to ensure peace between their brothers and their wives for unity in the family.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụada bụkwa ndị na-ekpe udo n'etiti ụmụnne ha ụmụnwoke na ndị nwunye ha iji hụ na e nwere otu ihu maọbụ otu obi n'ezinaụlọ.

translation.en: The first born daughters include women born into the family or women married into the family .
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụada gụnyere ụmụnwaanyị ndị a mụrụ n'ezinaụlọ nakwa ụmụnwaanyị ndị alụbatara n'ezinaụlọ.

translation.en: Age grade - This is a group for men who are of the same age bracket
translation.ibo: Otu ọgbọ - Nke a bụ otu ebe ndị bụ ọgbọ dịka ụmụnwoke a mụrụ n'otu oge.

translation.en: The see to the security of the community
translation.ibo: ha bụ ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa obodo niile.

translation.en: They also go for war whenever there is war
translation.ibo: Ha bụkwa ndị na-aga agha maọbụ ọgụ oge ọbụla ọgụ dapụtara.

translation.en: They are in charge of keeping the roads, rivers and market clean.
translation.ibo: Ha bụ ndị na-ekpocha ụzọ, mmiri na ahịa ma o nwee ihe gbochiri ya maọbụ na mmiri buru ahịhịa nọchie ụzọ.

translation.en: They also enforce the law made by the kinsmen or council of title holders such as sending one on exile or anbody penalized.
translation.ibo: Ọ bụkwa ha na-emepụta ihe ọbụla otu ụmụnna maọbụ ndị nze na ọzọ nyere n'iwu dịka ọ bụrụ na o nwere onye a ga-achụpụ n'obodo maọbụ onye a ga-amachị.

translation.en: They would see that the person leaves the community and goes far beyond it
translation.ibo: Ha ga-agba mbọ hụ na onye ahụ pụrụ n'obodo ma gatee aka.

translation.en: The masquered cult is a group that only receives those who have undergone their initiation rites
translation.ibo: Mmanwụ - otu mmanwụ bụ otu na-anabata naanị ndị gabigara otu nnabata ha.

translation.en: They function as the police and see that there is order in the community
translation.ibo: Ha na-arụ ọrụ ndị uweojii hụ na e nwere usoro n'obodo.

translation.en: Any time there is dispute like land dispute, masquerade goes to the land and plants palm frond to signify that nobody will be permitted to use the land until a decision is made concerning it.
translation.ibo: Oge ọbụla e nwere esemokwu dịka ala, mmanwụ na-aga kụọ ọmụ n'ala ahụ nke gosiri na o nweghi onye ọbụla a ga-ekwe ka ọ banye n'ala ahụ rue oge a mere mkpebi gbasara ya.

translation.en: Masquereds also come out to make the people happy by dancing
translation.ibo: Mmanwụ nwekwara oge ọ na-apụta iji mee ndị obodo obi aṅụrị site na ịụ̀ba egwu.

translation.en: Similarities of the old and new leadership
translation.ibo: Nyiri dị n'ọchịchị oge ahụ na nke ugbua

translation.en: Council of title holders is the last resort for any dispute that could not be settled by the kinsmen or the group of first born daughters.
translation.ibo: Ndị nze na ọzọ dịka ndị na-achị obodo, ha bụ ndị ikpeazụ okwu ga-erute ntị, ọ bụ okwu ọbụla na-ekweghi mmeta n'etiti ndị ụmụnna na ụmụada ka a na-ewetara ha.

translation.en: They have the final say in every decision
translation.ibo: Ha bụ ekwucha ọgwụ n'okwu ọbụla

translation.en: Kinsmen and first born daughters are like the community representatives.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụnna na ndị ụmụada dịka ndị nnọchite anya n'obodo.

translation.en: The kinsmen make laws concerning the community. It is meant for all first born sons of every family in the community.
translation.ibo: Ndị ụmụnna na-eme iwu gbasara obodo ebe ụmụ ọkpara n'ezinaụlọ dị icheiche n'obodo na-anọ na ya

translation.en: The age grade are like the soldiers of the community that secures the community and sees that there is peace in the entire community.
translation.ibo: Otu ọgbọ dịka ndị agha obodo, na-echekwa obodo ma na-ahụ na obodo niile bi n'udo.

translation.en: they go or organize anything in the community that is not the way it should be
translation.ibo: H na-aga agha maọbụ hazie ihe dị n'obodo na-adịghị eti o si kwesi.

translation.en: The masquered is like the police that fishes out culprits in the community.
translation.ibo: Mmanwụ bụ uwejii obodo na-eje akpụpụta ndị mere ajọ ihe n'obodo.

translation.en: This was how the Igbos functioned before the whites introduced the 'Warrant Chiefs' system.
translation.ibo: Otu ndị a ka ala Igbo ji aga n'oge mbụ tupu ndị ọcha eweta usoro ha kpọrọ 'Warrant Chiefs' ebido.

translation.en: these groups worked and ensured the progress of the Igbos without anyone being the king but as it is now, kings are being corronated for political reasons.
translation.ibo: Otu ndị a rụrụ ọrụ n'oge mbụ mee ka ala igbo na-aga n'ihu na-enweghi onye ọbụla ha kpọrọ eze mana etu ọ dị ugbua, a na-echizi eze e ji eme ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị.

translation.en: The question being asked now is, is the new system better than the old system of governance?
translation.ibo: Ajụjụ a na-azjụzị bụ, usoro ndị Igbo ji aga ugbua ọ na-eme ha nke ọma karịa usoro ha ji aga oge gara aga?

translation.en: What are you supposed to know before accepting a maid
translation.ibo: Gịnị ka ị kwesiri ima tupu ị nabata onye odibo

translation.en: Story that explains all the necessary questions to ask before getting a maid.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ kọwara ajụjụ niile ị kwesiri igba tupu ịmee onye ọbụla onye nyemaaka.

translation.en: A maid does different chores in the house
translation.ibo: Onye nyemaaka na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche n'ime ụlọ

translation.en: Who is that person you want to accept as a maid in your house?
translation.ibo: Onye bụ onye ahụ ị chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaaka n'ulọ gị?

translation.en: Different stories that spring up in the past on how maids kidnap children or molest them.
translation.ibo: Akụkọ dị iche iche na-apụta n'oge gara aga gosi etu ndị nyemaaka na-atọ ụmụaka maọbụ ya na ha a na-eme mmekọrịta ahụ.

translation.en: In December 2014, a former maid named Juliet kidnapped two children of the same parents in Magodo Lagos State.
translation.ibo: N'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2014, otu nwaanyị aha bụ Juliet bụbu onye enyemaaka tọrọ ụmụnwata abụọ n'otu ezinaulọ biri na Magodo na Legos steeti.
